tika-s0404t0:5_0: 1. Aṭṭhakanipātassa paṭhame vaḍḍhitāyāti bhāvanāpāripūrivasena paribrūhitāya. Punappunaṃ
tika-s0404t0:5_1: katāyāti bhāvanāya bahulīkaraṇena aparāparaṃ pavattitāya. Yuttayānasadisakatāyāti
tika-s0404t0:5_2: yathā yuttaājaññayānaṃ chekena sārathinā adhiṭṭhitaṃ yathāruci pavattati, evaṃ yathāruci
tika-s0404t0:5_4: bhāvanābahulīkārehi pati pati upaṭṭhitāya avijahitāya. Samantato citāyāti sabbabhāgena
tika-s0404t0:5_5: bhāvanānurūpaṃ cayaṃ gamitāya. Tenāha “upacitāyā”ti. Suṭṭhu samāraddhāyāti ativiya
tika-s0404t0:6: Yo ca mettaṃ bhāvayatītiādīsu yo koci gahaṭṭho vā pabbajito vā. Mettanti mettājhānaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:7_0: Appamāṇanti bhāvanāvasena ārammaṇavasena ca appamāṇaṃ. Asubhabhāvanādayo viya hi
tika-s0404t0:7_1: ārammaṇe ekadesaggahaṇaṃ akatvā anavasesapharaṇavasena anodhiso pharaṇavasena ca,
tika-s0404t0:7_2: appamāṇārammaṇatāya paguṇabhāvanāvasena ca appamāṇaṃ. Tanū saṃyojanā hontīti mettaṃ
tika-s0404t0:7_3: pādakaṃ katvā sammasitvā heṭṭhime ariyamagge adhigacchantassa sukheneva paṭighasaṃyojanādayo
tika-s0404t0:7_4: pahīyamānā tanū hontīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0404t0:8_0: Evaṃ kilesappahānañca nibbānādhigamañca mettābhāvanāya sikhāppattamānisaṃsaṃ dassetvā
tika-s0404t0:8_1: idāni aññepi ānisaṃse dassetuṃ “ekampi ce”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha aduṭṭhacittoti mettābalena
tika-s0404t0:8_2: suṭṭhu vikkhambhitabyāpādatāya byāpādena adūsitacitto. Mettāyatīti hitapharaṇavasena
tika-s0404t0:8_3: mettaṃ karoti. Kusalīti atisayena kusalavā mahāpuñño, paṭighādianatthavigamena khemī.
tika-s0404t0:8_4: Sabbe ca pāṇeti ca-saddo byatireko. Manasānukampīti cittena anukampanto. Idaṃ vuttaṃ
tika-s0404t0:8_5: hoti – ekasattavisayāpi tāva mettā mahākusalarāsi, sabbe pana pāṇe attano puttaṃ
tika-s0404t0:8_6: viya hitapharaṇena manasā anukampanto pahukaṃ pahuṃ anappakaṃ apariyantaṃ catusaṭṭhimahākappepi
tika-s0404t0:8_7: attano vipākappabandhaṃ pavattetuṃ samatthaṃ uḷāraṃ puññaṃ ariyo parisuddhacitto
tika-s0404t0:8_8: puggalova karoti nipphādetīti. Sattabharitanti sattehi aviraḷaṃ, ākiṇṇamanussanti attho.
tika-s0404t0:9_0: Saṅgahavatthūnīti lokassa saṅgaṇhanakāraṇāni. Nipphannasassato nava bhāge kassakassa
tika-s0404t0:9_1: datvā raññaṃ ekabhāgaggahaṇaṃ dasamabhāgaggahaṇaṃ. Evaṃ kassakā haṭṭhatuṭṭhā sassāni
tika-s0404t0:9_2: sampādentīti āha “sassasampādane medhāvitāti attho”ti. Tato orabhāge kira chabhāgaggahaṇaṃ
tika-s0404t0:9_3: jātaṃ. Chamāsikanti channaṃ channaṃ māsānaṃ pahonakaṃ. Pāsetīti pāsagate viya karoti.
tika-s0404t0:9_4: Vācāya piyaṃ vācāpiyaṃ, tassa kammaṃ vācāpeyyaṃ. Sabbaso raṭṭhassa iddhādibhāvato
tika-s0404t0:9_5: khemaṃ. Nirabbudaṃ coriyābhāvato. Iddhañhi raṭṭhaṃ acoriyaṃ. “Niraggaḷa”nti vuccati
tika-s0404t0:10_0: Uddhaṃmūlakaṃ katvāti ummūlaṃ katvā. Dvīhi pariyaññehīti mahāyaññassa pubbabhāge
tika-s0404t0:10_1: pacchā ca pavattetabbehi dvīhi parivārayaññehi. Satta…pe… bhīsanassāti sattanavutādhikānaṃ
tika-s0404t0:10_2: pañcannaṃ pasusatānaṃ māraṇena bheravassa pāpabhīrukānaṃ bhayāvahassa. Tathā hi vadanti –
tika-s0404t0:13_0: Sammanti yugacchidde pakkhipitabbadaṇḍakaṃ. Pāsantīti khipanti. Saṃhārimehīti sakaṭehi
tika-s0404t0:13_1: vahitabbehi. Pubbe kira eko rājā sammāpāsaṃ yajanto sarassatinaditīre pathaviyā vivare
tika-s0404t0:13_2: dinne nimuggoyeva ahosi. Andhabālabrāhmaṇā gatānugatigatā “ayaṃ tassa saggagamanamaggo”ti
tika-s0404t0:13_3: saññāya tattha sammāpāsaṃ yaññaṃ paṭṭhapenti. Tena vuttaṃ “nimuggokāsato pabhutī”ti.
tika-s0404t0:13_4: Ayūpo appakadivaso yāgo, sayūpo bahudivasaṃ sādheyyo satrayāgo. Mantapadābhisaṅkhatānaṃ
tika-s0404t0:13_6: Sāragabbhakoṭṭhāgārādīsu natthi ettha aggaḷāti niraggaḷo. Tattha kira yaññe attano
tika-s0404t0:14_0: Candappabhāti candimasseva pabhāya. Tārāgaṇāva sabbeti yathā sabbepi tārāgaṇā candimasobhāya
tika-s0404t0:14_1: soḷasimpi kalaṃ nāgghanti, evaṃ te assamedhādayo yaññā mettassa cittassa vuttalakkhaṇena
tika-s0404t0:14_2: subhāvitassa soḷasimpi kalaṃ nānubhavanti, na pāpuṇanti, nāgghantīti attho.
tika-s0404t0:15_0: Idāni aparepi diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyike mettābhāvanāya ānisaṃse dassetuṃ “yo na hantī”tiādi
tika-s0404t0:15_1: vuttaṃ. Tattha yoti mettābrahmavihārabhāvanānuyutto puggalo. Na hantīti teneva mettābhāvanānubhāvena
tika-s0404t0:15_2: dūravikkhambhitabyāpādatāya na kañci sattaṃ hiṃsati, leḍḍudaṇḍādīhi na vibādhati
tika-s0404t0:15_3: vā. Na ghātetīti paraṃ samādapetvā na satte mārāpeti na vibādhāpeti ca. Na jinātīti
tika-s0404t0:15_4: sārambhaviggāhikakathādivasena na kañci jināti sārambhasseva abhāvato, jānikaraṇavasena
tika-s0404t0:15_5: vā aṭṭakaraṇādinā na kañci jināti. Tenāha “na attanā parassa jāniṃ karotī”ti. Na
tika-s0404t0:15_6: jāpayeti parehi payojetvā paresampi dhanajāniṃ na kārāpeyya. Tenāha “na parena parassa
tika-s0404t0:15_7: jāniṃ kāretī”ti. Mettāya vā aṃso aviheṭhanaṭṭhena avayavabhūtoti mettaṃso.
tika-s0404t0:18_1: ādibhūtāyā”ti. Ariyoti niddoso parisuddho. Tuṇhībhāvo na titthiyānaṃ mūgabbatagahaṇaṃ
tika-s0404t0:18_2: viya aparisuddhoti ariyo tuṇhībhāvo. Catutthajjhānanti ukkaṭṭhaniddesenetaṃ vuttaṃ,
tika-s0404t0:18_3: paṭhamajjhānādīnipi ariyo tuṇhībhāvotveva saṅkhaṃ gacchanti. Jānanti idaṃ kammasādhananti
tika-s0404t0:18_4: āha “jānitabbakaṃ jānātī”ti. Yathā vā ekacco viparītaṃ gaṇhanto jānantopi na jānāti,
tika-s0404t0:18_5: passantopi na passati, na evamayaṃ. Ayaṃ pana jānanto jānāti, passanto passatīti
tika-s0404t0:21_0: 5. Pañcame lokassa dhammāti sattalokassa avassaṃbhāvidhammā. Tenāha “etehi muttā
tika-s0404t0:21_1: nāma natthi”tiādi. Ghāsacchādanādīnaṃ laddhi lābho, tāni eva vā laddhabbato lābho,
tika-s0404t0:21_2: tadabhāvo alābho, lābhaggahaṇena cettha tabbisayo anurodho gahito, alābhaggahaṇena
tika-s0404t0:21_3: virodho. Yasmā lohite sati tadupaghātavasena pubbo viya anurodho laddhāvasaro eva
tika-s0404t0:21_4: hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ “lābhe āgate alābho āgatoyevā”ti. Esa nayo yasādīsupi. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0404t0:24: 6-8. Chaṭṭhe adhikaṃ payasati payujjati etenāti adhippayāso, savisesaṃ itikattabbakiriyā. Tenāha “adhikappayogo”ti. Sattamaṭṭhamesu natthi vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:27_0: 9. Navame duvidhā kulaputtā jātikulaputtā ācārakulaputtā ca. Tattha “tena kho pana
tika-s0404t0:27_1: samayena raṭṭhapālo kulaputto tasmiṃyeva thullakoṭṭhike aggakulikassa putto”ti evaṃ
tika-s0404t0:27_2: āgatā uccākulaputtā jātikulaputtā. “Saddhāyete kulaputtā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajitā”ti
tika-s0404t0:27_3: evaṃ āgatā pana yattha katthaci kule pasutāpi ācārakulaputtā nāma. Idha pana uccākulappasutataṃ
tika-s0404t0:27_4: sandhāya “kulaputtoti, bhikkhave, nandaṃ sammā vadamāno vadeyyā”ti bhagavatā vuttanti
tika-s0404t0:27_5: āha “jātikulaputto”ti. Ubhohipi pana kāraṇehi tassa kulaputtabhāvoyeva. Sesamettha uttānameva.
tika-s0404t0:30_0: 10. Dasame paṭicaratīti paṭicchādanavasena carati pavattati. Paṭicchādanaṭṭho eva
tika-s0404t0:30_1: vā carati-saddo anekatthattā dhātūnanti āha “paṭicchādetī”ti. Aññenāññanti pana paṭicchādanākāradassananti
tika-s0404t0:30_2: āha “aññena kāraṇenā”tiādi. Tattha aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ vacanaṃ vāti yaṃ codakena cuditakassa
tika-s0404t0:30_3: dosavibhāvanaṃ kāraṇaṃ, vacanaṃ vā vuttaṃ, taṃ tato aññeneva kāraṇena, vacanena vā
tika-s0404t0:30_4: paṭicchādeti. Kāraṇenāti codanāya amūlāya amūlikabhāvadīpaniyā yuttiyā vā. Vacanenāti
tika-s0404t0:30_5: tadatthabodhakena vacanena. “Ko āpanno”tiādinā codanaṃ vissajjetvāva vikkhepāpajjanaṃ
tika-s0404t0:30_6: aññenāññaṃ paṭicaraṇaṃ. Bahiddhā kathāpanāmanā nāma “itthannāmaṃ āpattiṃ āpannosī”ti
tika-s0404t0:30_7: vutte – “pāṭaliputtaṃ gatomhī”tiādinā codanaṃ vissajjetvāti ayameva viseso. Yo hi
tika-s0404t0:30_8: “āpattiṃ āpannosī”ti vutto “ko āpanno, kiṃ āpanno, kismiṃ āpannā, kaṃ bhaṇatha, kiṃ
tika-s0404t0:30_9: bhaṇathā”ti vā vadati, “evarūpaṃ kiñci tayā diṭṭha”nti vutte “na suṇāmī”ti sotaṃ
tika-s0404t0:30_10: vā upaneti, ayaṃ aññenāññaṃ paṭicarati nāma. Yo pana “itthannāmaṃ nāma āpattiṃ āpannosī”ti
tika-s0404t0:30_11: puṭṭho “pāṭaliputtaṃ gatomhī”ti vatvā puna “na tava pāṭaliputtagamanaṃ pucchāma,
tika-s0404t0:30_12: āpattiṃ pucchāmā”ti vutte tato “rājagahaṃ gatomhi. Rājagahaṃ vā yāhi brāhmaṇagahaṃ
tika-s0404t0:30_13: vā, āpattiṃ āpannosīti. Taṃ tattha me sūkaramaṃsaṃ laddha”ntiādīni vadati, ayaṃ bahiddhā
tika-s0404t0:30_14: kathaṃ apanāmeti nāma. Samaṇakacavaroti samaṇavesadhāraṇena samaṇappatirūpakatāya
tika-s0404t0:31_0: Kāraṇḍavaṃ niddhamathāti vipannasīlatāya kacavarabhūtaṃ puggalaṃ kacavaramiva anapekkhā
tika-s0404t0:31_1: apanetha. Kasambuṃ apakassathāti kasambubhūtañca naṃ khattiyādīnaṃ majjhagataṃ pabhinnapaggharitakuṭṭhaṃ
tika-s0404t0:31_2: caṇḍālaṃ viya apakaḍḍhatha. Kiṃ kāraṇaṃ? Saṅghārāmo nāma sīlavantānaṃ kato, na dussīlānaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:31_3: Yato etadeva sandhāyāha “tato palāpe vāhetha, assamaṇe samaṇamānine”ti. Yathā palāpā
tika-s0404t0:31_4: antosārarahitā ataṇḍulā bahi thusena vīhī viya dissanti, evaṃ pāpabhikkhū anto sīlarahitāpi
tika-s0404t0:31_5: bahi kāsāvādiparikkhārena bhikkhū viya dissanti, tasmā “palāpā”ti vuccanti. Te palāpe
tika-s0404t0:31_6: vāhetha opunatha vidhamatha, paramatthato assamaṇe samaṇavesamattena samaṇamānine.
tika-s0404t0:31_7: Kappayavhoti kappetha, karothāti vuttaṃ hoti. Patissatāti sappatissā. Vaṭṭadukkhassa
tika-s0404t0:36_0: 11. Dutiyassa paṭhame verañjāyaṃ viharatīti ettha verañjāti tassa nagarassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ,
tika-s0404t0:36_1: tassaṃ verañjāyaṃ. Samīpatthe bhummavacanaṃ. Naḷerupucimandamūleti ettha naḷeru nāma
tika-s0404t0:36_2: yakkho. Pucimandoti nimbarukkho. Mūlanti samīpaṃ. Ayañhi mūla-saddo “mūlāni uddhareyya
tika-s0404t0:36_4: asādhāraṇahetumhi. “Yāva majjhanhike kāle chāyā pharati, nivāte paṇṇāni patanti,
tika-s0404t0:36_5: ettāvatā rukkhamūla”ntiādīsu samīpe. Idha pana samīpe adhippeto, tasmā naḷeruyakkhena
tika-s0404t0:36_6: adhiggahitassa pucimandassa samīpeti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. So kira pucimando
tika-s0404t0:36_7: ramaṇīyo pāsādiko anekesaṃ rukkhānaṃ ādhipaccaṃ viya kurumāno tassa nagarassa avidūre
tika-s0404t0:36_8: gamanāgamanasampanne ṭhāne ahosi. Atha bhagavā verañjaṃ gantvā patirūpe ṭhāne viharanto
tika-s0404t0:36_9: tassa rukkhassa samīpe heṭṭhābhāge vihāsi. Tena vuttaṃ “verañjāyaṃ viharati naḷerupucimandamūle”ti.
tika-s0404t0:37_0: Paccuṭṭhānaṃ nāma āsanā vuṭṭhānanti āha “nāsanā vuṭṭhātī”ti. Nisinnāsanato na vuṭṭhahatīti
tika-s0404t0:37_1: attho. Ettha ca jiṇṇe…pe… vayoanuppatteti upayogavacanaṃ āsanā vuṭṭhānakiriyāpekkhaṃ
tika-s0404t0:37_2: na hoti. Tasmā “jiṇṇe…pe… vayoanuppatte disvā”ti ajjhāhāraṃ katvā attho veditabbo.
tika-s0404t0:37_3: Atha vā paccuggamanakiriyāpekkhaṃ upayogavacanaṃ, tasmā na paccuṭṭhātīti uṭṭhāya
tika-s0404t0:37_4: paccuggamanaṃ na karotīti attho veditabbo. Paccuggamanampi hi paccuṭṭhānanti vuccati.
tika-s0404t0:37_5: Vuttañhetaṃ “ācariyaṃ pana dūratova disvā paccuṭṭhāya paccuggamanakaraṇaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0404t0:37_6: nāmā”ti. Nāsanā vuṭṭhātīti iminā pana paccuggamanābhāvassa upalakkhaṇamattaṃ dassitanti
tika-s0404t0:37_7: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vibhāvane nāma attheti pakativibhāvanasaṅkhāte atthe. Na abhivādeti vāti
tika-s0404t0:37_8: na abhivādetabbanti vā sallakkhetīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0404t0:38_0: Taṃ aññāṇanti “ayaṃ mama abhivādanādīni kātuṃ araharūpo na hotī”ti ajānanavasena
tika-s0404t0:38_1: pavattaṃ aññāṇaṃ. Olokentoti “dukkhaṃ kho agāravo viharati appatisso, kiṃ nu kho
tika-s0404t0:38_2: ahaṃ samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā sakkareyyaṃ garuṃ kareyya”ntiādisuttavaseneva ñāṇacakkhunā
tika-s0404t0:38_3: olokento. Nipaccakārārahanti paṇipātārahaṃ. Sampatijātoti muhuttajāto, jātasamanantaramevāti
tika-s0404t0:38_4: vuttaṃ hoti. Uttarena mukhoti uttaradisābhimukho. “Sattapadavītihārena gantvā sakalaṃ
tika-s0404t0:39_0: “Dhammatā esā, bhikkhave, sampatijāto bodhisatto samehi pādehi patiṭṭhahitvā uttarābhimukho
tika-s0404t0:39_1: sattapadavītihārena gacchati, setamhi chatte anudhāriyamāne sabbā disā viloketi,
tika-s0404t0:40_0: Evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ sattapadavītihārupari ṭhitassa viya sabbādisānulokanassa kathitattā
tika-s0404t0:40_1: vuttaṃ, na panetaṃ evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ sattapadavītihārato pageva disāvilokanassa katattā.
tika-s0404t0:40_2: Mahāsatto hi manussānaṃ hatthato muccitvā puratthimaṃ disaṃ olokesi, anekāni cakkavāḷasahassāni
tika-s0404t0:40_3: ekaṅgaṇāni ahesuṃ. Tattha devamanussā gandhamālādīhi pūjayamānā, “mahāpurisa, idha
tika-s0404t0:40_4: tumhehi sadisopi natthi, kuto uttaritaro”ti āhaṃsu. Evaṃ catasso disā, catasso anudisā,
tika-s0404t0:40_5: heṭṭhā, uparīti dasapi disā anuviloketvā attano sadisaṃ adisvā “ayaṃ uttaradisā”ti
tika-s0404t0:40_6: sattapadavītihārena agamāsīti veditabbā. Olokesinti mama puññānubhāvena lokavivaraṇapāṭihāriye
tika-s0404t0:40_7: jāte paññāyamānaṃ dasasahassilokadhātuṃ maṃsacakkhunāva olokesinti attho.
tika-s0404t0:41_0: Mahāpurisoti jātigottakulappadesādivasena mahantapuriso. Aggoti guṇehi sabbappadhāno.
tika-s0404t0:41_1: Jeṭṭhoti guṇavaseneva sabbesaṃ vuddhatamo, guṇehi mahallakatamoti vuttaṃ hoti. Seṭṭhoti
tika-s0404t0:41_2: guṇavaseneva sabbesaṃ pasatthatamo. Atthato pana pacchimāni dve purimasseva vevacanānīti
tika-s0404t0:41_3: veditabbaṃ. Tayāti nissakke karaṇavacanaṃ. Uttaritaroti adhikataro. Patimānesīti
tika-s0404t0:41_4: pūjesi. Āsabhinti uttamaṃ. Mayhaṃ abhivādanādiraho puggaloti mayhaṃ abhivādanādikiriyāya
tika-s0404t0:41_5: araho anucchaviko puggalo. Niccasāpekkhatāya panettha samāso daṭṭhabbo. Tathāgatāti
tika-s0404t0:41_6: tathāgatato, tathāgatassa santikāti vuttaṃ hoti. Evarūpanti abhivādanādisabhāvaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:42: Taṃ vacananti “nāhaṃ taṃ brāhmaṇā”tiādivacanaṃ. “Nāhaṃ arasarūpo, mādisā vā arasarūpā”ti vutte brāhmaṇo thaddho bhaveyya. Tena vuttaṃ “cittamudubhāvajananattha”nti.
tika-s0404t0:43_0: Katamo pana soti pariyāyāpekkho pulliṅganiddeso, katamo so pariyāyoti attho? Jātivasenāti
tika-s0404t0:43_2: api-saddena pageva aseṭṭhasammatānanti dasseti. Abhinandantānanti sappītikataṇhāvasena
tika-s0404t0:43_3: pamodamānānaṃ. Rajjantānanti balavarāgavasena rajjantānaṃ. Rūpaparibhogena uppannataṇhāsampayuttasomanassavedanā
tika-s0404t0:43_4: rūpato nibbattitvā hadayatappanato ambarasādayo viya rūparasāti vuccanti. Āviñcantīti
tika-s0404t0:43_6: attukkaṃsanavasena kathite brāhmaṇassa asappāyabhāvato attānaṃ anukkhipanto anukkaṃsento.
tika-s0404t0:44_0: Etasmiṃ panatthe karaṇe sāmivacananti “jahitā”ti etasmiṃ atthe tathāgatassāti karaṇe
tika-s0404t0:44_1: sāmivacanaṃ, tathāgatena jahitāti attho. Mūlanti bhavamūlaṃ. “Tālavatthukatā”ti vattabbe
tika-s0404t0:44_2: “oṭṭhamukho”tiādīsu viya majjhepadalopaṃ katvā a-kārañca dīghaṃ katvā “tālāvatthukatā”ti
tika-s0404t0:44_3: vuttanti āha “tālavatthu viya nesaṃ vatthu katanti tālāvatthukatā”ti. Tattha tālassa
tika-s0404t0:44_4: vatthu tālavatthu. Yathā ārāmassa vatthubhūtapubbo padeso ārāmassa abhāve “ārāmavatthū”ti
tika-s0404t0:44_5: vuccati, evaṃ tālassa patiṭṭhitokāso samūlaṃ uddharite tāle padesamatte ṭhite tālassa
tika-s0404t0:44_6: vatthubhūtapubbattā “tālavatthū”ti vuccati. Nesanti rūparasādīnaṃ. Kathaṃ pana tālavatthu
tika-s0404t0:44_7: viya nesaṃ vatthu katanti āha “yathā hī”tiādi. Rūpādiparibhogena uppannataṇhāyuttasomanassavedanāsaṅkhātarūparasādīnaṃ
tika-s0404t0:44_8: cittasantānassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato vuttaṃ “tesaṃ pubbe uppannapubbabhāvena vatthumatte
tika-s0404t0:44_9: cittasantāne kate”ti. Tattha pubbeti pure, sarāgakāleti vuttaṃ hoti. Tālāvatthukatāti
tika-s0404t0:44_10: vuccantīti tālavatthu viya attano vatthussa katattā rūparasādayo “tālāvatthukatā”ti
tika-s0404t0:44_11: vuccanti. Etena pahīnakilesānaṃ puna uppattiyā abhāvo dassito.
tika-s0404t0:45_0: Aviruḷhidhammattāti aviruḷhisabhāvatāya. Matthakacchinno tālo pattaphalādīnaṃ avatthubhūto
tika-s0404t0:45_1: tālāvatthūti āha “matthakacchinnatālo viya katā”ti. Etena “tālāvatthu viya katāti
tika-s0404t0:45_2: tālāvatthukatā”ti ayaṃ viggaho dassito. Ettha pana “avatthubhūto tālo viya katāti
tika-s0404t0:45_3: avatthutālakatā”ti vattabbe visesanassa paranipātaṃ katvā “tālāvatthukatā”ti vuttanti
tika-s0404t0:45_4: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Iminā panatthena idaṃ dasseti – rūparasādivacanena vipākadhammadhammā
tika-s0404t0:45_5: hutvā pubbe uppannakusalākusalā dhammā gahitā, te uppannāpi matthakasadisānaṃ taṇhāvijjānaṃ
tika-s0404t0:45_6: maggasatthena chinnattā āyatiṃ tālapattasadise vipākakkhandhe nibbattetuṃ asamatthā
tika-s0404t0:45_7: jātā, tasmā tālāvatthu viya katāti tālāvatthukatā rūparasādayoti. Imasmiṃ atthe “abhinandantāna”nti
tika-s0404t0:45_8: iminā padena kusalasomanassampi saṅgahitanti vadanti. Anabhāvaṃ katāti ettha anu-saddo
tika-s0404t0:45_9: pacchāsaddena samānatthoti āha “yathā nesaṃ pacchābhāvo na hotī”tiādi.
tika-s0404t0:46_0: Yañca kho tvaṃ sandhāya vadesi, so pariyāyo na hotīti yaṃ vandanādisāmaggirasābhāvasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0404t0:46_1: kāraṇaṃ arasarūpatāya vadesi, taṃ kāraṇaṃ na hoti, na vijjatīti attho. Nanu cāyaṃ
tika-s0404t0:46_3: gotamo”ti āha, “so pariyāyo natthī”ti vutte vandanādīni bhagavā karotīti āpajjatīti
tika-s0404t0:47_0: Sabbapariyāyesūti sabbavāresu. Sandhāyabhāsitamattanti yaṃ sandhāya brāhmaṇo “nibbhogo
tika-s0404t0:47_1: bhavaṃ gotamo”tiādimāha. Bhagavā ca yaṃ sandhāya nibbhogatādiṃ attani anujānāti,
tika-s0404t0:47_2: taṃ sandhāyabhāsitamattaṃ. Chandarāgaparibhogoti chandarāgavasena paribhogo. Aparaṃ
tika-s0404t0:48_0: Kulasamudācārakammanti kulācārasaṅkhātaṃ kammaṃ, kulacārittanti attho. Akiriyanti
tika-s0404t0:48_2: pārisesañāyato vuttāvasesā akusaladhammā gahetabbāti āha “ṭhapetvā te dhamme”tiādi,
tika-s0404t0:48_3: te yathāvuttakāyaduccaritādike akusaladhamme ṭhapetvāti attho. Anekavihitāti anekappakārā.
tika-s0404t0:49_0: Ayaṃ lokatantīti ayaṃ vuḍḍhānaṃ abhivādanādikiriyalakkhaṇā lokappaveṇī. Anāgāmibrahmānaṃ
tika-s0404t0:49_1: alaṅkārādīsu anāgāmibhikkhūnañca cīvarādīsu nikantivasena rāguppatti hotīti anāgāmimaggena
tika-s0404t0:49_4: veditabbo. Koṭṭhāsavacano hettha guṇa-saddo “vayoguṇā anupubbaṃ jahantī”tiādīsu viya.
tika-s0404t0:50_0: Jigucchati maññeti ahamabhijāto rūpavā paññavā kathaṃ nāma aññesaṃ abhivādanādiṃ
tika-s0404t0:50_1: kareyyanti jigucchati viya, jigucchatīti vā sallakkhemi. Akusaladhamme jigucchamāno
tika-s0404t0:50_2: tesaṃ samaṅgibhāvampi jigucchatīti vuttaṃ “akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ samāpattiyā jigucchatī”ti.
tika-s0404t0:50_3: Samāpattīti etasseva vevacanaṃ samāpajjanā samaṅgibhāvoti. Maṇḍanajātikoti maṇḍanakasabhāvo,
tika-s0404t0:51_0: Lokajeṭṭhakakammanti lokajeṭṭhakānaṃ kattabbakammaṃ, loke vā seṭṭhasammataṃ kammaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:51_1: Tatrāti tesu dvīsupi atthavikappesu. Padābhihito attho padattho, byañjanatthoti vuttaṃ
tika-s0404t0:51_2: hoti. Vinayaṃ vā arahatīti ettha vinayanaṃ vinayo, niggaṇhananti attho. Tenāha “niggahaṃ
tika-s0404t0:51_3: arahatīti vuttaṃ hotī”ti. Nanu ca paṭhamaṃ vuttesu dvīsupi atthavikappesu sakatthe
tika-s0404t0:51_4: arahatthe ca taddhitapaccayo saddalakkhaṇato dissati, na pana “vinayāya dhammaṃ desetī”ti
tika-s0404t0:51_5: imasmiṃ atthe. Tasmā kathamettha taddhitapaccayoti āha “vicitrā hi taddhitavuttī”ti.
tika-s0404t0:51_6: Vicitratā cettha lokappamāṇato veditabbā. Tathā hi yasmiṃ yasmiṃ atthe taddhitappayogo
tika-s0404t0:51_7: lokassa, tattha tattha taddhitavutti lokato siddhāti vicitrā taddhitavutti, tasmā
tika-s0404t0:51_8: yathā “mā saddamakāsī”ti vadanto “māsaddiko”ti vuccati, evaṃ vinayāya dhammaṃ desetīti
tika-s0404t0:52_0: Kapaṇapurisoti guṇavirahitatāya dīnamanusso. Byañjanāni avicāretvāti tissadattādisaddesu
tika-s0404t0:52_1: viya “imasmiṃ atthe ayaṃ nāma paccayo”ti evaṃ byañjanavicāraṃ akatvā, anipphannapāṭipadikavasenāti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0404t0:53_1: abhāvato paṭisandhiyevettha gabbhasampattīti veditabbāti vuttamevatthaṃ vivaritvā
tika-s0404t0:53_3: Mātukucchismiṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇe dosaṃ dassentoti mātito aparisuddhabhāvaṃ dassento,
tika-s0404t0:53_4: akkositukāmassa dāsiyā puttoti dāsikucchimhi nibbattabhāve dosaṃ dassetvā akkosanaṃ
tika-s0404t0:53_5: viya bhagavato mātukucchismiṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇe dosaṃ dassetvā akkosantopi evamāhāti
tika-s0404t0:53_6: adhippāyo. Gabbhatoti devalokappaṭisandhito. Tenevāha “abhabbo devalokūpapattiṃ pāpuṇitunti
tika-s0404t0:53_7: adhippāyo”ti. “Hīno vā gabbho assāti apagabbho”ti imassa viggahassa ekena pariyāyena
tika-s0404t0:53_9: Iti-saddo hetuattho. Yasmā āyatimpi hīnagabbhapaṭilābhabhāgī, tasmā hīno vā gabbho
tika-s0404t0:53_10: assāti apagabbhoti adhippāyo. Puna tasseva viggahassa “kodhavasena…pe… dassento”ti
tika-s0404t0:53_11: heṭṭhā vuttanayassa anurūpaṃ katvā adhippāyaṃ dassento āha “hīno vāssa mātukucchismiṃ
tika-s0404t0:53_12: gabbhavāso ahosīti adhippāyo”ti. Gabbha-saddo atthi mātukucchipariyāyo “gabbhe vasati
tika-s0404t0:53_13: māṇavo”tiādīsu viya. Atthi mātukucchismiṃ nibbattasattapariyāyo “antamaso gabbhapātanaṃ
tika-s0404t0:53_14: upādāyā”tiādīsu viya. Tattha mātukucchipariyāyaṃ gahetvā atthaṃ dassento āha “anāgate
tika-s0404t0:53_15: gabbhaseyyā”ti. Gabbhe seyyā gabbhaseyyā. Anuttarena maggenāti aggamaggena. Kammakilesānaṃ
tika-s0404t0:53_16: maggena vihatattā āha “vihatakāraṇattā”ti. Itarā tissopīti aṇḍajasaṃsedajaopapātikā.
tika-s0404t0:53_17: Ettha ca yadipi “apagabbho”ti imassa anurūpato gabbhaseyyā eva vattabbā, pasaṅgato
tika-s0404t0:53_18: pana labbhamānaṃ sabbampi vattuṃ vaṭṭatīti punabbhavābhinibbattipi vuttāti veditabbā.
tika-s0404t0:54_0: Idāni sattapariyāyassa gabbha-saddassa vasena viggahanānattaṃ dassento āha “apicā”tiādi.
tika-s0404t0:54_1: Imasmiṃ pana vikappe gabbhaseyyā punabbhavābhinibbattīti ubhayampi gabbhaseyyavaseneva
tika-s0404t0:54_2: vuttantipi vadanti. Nanu ca “āyatiṃ gabbhaseyyā pahīnā”ti vuttattā gabbhassa seyyā
tika-s0404t0:54_3: eva pahīnā, na pana gabbhoti āpajjatīti āha “yathā cā”tiādi. Atha “abhinibbattī”ti
tika-s0404t0:54_4: ettakameva avatvā punabbhavaggahaṇaṃ kimatthanti āha “abhinibbatti ca nāmā”tiādi.
tika-s0404t0:54_5: Apunabbhavabhūtāti khaṇe khaṇe uppajjamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ abhinibbatti.
tika-s0404t0:55_0: Dhammadhātunti ettha dhamme anavasese dhāreti yāthāvato upadhāretīti dhammadhātu,
tika-s0404t0:55_1: dhammānaṃ yathāsabhāvato avabujjhanasabhāvo, sabbaññutaññāṇassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Paṭivijjhitvāti
tika-s0404t0:55_2: sacchikatvā, paṭilabhitvāti attho, paṭilābhahetūti vuttaṃ hoti. Desanāvilāsappatto
tika-s0404t0:55_3: hotīti rucivasena parivattetvā dassetuṃ samatthatā desanāvilāso, taṃ patto adhigatoti
tika-s0404t0:55_4: attho. Karuṇāvipphāranti sabbasattesu mahākaruṇāya pharaṇaṃ. Tādilakkhaṇameva puna
tika-s0404t0:55_5: upamāya vibhāvetvā dassento āha “pathavīsamacittata”nti. Yathā pathavī suciasucinikkhepacchedanabhedanādīsu
tika-s0404t0:55_6: na vikampati, anurodhavirodhaṃ na pāpuṇāti, evaṃ iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu lābhālābhādīsu anurodhavirodhappahānato
tika-s0404t0:55_7: avikampitacittatāya pathavīsamacittatanti attho. Akuppadhammatanti ettha akuppadhammo
tika-s0404t0:55_8: nāma phalasamāpattīti keci vadanti. “Paresu pana akkosantesupi attano pathavīsamacittatāya
tika-s0404t0:55_9: akuppanasabhāvatanti evamettha attho gahetabbo”ti amhākaṃ khanti. Jarāya anusaṭanti
tika-s0404t0:55_10: jarāya paliveṭhitaṃ. Brāhmaṇassa vuddhatāya āsannavuttimaraṇanti sambhāvanavasena
tika-s0404t0:55_11: “ajja maritvā”tiādi vuttaṃ. “Mahantena kho pana ussāhenā”ti sādhu kho pana tathārūpānaṃ
tika-s0404t0:55_12: arahataṃ dassanaṃ hotī”ti evaṃ sañjātamahussāhena. Appaṭisamaṃ purejātabhāvanti anaññasādhāraṇaṃ
tika-s0404t0:55_13: purejātabhāvaṃ. Natthi etassa paṭisamoti appaṭisamo, purejātabhāvo.
tika-s0404t0:56: Pakkhe vidhunantāti patte cālentā. Nikkhamantānanti niddhāraṇe sāmivacanaṃ, nikkhantesūti attho.
tika-s0404t0:57_0: So jeṭṭho iti assa vacanīyoti yo paṭhamataraṃ aṇḍakosato nikkhanto kukkuṭapotako,
tika-s0404t0:57_1: so jeṭṭhoti vacanīyo assa, bhaveyyāti attho. Sampaṭipādentoti saṃsandento. Tibhūmapariyāpannāpi
tika-s0404t0:57_2: sattā avijjākosassa anto paviṭṭhā tattha tattha appahīnāya avijjāya veṭhitattāti
tika-s0404t0:57_3: āha “avijjākosassa anto paviṭṭhesu sattesū”ti aṇḍakosanti bījakapālaṃ. Lokasannivāseti
tika-s0404t0:57_4: lokoyeva saṅgamma samāgamma nivāsanaṭṭhena lokasannivāso, sattanikāyo. Sammāsambodhinti
tika-s0404t0:57_5: ettha sammāti aviparītattho, saṃ-saddo sāmanti imamatthaṃ dīpeti. Tasmā sammā aviparītenākārena
tika-s0404t0:57_6: sayameva cattāri saccāni bujjhati paṭivijjhatīti sammāsambodhīti maggo vuccati. Tenāha
tika-s0404t0:57_7: “sammā sāmañca bodhi”nti, sammā sayameva ca bujjhanakanti attho. Sammāti vā pasatthavacano,
tika-s0404t0:57_8: saṃ-saddo sundaravacanoti āha “atha vā pasatthaṃ sundarañca bodhi”nti.
tika-s0404t0:58_0: Asabbaguṇadāyakattāti sabbaguṇānaṃ adāyakattā. Sabbaguṇe na dadātīti hi asabbaguṇadāyako,
tika-s0404t0:58_1: asamatthasamāsoyaṃ gamakattā yathā “asūriyapassāni mukhānī”ti. Tisso vijjāti upanissayavato
tika-s0404t0:58_2: saheva arahattaphalena tisso vijjā deti. Nanu cettha tīsu vijjāsu āsavakkhayañāṇassa
tika-s0404t0:58_3: maggapariyāpannattā kathametaṃ yujjati “maggo tisso vijjā detī”ti? Nāyaṃ doso. Satipi
tika-s0404t0:58_4: āsavakkhayañāṇassa maggapariyāpannabhāve aṭṭhaṅgike magge sati maggañāṇena saddhiṃ
tika-s0404t0:58_5: tisso vijjā paripuṇṇā hontīti “maggo tisso vijjā detī”ti vuccati. Cha abhiññāti etthāpi
tika-s0404t0:58_6: eseva nayo. Sāvakapāramiñāṇanti aggasāvakehi paṭilabhitabbameva lokiyalokuttarañāṇaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:58_7: Paccekabodhiñāṇanti etthāpi imināva nayena attho veditabbo. Abbhaññāsinti jāniṃ.
tika-s0404t0:58_8: Jānanañca na anussavādivasenāti āha “paṭivijjhi”nti, paccakkhamakāsinti attho. Paṭivedhopi
tika-s0404t0:58_9: na dūre ṭhitassa lakkhaṇappaṭivedho viyāti āha “pattomhī”ti, pāpuṇinti attho. Pāpuṇanañca
tika-s0404t0:58_10: na sayaṃ gantvāti āha “adhigatomhī”ti, santāne uppādanavasena paṭilabhinti attho.
tika-s0404t0:59_0: Opammasampaṭipādananti opammatthassa upameyyena sammadeva paṭipādanaṃ. Atthenāti
tika-s0404t0:59_1: upameyyatthena. Yathā kukkuṭiyā aṇḍesu tividhakiriyākaraṇaṃ kukkuṭacchāpakānaṃ aṇḍakosato
tika-s0404t0:59_2: nikkhamanassa mūlakāraṇaṃ, evaṃ bodhisattabhūtassa bhagavato tividhānupassanākaraṇaṃ
tika-s0404t0:59_3: avijjaṇḍakosato nikkhamanassa mūlakāraṇanti āha “yathā hi tassā kukkuṭiyā…pe… tividhānupassanākaraṇa”nti.
tika-s0404t0:59_5: buddhaguṇānaṃ, buddhaguṇāti ca atthato buddhoyeva “tathāgatassa kho etaṃ, vāseṭṭha,
tika-s0404t0:59_6: adhivacanaṃ dhammakāyo itipī”ti vacanato. Avijjaṇḍakosassa tanubhāvoti balavavipassanāvasena
tika-s0404t0:59_7: avijjaṇḍakosassa tanubhāvo, paṭicchādanasāmaññena ca avijjāya aṇḍakosasadisatā. Mudubhūtassapi
tika-s0404t0:59_9: ettha pariggayhamānesu saṅkhāresu vipassanāñāṇassa samādhindriyavasena sukhānuppaveso
tika-s0404t0:59_10: tikkhatā, anupavisitvāpi satindriyavasena anatikkamanato akuṇṭhatā kharabhāvo. Tikkhopi
tika-s0404t0:59_11: hi ekacco saro lakkhaṃ patvā kuṇṭho hoti, na tathā idaṃ. Satipi kharabhāve sukhumappavattivasena
tika-s0404t0:59_13: antarā anosakkitvā kilesapaccatthikānaṃ suṭṭhu abhibhavanato vīriyindriyavasena sūrabhāvo
tika-s0404t0:59_14: veditabbo. Evamimehi pakārehi saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇameva gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vipassanāñāṇassa
tika-s0404t0:59_15: pariṇāmakāloti vipassanāya vuṭṭhānagāminibhāvāpatti. Tadā ca sā maggañāṇagabbhaṃ
tika-s0404t0:59_16: dhārentī viya hotīti āha “gabbhaggahaṇakālo”ti. Gabbhaṃ gaṇhāpetvāti saṅkhārupekkhāya
tika-s0404t0:59_18: Abhiññāpakkheti lokiyābhiññāpakkhe. Lokuttarābhiññā hi avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padālitā. Potthakesu
tika-s0404t0:59_19: pana katthaci “chābhiññāpakkhe”ti likhanti, so apāṭhoti veditabbo.
tika-s0404t0:60: Jeṭṭho seṭṭhoti vuddhatamattā jeṭṭho, sabbaguṇehi uttamattā pasatthatamoti seṭṭho.
tika-s0404t0:61_0: Idāni “āraddhaṃ kho pana me, brāhmaṇa, vīriya”ntiādikāya desanāya anusandhiṃ dassento
tika-s0404t0:61_1: āha “evaṃ bhagavā”tiādi. Tattha pubbabhāgato pabhutīti bhāvanāya pubbabhāgīyavīriyārambhādito
tika-s0404t0:61_2: paṭṭhāya. Muṭṭhassatināti vinaṭṭhassatinā, sativirahitenāti attho. Sāraddhakāyenāti
tika-s0404t0:61_3: sadarathakāyena. Bodhimaṇḍeti bodhisaṅkhātassa ñāṇassa maṇḍabhāvappatte ṭhāne. Bodhīti
tika-s0404t0:61_4: hi paññā vuccati. Sā ettha maṇḍā pasannā jātāti so padeso “bodhimaṇḍo”ti paññāto.
tika-s0404t0:61_5: Paggahitanti ārambhaṃ sithilaṃ akatvā daḷhaparakkamasaṅkhātussahanabhāvena gahitaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:61_6: Tenāha “asithilappavattita”nti. Asallīnanti asaṅkucitaṃ kosajjavasena saṅkocaṃ anāpannaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:61_7: Upaṭṭhitāti ogāhanasaṅkhātena apilāpanabhāvena ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā ṭhitā. Tenāha
tika-s0404t0:61_9: asammuṭṭhā. Kiñcāpi cittappassaddhivasena cittameva passaddhaṃ, kāyappassaddhivaseneva
tika-s0404t0:61_10: ca kāyo passaddho hoti, tathāpi yasmā kāyappassaddhi uppajjamānā cittappassaddhiyā
tika-s0404t0:61_11: saheva uppajjati, na vinā, tasmā vuttaṃ “kāyacittappassaddhivasenā”ti. Kāyappassaddhiyā
tika-s0404t0:61_12: ubhayesampi kāyānaṃ passambhanāvahattā vuttaṃ “rūpakāyopi passaddhoyeva hotī”ti.
tika-s0404t0:62_0: So ca khoti so ca kho kāyo. Vigatadarathoti vigatakilesadaratho. Nāmakāye hi vigatadarathe
tika-s0404t0:62_1: rūpakāyopi vūpasantadarathapariḷāho hoti. Sammā āhitanti nānārammaṇesu vidhāvanasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0404t0:62_2: vikkhepaṃ vicchinditvā ekasmiṃyeva ārammaṇe avikkhittabhāvāpādanena sammadeva āhitaṃ
tika-s0404t0:62_3: ṭhapitaṃ. Tenāha “suṭṭhu ṭhapita”ntiādi. Cittassa anekaggabhāvo vikkhepavasena cañcalatā,
tika-s0404t0:62_4: sā sati ekaggatāya na hotīti āha “ekaggaṃ acalaṃ nipphandana”nti. Ettāvatāti “āraddhaṃ
tika-s0404t0:62_5: kho panā”tiādinā vīriyasatipassaddhisamādhīnaṃ kiccasiddhidassanena. Nanu ca saddhāpaññānampi
tika-s0404t0:62_6: kiccasiddhi jhānassa pubbabhāgappaṭipadāya icchitabbāti? Saccaṃ, sā pana nānantarikabhāvena
tika-s0404t0:62_7: avuttasiddhāti na gahitā. Asati hi saddhāya vīriyārambhādīnaṃ asambhavoyeva, paññāpariggahe
tika-s0404t0:62_8: ca nesaṃ asati ñāyārambhādibhāvo na siyā, tathā asallīnāsammosatādayo vīriyādīnanti
tika-s0404t0:62_10: vā samādhikiccaṃ adhikaṃ icchitabbanti dassetuṃ samādhipariyosānāva jhānassa pubbabhāgappaṭipadā
tika-s0404t0:63_0: Atītabhave khandhā tappaṭibaddhāni nāmagottāni ca sabbaṃ pubbenivāsaṃtveva gahitanti
tika-s0404t0:63_1: āha “kiṃ viditaṃ karoti? Pubbenivāsa”nti. Moho paṭicchādakaṭṭhena tamo viya tamoti
tika-s0404t0:63_2: āha “sveva moho”ti. Obhāsakaraṇaṭṭhenāti kātabbato karaṇaṃ. Obhāsova karaṇaṃ obhāsakaraṇaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:63_3: Attano paccayehi obhāsabhāvena nibbattetabbaṭṭhenāti attho. Sesaṃ pasaṃsāvacananti
tika-s0404t0:63_4: paṭipakkhavidhamanapavattivisesānaṃ bodhanato vuttaṃ. Avijjā vihatāti etena vijānanaṭṭhena
tika-s0404t0:63_5: vijjāti ayampi attho dīpitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Kasmā? Yasmā vijjā uppannā”ti etena vijjāpaṭipakkhā
tika-s0404t0:63_6: avijjā. Paṭipakkhatā cassā pahātabbabhāvena vijjāya ca pahāyakabhāvenāti dasseti.
tika-s0404t0:63_7: Esa nayo itarasmimpi padadvayeti iminā “tamo vihato vinaṭṭho. Kasmā? Yasmā āloko
tika-s0404t0:63_8: uppanno”ti imamatthaṃ atidisati. Kilesānaṃ ātāpanaparitāpanaṭṭhena vīriyaṃ ātāpoti
tika-s0404t0:63_9: āha “vīriyātāpena ātāpino”ti, vīriyavatoti attho. Pesitattassāti yathādhippetatthasiddhiṃ
tika-s0404t0:63_10: pati vissaṭṭhacittassa. Yathā appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharatoti aññassapi
tika-s0404t0:64: Paccavekkhaṇañāṇapariggahitanti na paṭhamadutiyañāṇadvayādhigamaṃ viya kevalanti adhippāyo. Dassentoti nigamanavasena dassento. Sarūpato hi pubbe dassitamevāti.
tika-s0404t0:65_0: Tikkhattuṃ jātoti iminā pana idaṃ dasseti – “ahaṃ, brāhmaṇa, paṭhamavijjāya jātoyeva
tika-s0404t0:65_1: purejātassa sahajātassa vā abhāvato sabbesaṃ vuddho mahallako, kimaṅgaṃ pana tīhi
tika-s0404t0:65_2: vijjāhi tikkhattuṃ jāto”ti. Pubbenivāsañāṇena atītaṃsañāṇanti atītārammaṇasabhāgatāya
tika-s0404t0:65_3: tabbhāvibhāvato ca pubbenivāsañāṇena atītaṃsañāṇaṃ pakāsetvāti yojetabbaṃ. Tattha
tika-s0404t0:65_6: ca dibbacakkhuvaseneva ijjhanato dibbacakkhuno paribhaṇḍañāṇattā dibbacakkhumhiyeva
tika-s0404t0:65_8: Tattha dibbacakkhunāti saparibhaṇḍena dibbacakkhuñāṇena. Paccuppannaṃso ca anāgataṃso
tika-s0404t0:65_9: ca paccuppannānāgataṃsaṃ, tattha ñāṇaṃ paccuppannānāgataṃsañāṇaṃ. Āsavakkhayañāṇādhigameneva
tika-s0404t0:66: Pītivipphāraparipuṇṇagattacittoti pītipharaṇena paripuṇṇakāyacitto. Aññāṇanti aññāṇassāti attho. Dhi-saddayogato hi sāmiatthe etaṃ upayogavacanaṃ. Sesamettha suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0404t0:69_0: 12. Dutiye santhāgāraṃ nāma ekā mahāsālāva. Uyyogakālādīsu hi rājāno tattha ṭhatvā
tika-s0404t0:69_1: “ettakā purato gacchantu, ettakā pacchā”tiādinā tattha nisīditvā santhaṃ karonti,
tika-s0404t0:69_2: mariyādaṃ bandhanti, tasmā taṃ ṭhānaṃ “santhāgāra”nti vuccati. Uyyogaṭṭhānato ca
tika-s0404t0:69_3: āgantvā yāva gehe gomayaparibhaṇḍādivasena paṭijagganaṃ karonti, tāva ekaṃ dve divase
tika-s0404t0:69_4: te rājāno tattha santhambhantītipi santhāgāraṃ. Tesaṃ rājūnaṃ saha atthānusāsanaṃ
tika-s0404t0:69_5: agārantipi santhāgāraṃ. Gaṇarājāno hi te, tasmā uppannaṃ kiccaṃ ekassa vasena na
tika-s0404t0:69_6: sijjhati, sabbesaṃ chando laddhuṃ vaṭṭati, tasmā sabbe tattha sannipatitvā anusāsanti.
tika-s0404t0:69_7: Tena vuttaṃ “saha atthānusāsanaṃ agāra”nti. Yasmā vā tattha sannipatitvā “imasmiṃ
tika-s0404t0:69_8: kāle kasituṃ vaṭṭati, imasmiṃ kāle vapitu”ntiādinā nayena gharāvāsakiccāni sammantayanti,
tika-s0404t0:70_0: Puttadāradhanādiupakaraṇapariccāgo pāramiyo. Attano aṅgapariccāgo upapāramiyo. Attanova
tika-s0404t0:70_1: jīvitapariccāgo paramatthapāramiyo. Ñātīnaṃ atthacariyā ñātatthacariyā. Lokassa atthacariyā
tika-s0404t0:70_6: pañcamahāpariccāgānaṃ visuṃ gahaṇaṃ, tatoyeva ca aṅgapariccāgato visuṃ nayanapariccāgaggahaṇaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:71: Sattasu anupassanāsūti aniccānupassanā, dukkhānupassanā, anattānupassanā, nibbidānupassanā, virāgānupassanā, nirodhānupassanā, paṭinissaggānupassanāti imāsu sattasu anupassanāsu.
tika-s0404t0:72: Anuviccakāranti aveccakaraṇaṃ. Dvīhi kāraṇehi aniyyānikasāsane ṭhitā attano sāvakattaṃ upagate paggaṇhanti, tāni dassetuṃ “kasmā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:73_0: Anupubbiṃ kathanti anupubbaṃ kathetabbakathaṃ. Kā pana sāti? Dānādikathā. Tattha
tika-s0404t0:73_1: dānakathā tāva pacurajanesupi pavattiyā sabbasattasādhāraṇattā sukarattā sīle patiṭṭhānassa
tika-s0404t0:73_2: upāyabhāvato ca ādito kathitā. Pariccāgasīlo hi puggalo pariggahavatthūsu nissaṅgabhāvato
tika-s0404t0:73_3: sukheneva sīlāni samādiyati, tattha ca suppatiṭṭhito hoti. Sīlena dāyakappaṭiggāhakavisuddhito
tika-s0404t0:73_4: parānuggahaṃ vatvā parapīḷānivattivacanato kiriyādhammaṃ vatvā akiriyādhammavacanato,
tika-s0404t0:73_5: bhogasampattihetuṃ vatvā bhavasampattihetuvacanato ca dānakathānantaraṃ sīlakathā
tika-s0404t0:73_6: kathitā. “Tañca sīlaṃ vaṭṭanissitaṃ, ayaṃ bhavasampatti tassa phala”nti dassanatthaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:73_9: laddhabbā”ti dassanatthaṃ tadanantaraṃ saggakathā. “Svāyaṃ saggo rāgādīhi upakkiliṭṭho,
tika-s0404t0:73_10: sabbathānupakkiliṭṭho ariyamaggo”ti dassanatthaṃ saggānantaraṃ maggo, maggañca kathentena
tika-s0404t0:73_11: tadadhigamūpāyasandassanatthaṃ saggapariyāpannāpi pageva itare sabbepi kāmā nāma
tika-s0404t0:73_12: bahvādīnavā aniccā addhuvā vipariṇāmadhammāti kāmānaṃ ādīnavo. “Hīnā gammā pothujjanikā
tika-s0404t0:73_13: anariyā anatthasaṃhitā”ti tesaṃ okāro lāmakabhāvo. Sabbepi bhavā kilesānaṃ vatthubhūtāti
tika-s0404t0:73_14: tattha saṃkileso. Sabbaso saṃkilesavippamuttaṃ nibbānanti nekkhamme ānisaṃso ca kathetabboti
tika-s0404t0:73_15: ayamattho maggantīti ettha iti-saddena ādi-atthena dīpitoti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:74_0: Sukhānaṃ nidānanti diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ samparāyikānaṃ nibbānupasaṃhitānañcāti sabbesampi
tika-s0404t0:74_1: sukhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ. Yañhi kiñci loke bhogasukhaṃ nāma, taṃ sabbaṃ dānādhīnanti pākaṭoyamattho.
tika-s0404t0:74_2: Yaṃ pana jhānavipassanāmaggaphalanibbānappaṭisaṃyuttaṃ sukhaṃ, tassapi dānaṃ upanissayapaccayo
tika-s0404t0:74_3: hotiyeva. Sampattīnaṃ mūlanti yā imā loke padesarajjasirissariyasattaratanasamujjalacakkavattisampadāti
tika-s0404t0:74_4: evaṃpabhedā mānusikā sampattiyo, yā ca cātumahārājikādigatā dibbasampattiyo, yā vā
tika-s0404t0:74_5: panaññāpi sampattiyo, tāsaṃ sabbāsaṃ idaṃ mūlakāraṇaṃ. Bhogānanti bhuñjitabbaṭṭhena
tika-s0404t0:74_6: “bhogo”ti laddhanāmānaṃ piyamanāpiyarūpādīnaṃ tannissayānaṃ vā upabhogasukhānaṃ patiṭṭhā
tika-s0404t0:74_7: niccalādhiṭṭhānatāya. Visamagatassāti byasanappattassa. Tāṇanti rakkhā, tato paripālanato.
tika-s0404t0:74_8: Leṇanti byasanehi paripātiyamānassa olīyanappadeso. Gatīti gantabbaṭṭhānaṃ. Parāyaṇanti
tika-s0404t0:74_9: paṭisaraṇaṃ. Avassayoti vinipatituṃ adento nissayo. Ārammaṇanti olubbhārammaṇaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:75_1: mahagghaṃ hutvā sabbaso vinipatituṃ appadānaṭṭho dīpito hoti. Mahāpathavīsadisaṃ
tika-s0404t0:75_2: gatagataṭṭhāne patiṭṭhānassa labhāpanato. Yathā dubbalassa purisassa ālambanarajju
tika-s0404t0:75_3: uttiṭṭhato tiṭṭhato ca upatthambho, evaṃ dānaṃ sattānaṃ sampattibhave upapattiyā
tika-s0404t0:75_4: ṭhitiyā ca paccayoti āha “ālambanaṭṭhena ālambanarajjusadisa”nti. Dukkhanittharaṇaṭṭhenāti
tika-s0404t0:75_8: anupakkiliṭṭhatāya. Tesanti maccheramalādīnaṃ. Tesaṃ eva durāsadaṭṭhena. Asantāsanaṭṭhenāti
tika-s0404t0:75_9: santāsahetuabhāvena. Yo hi dāyako dānapati, so sampatipi na kutoci santasati, pageva
tika-s0404t0:75_10: āyatiṃ. Balavantaṭṭhenāti mahābalavatāya. Dāyako hi dānapati sampati pakkhabalena
tika-s0404t0:75_11: balavā hoti, āyatiṃ pana kāyabalādīhipi. Abhimaṅgalasammataṭṭhenāti “vaḍḍhikāraṇa”nti
tika-s0404t0:76_0: Idāni mahābodhicariyabhāvenapi dānaguṇaṃ dassetuṃ “dānaṃ nāmeta”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha
tika-s0404t0:76_1: attānaṃ niyyātentenāti etena “dānaphalaṃ sammadeva passantā mahāpurisā attano jīvitampi
tika-s0404t0:76_2: pariccajanti, tasmā ko nāma viññujātiko bāhire vatthusmiṃ pageva saṅgaṃ kareyyā”ti
tika-s0404t0:76_3: ovādaṃ deti. Idāni yā lokiyā lokuttarā ca ukkaṃsagatā sampattiyo, tā sabbā dānatoyeva
tika-s0404t0:76_5: eva, cakkavattisampatti pana attahitāya parahitāya cāti dassetuṃ sā tāsaṃ parato
tika-s0404t0:76_6: cakkavattisampatti vuttā. Etā lokiyā, imā pana lokuttarāti dassetuṃ “sāvakapāramiñāṇa”ntiādi
tika-s0404t0:76_7: vuttaṃ. Tāsupi ukkaṭṭhukkaṭṭhatarukkaṭṭhatamataṃ dassetuṃ kamena ñāṇattayaṃ vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:76_8: Tesaṃ pana dānassa paccayabhāvo heṭṭhā vuttoyeva. Eteneva tassa brahmasampattiyāpi
tika-s0404t0:77_0: Dānañca nāma dakkhiṇeyyesu hitajjhāsayena pūjanajjhāsayena vā attano santakassa paresaṃ
tika-s0404t0:77_1: pariccajanaṃ, tasmā dāyako purisapuggalo pare hanti, paresaṃ vā santakaṃ haratīti
tika-s0404t0:77_2: aṭṭhānametanti āha “dānaṃ dento sīlaṃ samādātuṃ sakkotī”ti. Sīlālaṅkārasadiso alaṅkāro
tika-s0404t0:77_3: natthi sobhāvisesāvahattā sīlassa. Sīlapupphasadisaṃ pupphaṃ natthīti etthāpi eseva
tika-s0404t0:77_4: nayo. Sīlagandhasadiso gandho natthīti ettha “candanaṃ tagaraṃ vāpī”tiādikā gāthā
tika-s0404t0:77_5: – “gandho isīnaṃ ciradikkhitānaṃ, kāyā cuto gacchati mālutenā”tiādikā jātakagāthāyo
tika-s0404t0:77_6: ca āharitvā vattabbā. Sīlañhi sattānaṃ ābharaṇañceva alaṅkāro ca gandhavilepanañca
tika-s0404t0:78: Ayaṃ saggo labbhatīti idaṃ majjhimehi āraddhaṃ sīlaṃ sandhāyāha. Tenevāha sakko devarājā –
tika-s0404t0:81: Iṭṭhoti sukho. Kantoti kamanīyo. Manāpoti manavaḍḍhanako. Taṃ pana tassa iṭṭhādibhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “niccamettha kīḷā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:82_0: Dosoti aniccatādinā appassādādinā ca dūsitabhāvo, yato te viññūnaṃ cittaṃ nārādhenti.
tika-s0404t0:82_1: Atha vā ādīnaṃ vāti pavattatīti ādīnavo, paramakapaṇatā. Tathā ca kāmā yathātathaṃ
tika-s0404t0:82_2: paccavekkhantānaṃ paccupatiṭṭhanti. Lāmakabhāvoti aseṭṭhehi sevitabbo, seṭṭhehi na
tika-s0404t0:82_3: sevitabbo nihīnabhāvo. Saṃkilissananti vibādhakatā upatāpakatā ca.
tika-s0404t0:83_0: Nekkhamme ānisaṃsanti ettha “yattakā kāmesu ādīnavā, tappaṭipakkhato tattakā nekkhamme
tika-s0404t0:83_1: ānisaṃsā. Apica nekkhammaṃ nāmetaṃ asambādhaṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ, nikkhantaṃ kāmehi, nikkhantaṃ
tika-s0404t0:83_2: kāmasaññāya, nikkhantaṃ kāmavitakkehi, nikkhantaṃ kāmapariḷāhehi, nikkhantaṃ byāpādasaññāyā”tiādinā
tika-s0404t0:83_3: nayena nekkhamme ānisaṃse pakāsesi. Pabbajjāyaṃ jhānādīsu ca guṇe vibhāvesi vaṇṇesi.
tika-s0404t0:83_4: Kallacittanti kammaniyacittaṃ heṭṭhā pavattitadesanāya assaddhiyādīnaṃ cittadosānaṃ
tika-s0404t0:83_5: vigatattā upari desanāya bhājanabhāvūpagamena kammakkhamacittaṃ. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana
tika-s0404t0:83_6: yasmā assaddhiyādayo cittassa rogabhūtā, tadā te vigatā, tasmā āha “arogacitta”nti.
tika-s0404t0:83_8: uḷārapītipāmojjayogena udaggacittaṃ. Tattha saddhāsampattiyā pasannacittaṃ. Yadā
tika-s0404t0:83_9: bhagavā aññāsīti sambandho. Atha vā kallacittanti kāmacchandavigamena arogacittaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:83_10: Muducittanti byāpādavigamena mettāvasena akaṭhinacittaṃ. Vinīvaraṇacittanti uddhaccakukkuccavigamena
tika-s0404t0:83_11: avikkhepato tena apihitacittaṃ. Udaggacittanti thinamiddhavigamena sampaggahitavasena
tika-s0404t0:84_0: Seyyathāpītiādinā upamāvasena sīhassa kilesappahānaṃ ariyamagguppādanañca dasseti.
tika-s0404t0:84_1: Apagatakāḷakanti vigatakāḷakaṃ. Sammadevāti suṭṭhudeva. Rajananti nīlapītalohitādiraṅgajātaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:84_2: Paṭiggaṇheyyāti gaṇheyya, pabhassaraṃ bhaveyya. Tasmiṃyeva āsaneti tassaṃyeva nisajjāyaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:84_3: Etenassa lahuvipassakatā tikkhapaññatā sukhappaṭipadakhippābhiññatā ca dassitā hoti.
tika-s0404t0:84_6: vītamalaṃ. Tassa uppattiākāradassanatthanti kasmā vuttaṃ? Nanu maggañāṇaṃ asaṅkhatadhammārammaṇanti
tika-s0404t0:84_8: paṭivijjhantaṃ. Tenāha “kiccavasenā”ti. Tatridaṃ upamāsaṃsandanaṃ – vatthaṃ viya
tika-s0404t0:84_9: cittaṃ, vatthassa āgantukamalehi kiliṭṭhabhāvo viya cittassa rāgādimalehi saṃkiliṭṭhabhāvo,
tika-s0404t0:84_10: dhovanasilātalaṃ viya anupubbīkathā, udakaṃ viya saddhā, udakena temetvā ūsagomayachārikakhārehi
tika-s0404t0:84_11: kāḷake sammadditvā vatthassa dhovanappayogo viya saddhāsinehena temetvā temetvā satisamādhipaññāhi
tika-s0404t0:84_12: dose sithile katvā sutādividhinā cittassa sodhane vīriyārambho. Tena payogena vatthe
tika-s0404t0:84_13: kāḷakāpagamo viya vīriyārambhena kilesavikkhambhanaṃ, raṅgajātaṃ viya ariyamaggo,
tika-s0404t0:84_14: tena suddhavatthassa pabhassarabhāvo viya vikkhambhitakilesassa cittassa maggena pariyodapananti.
tika-s0404t0:85_0: “Diṭṭhadhammo”ti vatvā dassanaṃ nāma ñāṇadassanato aññampi atthīti tannivattanatthaṃ
tika-s0404t0:85_1: “pattadhammo”ti vuttaṃ. Patti nāma ñāṇasampattito aññāpi vijjatīti tato visesanatthaṃ
tika-s0404t0:85_2: “viditadhammo”ti vuttaṃ. Sā panesā viditadhammatā dhammesu ekadesenapi hotīti nippadesato
tika-s0404t0:85_4: dīpeti. Maggañāṇañhi ekābhisamayavasena pariññādikiccaṃ sādhentaṃ nippadesena catusaccadhammaṃ
tika-s0404t0:85_5: samantato ogāḷhaṃ nāma hoti. Tenāha “diṭṭho ariyasaccadhammo etenāti diṭṭhadhammo”ti.
tika-s0404t0:85_6: Tiṇṇā vicikicchāti sappaṭibhayakantārasadisā soḷasavatthukā aṭṭhavatthukā ca tiṇṇā
tika-s0404t0:85_7: nittiṇṇā vicikicchā. Vigatā kathaṃkathāti pavattiādīsu “evaṃ nu kho, na nu kho”ti
tika-s0404t0:85_8: evaṃ pavattikā vigatā samucchinnā kathaṃkathā. Sārajjakarānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ pahīnattā
tika-s0404t0:85_9: tappaṭipakkhesu sīlādiguṇesu patiṭṭhitattā vesārajjaṃ visāradabhāvaṃ veyyattiyaṃ
tika-s0404t0:85_10: patto. Attanā eva paccakkhato diṭṭhattā na paraṃ pacceti, na cassa paro paccetabbo
tika-s0404t0:86_0: Uddisitvā katanti attānaṃ uddisitvā māraṇavasena kataṃ nibbattitaṃ maṃsaṃ. Paṭiccakammanti
tika-s0404t0:86_1: ettha kamma-saddo kammasādhano atītakāliko cāti āha “attānaṃ paṭiccakata”nti. Nimittakammassetaṃ
tika-s0404t0:86_2: adhivacanaṃ “paṭicca kammaṃ phusatī”tiādīsu viya. Nimittakammassāti nimittabhāvena
tika-s0404t0:86_3: laddhabbakammassa. Karaṇavasena paṭiccakammaṃ ettha atthīti maṃsaṃ paṭiccakammaṃ
tika-s0404t0:86_4: yathā buddhi buddhaṃ. Taṃ etassa atthīti buddho. Sesamettha uttānameva.
tika-s0404t0:89_0: 13-14. Tatiye sāṭheyyānīti saṭhattāni. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Tāni panassa sāṭheyyādīni
tika-s0404t0:89_2: yassa kismiñcideva ṭhāne ṭhātukāmassa sato yaṃ ṭhānaṃ manussānaṃ sappaṭibhayaṃ, purato
tika-s0404t0:89_3: gantvā tatheva sappaṭibhayaṭṭhāneva ṭhassāmīti na hoti, vañcanādhippāyabhāvato ṭhātukāmaṭṭhāneyeva
tika-s0404t0:89_4: nikhātatthambho viya cattāro pāde niccāletvā tiṭṭhati, ayaṃ saṭho nāma, imassa sāṭheyyassa
tika-s0404t0:89_5: pākaṭakaraṇaṃ. Tathā yassa kismiñcideva ṭhāne nivattitvā khandhagataṃ pātetukāmassa
tika-s0404t0:89_6: sato yaṃ ṭhānaṃ manussānaṃ sappaṭibhayaṃ, purato gantvā tatheva pātessāmīti na hoti,
tika-s0404t0:89_7: pātetukāmaṭṭhāneyeva nivattitvā pāteti, ayaṃ kūṭo nāma. Yassa kālena vāmato, kālena
tika-s0404t0:89_8: dakkhiṇato, kālena ujumaggeneva ca gantukāmassa sato yaṃ ṭhānaṃ manussānaṃ sappaṭibhayaṃ,
tika-s0404t0:89_9: purato gantvā tatheva evaṃ karissāmīti na hoti, yadicchakaṃ gantukāmaṭṭhāneyeva kālena
tika-s0404t0:89_10: vāmato, kālena dakkhiṇato, kālena ujumaggaṃ gacchati, tathā leṇḍaṃ vā passāvaṃ vā
tika-s0404t0:89_11: vissajjetukāmassa idaṃ ṭhānaṃ susammaṭṭhaṃ ākiṇṇamanussaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ. Imasmiṃ ṭhāne
tika-s0404t0:89_12: evarūpaṃ kātuṃ na yuttaṃ, purato gantvā paṭicchannaṭṭhāne karissāmīti na hoti, tattheva
tika-s0404t0:89_13: karoti, ayaṃ jimho nāma. Yassa pana kismiñci ṭhāne maggā ukkamma nivattitvā paṭimaggaṃ
tika-s0404t0:89_14: ārohitukāmassa sato yaṃ ṭhānaṃ manussānaṃ sappaṭibhayaṃ, purato gantvā tattheva evaṃ
tika-s0404t0:89_15: karissāmīti na hoti, paṭimaggaṃ ārohitukāmaṭṭhāneyeva maggā ukkamma nivattitvā paṭimaggaṃ
tika-s0404t0:89_16: ārohati, ayaṃ vaṅko nāma. Iti imaṃ catubbidhampi kiriyaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ “yāni
tika-s0404t0:89_17: kho panassa tāni sāṭheyyāni…pe… āvikattā hotī”ti. Catutthe natthi vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:92_0: 15-18. Pañcame yā kāci pariyatti vā sippaṃ vā yasmā asajjhāyantassa ananuyuñjantassa
tika-s0404t0:92_1: vinassati, nirantaraṃ vā na upaṭṭhāti, tasmā “asajjhāyamalā mantā”ti vuttaṃ. Yasmā
tika-s0404t0:92_2: pana gharāvāsaṃ vasantassa uṭṭhāyuṭṭhāya jiṇṇappaṭisaṅkharaṇādīni akarontassa gharaṃ
tika-s0404t0:92_3: nāma vinassati, tasmā “anuṭṭhānamalā gharā”ti vuttaṃ. Yasmā gihissa vā pabbajitassa
tika-s0404t0:92_4: vā kosajjavasena sarīrappajagganaṃ vā parikkhārappaṭijagganaṃ vā akarontassa kāyo
tika-s0404t0:92_5: dubbaṇṇo hoti, tasmā “malaṃ vaṇṇassa kosajja”nti vuttaṃ. Yasmā pana gāvo rakkhantassa
tika-s0404t0:92_6: pamādavasena niddāyantassa vā kīḷantassa vā tā gāvo atitthapakkhandanādīhi vā vāḷamigacorādiupaddavena
tika-s0404t0:92_7: vā paresaṃ sālikkhettādīni otaritvā khādanavasena vā vināsamāpajjanti, sayampi daṇḍaṃ
tika-s0404t0:92_8: vā paribhāsaṃ vā pāpuṇāti, pabbajitaṃ vā pana chadvārādīni arakkhantaṃ pamādavasena
tika-s0404t0:92_9: kilesā otaritvā sāsanā cāventi, tasmā “pamādo rakkhato mala”nti vuttaṃ. So hissa
tika-s0404t0:93_0: Duccaritanti aticāro. Aticāriniñhi itthiṃ sāmikopi gehā nīharati, mātāpitūnaṃ santikaṃ
tika-s0404t0:93_1: gatampi “tvaṃ kulassa aṅgārabhūtā, akkhīhipi na daṭṭhabbā”ti taṃ mātāpitaropi nīharanti,
tika-s0404t0:93_2: sā anāthā vicarantī mahādukkhaṃ pāpuṇāti. Tenassā duccaritaṃ “mala”nti vuttaṃ. Dadatoti
tika-s0404t0:93_3: dāyakassa. Yassa hi khettakasanakāle “imasmiṃ khette sampanne salākabhattādīni dassāmī”ti
tika-s0404t0:93_4: cintetvāpi nipphanne sasse maccheraṃ uppajjitvā cāgacittaṃ nivāreti, so maccheravasena
tika-s0404t0:93_5: cāgacitte aviruhante manussasampatti, dibbasampatti, nibbānasampattīti tisso sampattiyo
tika-s0404t0:93_6: na labhati. Tena vuttaṃ “maccheraṃ dadato mala”nti. Aññesupi evarūpesu eseva nayo.
tika-s0404t0:93_7: Pāpakā dhammāti akusalā dhammā. Te pana idhaloke paraloke ca malameva. Tatoti heṭṭhā
tika-s0404t0:96_0: 19. Navame asurāti devā viya na suranti na kīḷanti na virocantīti asurā. Surā nāma
tika-s0404t0:96_1: devā, tesaṃ paṭipakkhāti vā asurā, vepacittipahārādādayo. Tesaṃ bhavanaṃ sinerussa
tika-s0404t0:96_2: heṭṭhābhāge. Te tattha pavisantā nikkhamantā sinerupāde maṇḍapādīni nimminitvā kīḷantā
tika-s0404t0:96_3: abhiramanti. Sā tattha tesaṃ abhirati. Ime guṇe disvāti āha “ye disvā disvā asurā
tika-s0404t0:97_0: Yasmā lokiyā jambudīpo, himavā tattha patiṭṭhitasamuddadahapabbatā tappabhavā nadiyoti
tika-s0404t0:97_1: etesu yaṃ yaṃ na manussagocaraṃ, tattha sayaṃ sammūḷhā aññepi sammohayanti, tasmā
tika-s0404t0:97_2: tattha sammohavidhamanatthaṃ “ayaṃ tāva jambudīpo”tiādi āraddhaṃ. Dasasahassayojanaparimāṇo
tika-s0404t0:97_3: āyāmato vitthārato cāti adhippāyo. Tenāha “tatthā”tiādi. Udakena ajjhotthaṭo tadupabhogisattānaṃ
tika-s0404t0:97_4: puññakkhayena. Sundaradassanaṃ kūṭanti sudassanakūṭaṃ, yaṃ loke “hemakūṭa”nti vuccati.
tika-s0404t0:97_5: Mūlagandho kālānusāriyādi. Sāragandho candanādi. Pheggugandho salalādi. Tacagandho
tika-s0404t0:97_6: lavaṅgādi. Papaṭikāgandho kapitthādi. Rasagandho sajjulasādi. Pattagandho tamālahiriverādi.
tika-s0404t0:97_7: Pupphagandho nāgakusumādi. Phalagandho jātiphalādi. Gandhagandho sabbesaṃ gandhānaṃ
tika-s0404t0:97_8: gandho. “Sabbāni puthulato paññāsa yojanāni, āyāmato pana ubbedhato viya dviyojanasatānevā”ti vadanti.
tika-s0404t0:98_1: sādhāraṇakammunāva suṭṭhu paṭiyattāni susaṇṭhitāni honti. Macchakacchapādīni udakaṃ
tika-s0404t0:98_2: malaṃ karonti, tadabhāvato phalikasadisanimmalodakāni. Tiriyato dīghaṃ uggatakūṭanti
tika-s0404t0:98_3: “tiracchānapabbata”nti āha. Purimāni nāmagottānīti ettha nadī ninnagātiādikaṃ gottaṃ,
tika-s0404t0:99_0: Savamānāti sandamānā. Pūrattanti puṇṇabhāvo. Masāragallaṃ “cittaphalika”ntipi vadanti.
tika-s0404t0:99_1: Mahataṃ bhūtānanti mahantānaṃ sattānaṃ. Timī timiṅgalā timitimiṅgalāti tisso macchajātiyo.
tika-s0404t0:99_2: Timiṃ gilanasamatthā timiṅgalā. Timiñca timiṅgalañca gilanasamatthā timitimiṅgalāti vadanti.
tika-s0404t0:100_0: Mama sāvakāti sotāpannādike ariyapuggale sandhāya vadati. Na saṃvasatīti uposathakammādivasena
tika-s0404t0:100_1: saṃvāsaṃ na karoti. Ukkhipatīti apaneti. Vimuttirasoti kilesehi vimuccanaraso. Sabbā
tika-s0404t0:100_2: hi sāsanasampatti yāvadeva anupādāya āsavehi cittassa vimuttiatthā.
tika-s0404t0:101: Ratanānīti ratijananaṭṭhena ratanāni. Satipaṭṭhānādayo hi bhāviyamānā pubbabhāgepi anappakaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ nibbattenti, pageva aparabhāge. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-s0404t0:104: Lokiyaratananibbattaṃ pana pītipāmojjaṃ na tassa kalabhāgampi agghati. Apica –
tika-s0404t0:107_0: Yadi ca cittīkatādibhāvena ratanaṃ nāma hoti, satipaṭṭhānādīnaṃyeva bhūtato ratanabhāvo.
tika-s0404t0:107_1: Bodhipakkhiyadhammānañhi so ānubhāvo, yaṃ sāvakā sāvakapāramiñāṇaṃ, paccekabuddhā
tika-s0404t0:107_2: paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ, sammāsambuddhā sammāsambodhiṃ adhigacchanti āsannakāraṇattā. Āsannakāraṇañhi
tika-s0404t0:107_3: dānādiupanissayoti evaṃ ratijananaṭṭhena cittīkatādiatthena ca ratanabhāvo bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ
tika-s0404t0:107_4: sātisayo. Tena vuttaṃ “tatrimāni ratanāni, seyyathidaṃ. Cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”tiādi.
tika-s0404t0:108_0: Tattha ārammaṇe okkantitvā upaṭṭhānaṭṭhena upaṭṭhānaṃ, satiyeva upaṭṭhānanti satipaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:108_1: Ārammaṇassa pana kāyādivasena catubbidhattā vuttaṃ “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”ti. Tathā
tika-s0404t0:109_0: Sammā padahanti etena, sayaṃ vā sammā padahati, pasatthaṃ sundaraṃ vā padahantīti
tika-s0404t0:109_1: sammappadhānaṃ, puggalassa vā sammadeva padhānabhāvakaraṇato sammappadhānaṃ vīriyassetaṃ
tika-s0404t0:109_2: adhivacanaṃ. Tampi anuppannuppannānaṃ akusalānaṃ anuppādanappahānavasena anuppannuppannānaṃ
tika-s0404t0:109_3: kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādanaṭṭhāpanavasena ca catukiccasādhakattā vuttaṃ “cattāro sammappadhānā”ti.
tika-s0404t0:110_0: Ijjhatīti iddhi, samijjhati nipphajjatīti attho. Ijjhanti vā tāya sattā iddhā vuddhā
tika-s0404t0:110_1: ukkaṃsagatā hontīti iddhi. Iti paṭhamena atthena iddhi eva pādoti iddhipādo, iddhikoṭṭhāsoti
tika-s0404t0:110_2: attho. Dutiyena atthena iddhiyā pādo patiṭṭhā adhigamupāyoti iddhipādo. Tena hi uparūparivisesasaṅkhātaṃ
tika-s0404t0:110_3: iddhiṃ pajjanti pāpuṇanti. Svāyaṃ iddhipādo yasmā chandādike cattāro adhipatidhamme
tika-s0404t0:110_4: dhure jeṭṭhake katvā nibbattīyati, tasmā vuttaṃ “cattāro iddhipādā”ti.
tika-s0404t0:111_0: Pañcindriyānīti saddhādīni pañca indriyāni. Tattha assaddhiyaṃ abhibhavitvā adhimokkhalakkhaṇe
tika-s0404t0:111_1: indaṭṭhaṃ kāretīti saddhindriyaṃ. Kosajjaṃ abhibhavitvā paggahalakkhaṇe, pamādaṃ
tika-s0404t0:111_2: abhibhavitvā upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇe, vikkhepaṃ abhibhavitvā avikkhepalakkhaṇe, aññāṇaṃ
tika-s0404t0:112: Tāniyeva assaddhiyādīhi anabhibhavanīyato akampiyaṭṭhena sampayuttadhammesu thirabhāvena ca balāni veditabbāni.
tika-s0404t0:113_0: Satta bojjhaṅgāti bodhiyā, bodhissa vā aṅgāti bojjhaṅgā. Yā hi esā dhammasāmaggī
tika-s0404t0:113_3: dhammasāmaggiyā ariyasāvako bujjhati, kilesaniddāya vuṭṭhahati, cattāri ariyasaccāni
tika-s0404t0:113_4: paṭivijjhati, nibbānameva vā sacchikarotīti “bodhī”ti vuccati. Tassā dhammasāmaggisaṅkhātāya
tika-s0404t0:113_5: bodhiyā aṅgātipi bojjhaṅgā jhānaṅgamaggaṅgādayo viya. Yopesa vuttappakārāya dhammasāmaggiyā
tika-s0404t0:113_6: bujjhatīti katvā ariyasāvako “bodhī”ti vuccati. Tassa bodhissa aṅgātipi bojjhaṅgā
tika-s0404t0:113_7: senaṅgarathaṅgādayo viya. Tenāhu porāṇā “bujjhanakassa puggalassa aṅgāti bojjhaṅgā”ti.
tika-s0404t0:114_0: Ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggoti taṃtaṃmaggavajjhehi kilesehi ārakattā, ariyabhāvakarattā,
tika-s0404t0:114_1: ariyaphalappaṭilābhakarattā ca ariyo. Sammādiṭṭhiādīni aṭṭhaṅgāni assa atthi, aṭṭha
tika-s0404t0:114_2: aṅgāniyeva vā aṭṭhaṅgiko. Mārento kilese gacchati nibbānatthikehi vā maggīyati, sayaṃ
tika-s0404t0:114_3: vā nibbānaṃ maggatīti maggoti evametesaṃ satipaṭṭhānādīnaṃ atthavibhāgo veditabbo.
tika-s0404t0:115_0: Sotāpannoti maggasaṅkhātaṃ sotaṃ āpajjitvā pāpuṇitvā ṭhito, sotāpattiphalaṭṭhoti
tika-s0404t0:115_2: paṭipajjamāno paṭhamamaggaṭṭho, yo aṭṭhamakotipi vuccati. Sakadāgāmīti sakideva imaṃ
tika-s0404t0:115_3: lokaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena āgamanasīlo dutiyaphalaṭṭho. Anāgāmīti paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena
tika-s0404t0:115_4: kāmalokaṃ anāgamanasīlo tatiyaphalaṭṭho. Yo pana saddhānusārī dhammānusārī ekabījītievamādiko
tika-s0404t0:115_5: ariyapuggalavibhāgo, so etesaṃyeva pabhedoti. Sesaṃ vuttanayasadisameva.
tika-s0404t0:118_0: 20. Dasame tadahuposatheti tasmiṃ uposathadivasabhūte ahani. Uposathakaraṇatthāyāti
tika-s0404t0:118_1: ovādapātimokkhaṃ uddisituṃ. Uddhastaṃ aruṇanti aruṇuggamanaṃ. Uddisatu, bhante, bhagavā
tika-s0404t0:118_2: bhikkhūnaṃ pātimokkhanti thero bhagavantaṃ pātimokkhuddesaṃ yāci. Tasmiṃ kāle “na,
tika-s0404t0:118_3: bhikkhave, anuposathe uposatho kātabbo”ti sikkhāpadassa apaññattattā. Kasmā pana
tika-s0404t0:118_4: bhagavā tiyāmarattiṃ vītināmesi? Tato paṭṭhāya ovādapātimokkhaṃ anuddisitukāmo tassa
tika-s0404t0:118_5: vatthuṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ. Addasāti kathaṃ addasa? Attano cetopariyañāṇena tassaṃ parisati
tika-s0404t0:118_6: bhikkhūnaṃ cittāni parijānanto tassa dussīlassa cittaṃ passi. Yasmā pana citte diṭṭhe
tika-s0404t0:118_7: taṃsamaṅgīpuggalo diṭṭho nāma hoti, tasmā “addasā kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno taṃ puggalaṃ
tika-s0404t0:118_8: dussīla”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Yatheva hi anāgate sattasu divasesu pavattaṃ paresaṃ cittaṃ
tika-s0404t0:118_9: cetopariyañāṇalābhī jānāti, evaṃ atītepīti. Majjhe bhikkhusaṅghassa nisinnanti saṅghapariyāpanno
tika-s0404t0:118_10: viya bhikkhusaṅghassa anto nisinnaṃ. Diṭṭhosīti ayaṃ na pakatattoti bhagavatā diṭṭho
tika-s0404t0:118_11: asi. Yasmā ca evaṃ diṭṭho, tasmā natthi te tava bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ ekakammādisaṃvāso.
tika-s0404t0:118_12: Yasmā pana so saṃvāso tava natthi, tasmā uṭṭhehi, āvusoti evamettha padayojanā veditabbā.
tika-s0404t0:119_0: Tatiyampi kho so puggalo tuṇhī ahosīti anekavāraṃ vatvāpi “thero sayameva nibbinno
tika-s0404t0:119_1: oramissatī”ti vā, “idāni imesaṃ paṭipattiṃ jānissāmī”ti vā adhippāyena tuṇhī ahosi.
tika-s0404t0:119_2: Bāhāyaṃ gahetvāti “bhagavatā mayā ca yāthāvato diṭṭho, yāvatatiyaṃ ‘uṭṭhehi, āvuso’ti
tika-s0404t0:119_3: ca vutto na vuṭṭhāti, idānissa nikkaḍḍhanakālo, mā saṅghassa uposathantarāyo ahosī”ti
tika-s0404t0:119_4: taṃ bāhāyaṃ aggahesi, tathā gahetvā. Bahi dvārakoṭṭhakā nikkhāmetvāti dvārakoṭṭhakā
tika-s0404t0:119_5: dvārasālāto nikkhāmetvā. Bahīti pana nikkhāmitaṭṭhānadassanaṃ. Atha vā bahidvārakoṭṭhakāti
tika-s0404t0:119_6: bahidvārakoṭṭhakatopi nikkhāmetvā, na antodvārakoṭṭhakato eva. Ubhayatthāpi vihārato
tika-s0404t0:119_7: bahikatvāti attho. Sūcighaṭikaṃ datvāti aggaḷasūciñca uparighaṭikañca ādahitvā, suṭṭhutaraṃ
tika-s0404t0:119_8: kavāṭaṃ thaketvāti attho. Yāva bāhāgahaṇāpi nāmāti iminā “aparisuddhā, ānanda, parisā”ti
tika-s0404t0:119_9: vacanaṃ sutvā eva hi tena pakkamitabbaṃ siyā, evaṃ apakkamitvā yāva bāhāgahaṇāpi
tika-s0404t0:119_10: nāma so moghapuriso āgamessati, acchariyamidanti dasseti. Idañca garahanacchariyamevāti veditabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:120_0: Atha bhagavā cintesi – “idāni bhikkhusaṅghe abbudo jāto, aparisuddhā puggalā uposathaṃ
tika-s0404t0:120_1: āgacchanti, na ca tathāgatā aparisuddhāya parisāya uposathaṃ karonti, pātimokkhaṃ
tika-s0404t0:120_2: uddisanti. Anuddisante ca bhikkhusaṅghassa uposatho pacchijjati. Yaṃnūnāhaṃ ito paṭṭhāya
tika-s0404t0:120_3: bhikkhūnaṃyeva pātimokkhuddesaṃ anujāneyya”nti. Evaṃ pana cintetvā bhikkhūnaṃyeva
tika-s0404t0:120_4: pātimokkhuddesaṃ anujāni. Tena vuttaṃ “atha kho bhagavā…pe… pātimokkhaṃ uddiseyyāthā”ti.
tika-s0404t0:120_5: Tattha na dānāhanti idāni ahaṃ uposathaṃ na karissāmi, pātimokkhaṃ na uddisissāmīti
tika-s0404t0:120_6: paccekaṃ na-kārena sambandho. Duvidhañhi pātimokkhaṃ – āṇāpātimokkhaṃ, ovādapātimokkhanti.
tika-s0404t0:120_7: Tesu “suṇātu me, bhante”tiādikaṃ āṇāpātimokkhaṃ. Taṃ sāvakāva uddisanti, na buddhā,
tika-s0404t0:120_8: yaṃ anvaddhamāsaṃ uddisīyati. “Khantī paramaṃ…pe… sabbapāpassa akaraṇaṃ…pe… anupavādo
tika-s0404t0:120_9: anupaghāto…pe… etaṃ buddhāna sāsana”nti imā pana tisso gāthā ovādapātimokkhaṃ nāma.
tika-s0404t0:120_10: Taṃ buddhāva uddisanti, na sāvakā, channampi vassānaṃ accayena uddisanti. Dīghāyukabuddhānañhi
tika-s0404t0:120_11: dharamānakāle ayameva pātimokkhuddeso, appāyukabuddhānaṃ pana paṭhamabodhiyaṃyeva.
tika-s0404t0:120_12: Tato paraṃ itaro. Tañca kho bhikkhūyeva uddisanti, na buddhā, tasmā amhākampi bhagavā
tika-s0404t0:120_13: vīsativassamattaṃ imaṃ ovādapātimokkhaṃ uddisitvā imaṃ antarāyaṃ disvā tato paraṃ
tika-s0404t0:120_14: na uddisi. Aṭṭhānanti akāraṇaṃ. Anavakāsoti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Kāraṇañhi yathā tiṭṭhati
tika-s0404t0:120_15: ettha phalaṃ tadāyattavuttitāyāti “ṭhāna”nti vuccati, evaṃ “avakāso”tipi vuccati.
tika-s0404t0:121_0: Aṭṭhime, bhikkhave, mahāsamuddeti ko anusandhi? Yvāyaṃ aparisuddhāya parisāya pātimokkhassa
tika-s0404t0:121_1: anuddeso vutto, so imasmiṃ dhammavinaye acchariyo abbhuto dhammoti taṃ aparehipi
tika-s0404t0:121_2: sattahi acchariyabbhutadhammehi saddhiṃ vibhajitvā dassetukāmo paṭhamaṃ tāva tesaṃ
tika-s0404t0:121_3: upamābhāvena mahāsamudde aṭṭha acchariyabbhutadhamme dassento satthā “aṭṭhime, bhikkhave,
tika-s0404t0:126_0: 21-27. Tatiyassa paṭhamadutiyesu natthi vattabbaṃ. Tatiye “hatthago”ti vattabbe “hatthako”ti
tika-s0404t0:126_1: vuttaṃ. So hi rājapurisānaṃ hatthato yakkhassa hatthaṃ, yakkhassa hatthato bhagavato
tika-s0404t0:126_2: hatthaṃ, bhagavato hatthato puna rājapurisānaṃ hatthaṃ gatattā nāmato hatthako āḷavakoti
tika-s0404t0:126_3: jāto. Tenāha “āḷavakayakkhassa hatthato hatthehi sampaṭicchitattā hatthakoti laddhanāmo
tika-s0404t0:129_0: 28. Aṭṭhame khīṇāsavassa sabbesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ aniccatā asammohavasena kiccato maggapaññāya
tika-s0404t0:129_2: maggapaññāyā”ti. Ime kāmāti dvepi kāme vadati. Kilesavasena uppajjamāno hi pariḷāho
tika-s0404t0:129_3: vatthukāmasannissayo vatthukāmavisayo vāti dvepi sapariḷāhaṭṭhena aṅgārakāsu viyāti
tika-s0404t0:129_4: “aṅgārakāsūpamā”ti vuttā. Anto vuccati lāmakaṭṭhena taṇhā, byantaṃ vigatantaṃ bhūtanti
tika-s0404t0:132_0: 29. Navame yasmā mahiddhikapetā devāsurānaṃ āvāhaṃ gacchanti, vivāhaṃ na gacchanti,
tika-s0404t0:132_1: tasmā pettivisayeneva asurakāyo gahitoti veditabbo. Petāsurā pana petā evāti tesaṃ
tika-s0404t0:135_0: 30. Dasame appicchassāti na icchassa. Abhāvattho hettha appasaddo “appaḍaṃsamakasavātātapā”tiādīsu
tika-s0404t0:135_1: viya. Paccayesu appiccho paccayappiccho, cīvarādipaccayesu icchārahito. Adhigamappicchoti
tika-s0404t0:135_3: icchārahito. Dhutaṅgappicchoti dhutaṅgesu appiccho dhutaṅgabhāvavibhāvane icchārahito.
tika-s0404t0:135_5: dhutaṅgaguṇassa ca niguhanena chādanena. Sampajjatīti nipphajjati sijjhati. No mahicchassāti
tika-s0404t0:135_6: mahatiyā icchāya samannāgatassa no sampajjati anudhammassapi anipphajjanato. Pavivittassāti
tika-s0404t0:135_8: bhāvanābhiyogavasena ekībhāvova kāyavivekoti adhippeto, na gaṇasaṅgaṇikābhāvamattanti
tika-s0404t0:136_0: Sattehi kilesehi ca saṅgaṇanaṃ samodhānaṃ saṅgaṇikā, sā āramitabbaṭṭhena ārāmo etassāti
tika-s0404t0:136_1: saṅgaṇikārāmo, tassa. Tenāha “gaṇasaṅgaṇikāya cevā”tiādi. Āraddhavīriyassāti paggahitavīriyassa.
tika-s0404t0:136_2: Tañca kho upadhiviveke ninnatāvasena “ayaṃ dhammo”ti vacanato. Esa nayo itaresupi.
tika-s0404t0:136_3: Vivaṭṭanissitaṃyeva hi samādhānaṃ idhādhippetaṃ, tathā paññāpi. Kammassa-katapaññāya
tika-s0404t0:136_4: hi ṭhito kammavasena bhavesu nānappakāro anatthoti jānanto kammakkhayakaraṃ ñāṇaṃ
tika-s0404t0:136_5: abhipattheti, tadatthañca ussāhaṃ karoti. Mānādayo sattasantānaṃ saṃsāre papañcenti
tika-s0404t0:141_0: 31-34. Catutthassa paṭhame āsajjāti yassa deti, tassa āgamanahetu tena samāgamanimittaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:141_1: Bhayāti bhayahetu. Nanu bhayaṃ nāma laddhakāmatārāgādayo viya cetanāya avisuddhikaraṃ,
tika-s0404t0:141_2: taṃ kasmā idha gahitanti? Nayidaṃ tādisaṃ vohārabhayādiṃ sandhāya vuttanti dassetuṃ
tika-s0404t0:141_3: “ayaṃ adāyako akārako”tiādi vuttaṃ. Adāsi meti yaṃ pubbe kataṃ upakāraṃ cintetvā
tika-s0404t0:141_4: dīyati, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Dassati meti paccupakārāsīsāya yaṃ dīyati, taṃ sandhāya
tika-s0404t0:141_5: vadati. Sāhu dānanti dānaṃ nāmetaṃ paṇḍitapaññattanti sādhusamācāre ṭhatvā deti.
tika-s0404t0:141_6: Alaṅkāratthanti upasobhanatthaṃ. Dānañhi datvā taṃ paccavekkhantassa pāmojjapītisomanassādayo
tika-s0404t0:141_7: uppajjanti, lobhadosaissāmaccherādayopi vidūrī bhavanti. Idāni dānaṃ anukūladhammaparibrūhanena
tika-s0404t0:141_8: paccanīkadhammavidūrīkaraṇena ca bhāvanācittassa upasobhanāya ca parikkhārāya ca
tika-s0404t0:141_9: hotīti “alaṅkāratthañceva parikkhāratthañca detī”ti vuttaṃ. Tenāha “dānañhi cittaṃ
tika-s0404t0:141_10: muduṃ karotī”tiādi. Muducitto hoti laddhā dāyake “iminā mayhaṃ saṅgaho kato”ti, dātāpi
tika-s0404t0:141_11: laddhari. Tena vuttaṃ “ubhinnampi cittaṃ muduṃ karotī”ti.
tika-s0404t0:142_0: Adantadamananti adantā anassavāpissa dānena dantā assavā honti, vase vattanti. Adānaṃ
tika-s0404t0:142_1: dantadūsakanti adānaṃ pubbe dantānaṃ assavānampi vighātuppādanena cittaṃ dūseti.
tika-s0404t0:142_2: Unnamanti dāyakā piyaṃvadā ca paresaṃ garucittīkāraṭṭhānatāya. Namantipaṭiggāhakā
tika-s0404t0:143: Cittālaṅkāradānameva uttamaṃ anupakkiliṭṭhatāya suparisuddhatāya guṇavisesapaccayatāya ca. Dutiyādīni uttānatthāneva.
tika-s0404t0:146_0: 35. Pañcame dānapaccayāti dānakāraṇā, dānamayapuññassa katattā upacitattāti attho.
tika-s0404t0:146_1: Upapattiyoti manussesu devesu ca nibbattiyo. Ṭhapetīti ekavārameva anuppajjitvā yathā
tika-s0404t0:146_2: upari tenevākārena pavattati, evaṃ ṭhapeti. Tadeva cassa adhiṭṭhānanti āha “tasseva
tika-s0404t0:146_3: vevacana”nti. Vaḍḍhetīti brūheti na hāpeti. Vimuttanti adhimuttaṃ, ninnaṃ poṇaṃ pabbhāranti
tika-s0404t0:146_4: attho. Vimuttanti vā vissaṭṭhaṃ. Nippariyāyato uttari nāma paṇītaṃ majjhepi hīnamajjhimavibhāgassa
tika-s0404t0:146_5: labbhanatoti vuttaṃ “uttari abhāvitanti tato uparimaggaphalatthāya abhāvita”nti.
tika-s0404t0:146_6: Saṃvattati tathāpaṇihitaṃ dānamayaṃ cittaṃ. Yaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ “tañca kho”tiādi vuttaṃ,
tika-s0404t0:146_7: taṃ tatrupapattiyā vibandhakaradussīlyābhāvadassanaparaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, na dānamayassa
tika-s0404t0:146_9: samucchinnakāmarāgassa. Tassa hi siyā brahmaloke upapatti, na samucchinnabhavarāgassa.
tika-s0404t0:146_10: Vītarāgaggahaṇena cettha kāmesu vītarāgatā adhippetā, yāya brahmalokūpapatti siyā.
tika-s0404t0:146_11: Tenāha “dānamattenevā”tiādi. Yadi evaṃ dānaṃ tattha kimatthiyanti āha “dānaṃ panā”tiādi.
tika-s0404t0:146_12: Dānena muducittoti baddhāghāte veripuggalepi attano dānasampaṭicchanena mudubhūtacitto.
tika-s0404t0:149_0: 36. Chaṭṭhe pujjabhavaphalaṃ nibbattenti, attano santānaṃ punantīti vā puññāni ca
tika-s0404t0:149_1: tāni hetupaccayehi kattabbato kiriyā cāti puññakiriyā, tāyeva ca tesaṃ tesaṃ piyamanāpatādiānisaṃsānaṃ
tika-s0404t0:150_0: Anucchinnabhavamūlassa anuggahavasena, pūjāvasena vā attano deyyadhammassa parassa
tika-s0404t0:150_1: pariccāgacetanā dīyati etenāti dānaṃ, dānameva dānamayaṃ. Padapūraṇamattaṃ maya-saddo.
tika-s0404t0:150_2: Cīvarādīsu catūsu paccayesu, annādīsu vā dasasu dānavatthūsu, rūpādīsu vā chasu ārammaṇesu
tika-s0404t0:150_3: taṃ taṃ dentassa tesaṃ uppādanato paṭṭhāya pubbabhāge pariccāgakāle pacchā somanassacittena
tika-s0404t0:150_4: anussaraṇe cāti tīsu kālesu pavattacetanā dānamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu nāma.
tika-s0404t0:151_0: Niccasīlauposathasīlādivasena pañca aṭṭha dasa vā sīlāni samādiyantassa “sīlapūraṇatthaṃ
tika-s0404t0:151_1: pabbajissāmī”ti vihāraṃ gacchantassa pabbajantassa, manorathaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā
tika-s0404t0:151_2: “pabbajito vatamhi sādhu suṭṭhū”ti āvajjentassa, saddhāya pātimokkhaṃ paripūrentassa,
tika-s0404t0:151_3: paññāya cīvarādike paccaye paccavekkhantassa, satiyā āpāthagatesu rūpādīsu cakkhudvārādīni
tika-s0404t0:151_4: saṃvarantassa, vīriyena ājīvaṃ sodhentassa ca pavattacetanā sīlati, sīletīti vā sīlamayaṃ
tika-s0404t0:152_0: Paṭisambhidāyaṃ vuttena vipassanāmaggena cakkhuṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassantassa,
tika-s0404t0:152_1: sotaṃ…pe… ghānaṃ…pe… jivhaṃ…pe… kāyaṃ…pe… rūpe…pe… dhamme…pe… cakkhuviññāṇaṃ…pe…
tika-s0404t0:152_3: manosamphassajaṃ vedanaṃ…pe… jarāmaraṇaṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassantassa
tika-s0404t0:152_4: yā cetanā, yā ca pathavīkasiṇādīsu sabbāsu aṭṭhattiṃsāya ārammaṇesu pavattā jhānacetanā,
tika-s0404t0:152_5: yā ca anavajjesu kammāyatanasippāyatanavijjāṭṭhānesu paricayamanasikārādivasena pavattā
tika-s0404t0:152_6: cetanā, sabbā sā bhāveti etāyāti bhāvanāmayaṃ vuttanayena puññakiriyavatthu cāti
tika-s0404t0:153_0: Ekamekañcettha yathārahaṃ pubbabhāgato paṭṭhāya karontassa kāyakammaṃ hoti. Tadatthaṃ
tika-s0404t0:153_1: vācaṃ nicchārentassa vacīkammaṃ. Kāyaṅgaṃ vācaṅgañca acopetvā manasā cintayantassa
tika-s0404t0:153_2: manokammaṃ. Annādīni dentassa cāpi “annadānādīni demī”ti vā, dānapāramiṃ āvajjetvā
tika-s0404t0:153_3: vā dānakāle dānamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu hoti. Yathā hi kevalaṃ “annadānādīni demī”ti
tika-s0404t0:153_4: dānakāle dānamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu hoti, evaṃ “idaṃ dānamayaṃ sammāsambodhiyā paccayo
tika-s0404t0:153_5: hotū”ti dānapāramiṃ āvajjetvā dānakālepi dānasīseneva pavattitattā. Vattasīse ṭhatvā
tika-s0404t0:153_6: dadanto “etaṃ dānaṃ nāma mayhaṃ kulavaṃsahetu paveṇicāritta”nti cārittasīsena vā
tika-s0404t0:153_7: dento cārittasīlattā sīlamayaṃ. Khayato vayato sammasanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā dadato bhāvanāmayaṃ
tika-s0404t0:153_8: puññakiriyavatthu hoti. Yathā hi deyyadhammapariccāgavasena vattamānāpi dānacetanā
tika-s0404t0:153_9: vattasīse ṭhatvā dadato sīlamayaṃ puññakiriyavatthu hoti pubbābhisaṅkhārassa aparabhāge
tika-s0404t0:156_0: 37-38. Sattame viceyya detīti ettha dve vicinanāni dakkhiṇeyyavicinanaṃ, dakkhiṇāvicinanañca.
tika-s0404t0:156_1: Tesu vipannasīle ito bahiddhā pañcanavuti pāsaṇḍabhede ca dakkhiṇeyye pahāya sīlādiguṇasampannānaṃ
tika-s0404t0:156_2: sāsane pabbajitānaṃ dānaṃ dakkhiṇeyyavicinanaṃ nāma. Lāmakalāmake paccaye apanetvā
tika-s0404t0:156_3: paṇītapaṇīte vicinitvā tesaṃ dānaṃ dakkhiṇāvicinanaṃ nāma. Tenāha “imassa dinnaṃ
tika-s0404t0:159_0: 39-40. Navame puññābhisandāti puññanadiyo. Kusalābhisandāti kusalānaṃ pavāhā. Sukhassāhārāti
tika-s0404t0:159_1: sukhapaccayā. Aggānīti ñātattā aggaññāni. Cirarattaṃ ñātattā rattaññāni. Ariyānaṃ
tika-s0404t0:159_2: sādhūnaṃ vaṃsānīti ñātattā vaṃsaññāni. Porāṇānaṃ ādipurisānaṃ etānīti porāṇāni. Sabbaso
tika-s0404t0:159_3: kenacipi pakārena sādhūhi na kiṇṇāni na khittāni chaḍḍitānīti asaṃkiṇṇāni. Ayañca
tika-s0404t0:159_4: nayo nesaṃ yathā atīte, evaṃ etarahi anāgate cāti āha “asaṃkiṇṇapubbāni na saṃkiyanti
tika-s0404t0:159_5: na saṃkiyissantī”ti. Tato eva appaṭikuṭṭhāni. Na hi kadāci viññū samaṇabrāhmaṇā hiṃsādipāpadhammaṃ
tika-s0404t0:159_6: anujānanti. Aparimāṇānaṃ sattānaṃ abhayaṃ detīti sabbesu bhūtesu nihitadaṇḍattā sakalassapi
tika-s0404t0:159_7: sattakāyassa bhayābhāvaṃ deti. Averanti verābhāvaṃ. Abyābajjhanti niddukkhataṃ. Evamettha
tika-s0404t0:159_8: saṅkhepato pāḷivaṇṇanā veditabbā. Dasame natthi vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:164_0: 41-48. Pañcamassa paṭhamādīsu natthi vattabbaṃ. Chaṭṭhe pañca aṅgāni etassāti pañcaṅgaṃ,
tika-s0404t0:164_1: pañcaṅgameva pañcaṅgikaṃ, tassa pañcaṅgikassa. Mahatī daddarī vīṇāvisesopi ātatamevāti
tika-s0404t0:164_3: bherimudiṅgādi. Cammapariyonaddhaṃ hutvā vinibaddhaṃ ātatavitataṃ. Sabbaso pariyonaddhaṃ
tika-s0404t0:164_4: nāma caturassaambaṇaṃ paṇavādi ca. Gomukhīādīnampi ettheva saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Vaṃsādīti
tika-s0404t0:164_5: ādi-saddena saṅkhādīnaṃ saṅgaho. Sammādīti sammatāḷakaṃsatāḷasilāsalākatāḷādi. Tattha
tika-s0404t0:164_6: sammatāḷaṃ nāma dantamayatāḷaṃ. Kaṃsatāḷaṃ lohamayaṃ. Silāmayaṃ ayopattena ca vādanatāḷaṃ
tika-s0404t0:164_7: silāsalākatāḷaṃ. Sumucchitassāti suṭṭhu paṭiyattassa. Pamāṇeti nātidaḷhanātisithilasaṅkhāte
tika-s0404t0:164_8: majjhime mucchanāpamāṇe. Chekoti paṭu paṭṭho. So cassa paṭubhāvo manoharoti āha “sundaro”ti.
tika-s0404t0:164_9: Rañjetunti rāgaṃ uppādetuṃ. Khamatevāti rocateva. Na nibbindatīti na tajjeti, sotasukhabhāvato piyāyitabbova hoti.
tika-s0404t0:165_0: Bhattāraṃ nātimaññatīti sāmikaṃ muñcitvā aññaṃ manasāpi na pattheti. Uṭṭhāhikāti
tika-s0404t0:165_1: uṭṭhānavīriyasampannā. Analasāti nikkosajjā. Saṅgahitaparijjanāti sammānanādīhi ceva
tika-s0404t0:165_2: chaṇādīsu pesetabba-piyabhaṇḍādipaṇṇākārapesanādīhi ca saṅgahitaparijanā. Idha parijano
tika-s0404t0:165_3: nāma sāmikassa ceva attano ca ñātijano. Sambhatanti kasivaṇijjādīni katvā ābhatadhanaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:168_0: 49-50. Navame idhalokavijayāyāti idhalokavijinanatthāya abhibhavatthāya. Yo hi diṭṭhadhammikaṃ
tika-s0404t0:168_1: anatthaṃ parivajjanavasena abhibhavati, tato eva tadatthaṃ sampādeti, so idhalokavijayāya
tika-s0404t0:168_2: paṭipanno nāma hoti paccatthikaniggaṇhanato sadatthasampādanato ca. Tenāha “ayaṃsa
tika-s0404t0:168_3: loko āraddho hotī”ti. (Pasaṃsāvahato tayidaṃ pasaṃsāvahanaṃ kittisaddena idhaloke
tika-s0404t0:168_4: saddānaṃ cittatosanaviddheyyabhāvāpādanena ca hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.) Susaṃvihitakammantoti
tika-s0404t0:168_5: yāgubhattapacanakālādīni anatikkamitvā tassa tassa sādhukaṃ karaṇena suṭṭhu saṃvihitakammanto.
tika-s0404t0:168_6: Paralokavijayāyāti paralokassa vijinanatthāya abhibhavatthāya. Yo hi samparāyikaṃ
tika-s0404t0:168_7: anatthaṃ parivajjanavasena abhibhavati, tato eva tadatthaṃ sampādeti, so paralokavijayāya
tika-s0404t0:168_8: paṭipanno nāma hoti. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānameva.
tika-s0404t0:175_0: 51-53. Chaṭṭhassa paṭhame gotamīti gottaṃ. Nāmakaraṇadivase panassā laddhasakkārā
tika-s0404t0:175_1: brāhmaṇā lakkhaṇasampattiṃ disvā “sace ayaṃ dhītaraṃ labhissati, cakkavattirañño
tika-s0404t0:175_2: mahesī bhavissati. Sace puttaṃ labhissati, cakkavattirājā bhavissatīti ubhayathāpi
tika-s0404t0:175_3: mahatīyevassā pajā bhavissatī”ti byākariṃsu. Athassā “mahāpajāpatī”ti nāmaṃ akaṃsu.
tika-s0404t0:175_4: Tenāha “puttapajāya ceva dhītupajāya ca mahantattā evaṃladdhanāmā”ti.
tika-s0404t0:178_0: Ādinā attadaṇḍasuttaṃ kathesi. Taṃtaṃpalobhanakiriyā kāyavācāhi parakkamantiyo ukkaṇṭhantūti
tika-s0404t0:178_1: sāsanaṃ pesenti nāmāti katvā vuttaṃ “sāsanaṃ pesetvā”ti. Kuṇāladahanti kuṇāladahatīraṃ.
tika-s0404t0:178_2: Anabhiratiṃ vinodetvāti itthīnaṃ dosadassanamukhena kāmānaṃ vokārasaṃkilesavibhāvanena
tika-s0404t0:179_0: Āpādikāti saṃvaddhakā, tumhākaṃ hatthapādesu kiccaṃ asādhentesu hatthe ca pāde ca
tika-s0404t0:179_1: vaḍḍhetvā paṭijaggitāti attho. Posikāti divasassa dve tayo vāre nahāpetvā bhojetvā
tika-s0404t0:179_2: pāyetvā tumhe posesi. Thaññaṃ pāyesīti nandakumāro kira bodhisattato katipāheneva
tika-s0404t0:179_3: daharo, tasmiṃ jāte mahāpajāpatī attano puttaṃ dhātīnaṃ datvā sayaṃ bodhisattassa
tika-s0404t0:179_4: dhātikiccaṃ sādhayamānā attano thaññaṃ pāyesi. Taṃ sandhāya thero evamāha. Daharoti
tika-s0404t0:179_5: taruṇo. Yuvāti yobbaññe ṭhito. Maṇḍanakajātikoti alaṅkārasabhāvo. Tattha koci taruṇopi
tika-s0404t0:179_6: yuvā na hoti yathā atitaruṇo. Koci yuvāpi maṇḍanakajātiko na hoti yathā upasantasabhāvo,
tika-s0404t0:179_7: ālasiyabyasanādīhi vā abhibhūto. Idha pana daharo ceva yuvā ca maṇḍanakajātiko ca
tika-s0404t0:179_8: adhippeto, tasmā evamāha. Uppalādīni maṇḍanakajātiko ca lokasammatattā vuttāni.
tika-s0404t0:180_0: Mātugāmassa pabbajitattāti idaṃ pañcavassasatato uddhaṃ aṭṭhatvā pañcasuyeva vassasatesu
tika-s0404t0:180_2: ettha paṭisambhidāppattakhīṇāsavaggahaṇena jhānānipi gahitāneva honti. Na hi nijjhānakānaṃ
tika-s0404t0:180_4: ca yaṃ vuttaṃ, taṃ khandhakabhāṇakānaṃ matena vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Vinayaṭṭhakathāyampi
tika-s0404t0:181_1: vassasahassaṃ, tevijjehi vassasahassaṃ, sukkhavipassakehi vassasahassaṃ, pātimokkhena
tika-s0404t0:181_2: vassasahassaṃ aṭṭhāsī”ti vuttaṃ. Idhāpi sāsanantaradhānakathāyaṃ “buddhānañhi parinibbānato
tika-s0404t0:181_3: vassasahassameva paṭisambhidā nibbattetuṃ sakkonti, tato paraṃ cha abhiññā, tato
tika-s0404t0:181_4: tāpi nibbattetuṃ asakkontā tisso vijjā nibbattenti, gacchante gacchante kāle tāpi
tika-s0404t0:181_5: nibbattetuṃ asakkontā sukkhavipassakā honti. Eteneva upāyena anāgāmino, sakadāgāmino,
tika-s0404t0:182_1: Atha kāle gacchante paṭisambhidā pāpuṇituṃ na sakkhiṃsu, chaḷabhiññā ahesuṃ. Tato
tika-s0404t0:182_2: cha abhiññā pattuṃ asakkontā tisso vijjā pāpuṇiṃsu. Idāni kāle gacchante tisso vijjā
tika-s0404t0:182_3: pāpuṇituṃ asakkontā āsavakkhayamattaṃ pāpuṇissanti, tampi asakkontā anāgāmiphalaṃ,
tika-s0404t0:182_4: tampi asakkontā sakadāgāmiphalaṃ, tampi asakkontā sotāpattiphalaṃ, gacchante kāle
tika-s0404t0:182_5: sotāpattiphalampi pattuṃ na sakkhissantī”ti vuttaṃ. Yasmā cetaṃ sabbaṃ aññamaññappaṭiviruddhaṃ,
tika-s0404t0:182_6: tasmā tesaṃ tesaṃ bhāṇakānaṃ matameva ācariyena tattha tattha dassitanti gahetabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:183_0: Tāniyevāti tāniyeva pañcavassasahassāni. Pariyattimūlakaṃ sāsananti āha “na hi pariyattiyā
tika-s0404t0:183_1: asati paṭivedho atthī”tiādi. Pariyattiyā hi antarahitāya paṭipattiantaradhāyati,
tika-s0404t0:183_2: paṭipattiyā antarahitāya adhigamo antaradhāyati. Kiṃkāraṇā? Ayañhi pariyatti paṭipattiyā
tika-s0404t0:183_3: paccayo hoti, paṭipatti adhigamassa. Iti paṭipattitopi pariyattiyeva pamāṇaṃ. Dutiyatatiyesu natthi vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:186_0: 54-55. Catutthe ekena bhoge bhuñjeyyāti ekena koṭṭhāsena bhoge bhuñjeyya, vinibhuñjeyya
tika-s0404t0:186_1: vāti attho. Dvīhi kammanti dvīhi koṭṭhāsehi kasivaṇijjādikammaṃ payojeyya. Nidhāpeyyāti
tika-s0404t0:186_2: catutthakoṭṭhāsaṃ nidhetvā ṭhapeyya, nidahitvā bhūmigataṃ katvā ṭhapeyyāti attho.
tika-s0404t0:186_3: Āpadāsu bhavissatīti kulānañhi na sabbakālaṃ ekasadisaṃ vattati, kadāci rājaaggicoradubbhikkhādivasena
tika-s0404t0:186_4: āpadā uppajjanti, tasmā evaṃ āpadāsu uppannāsu bhavissatīti ekaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ nidhāpeyyāti
tika-s0404t0:186_5: vuttaṃ. Imesu pana catūsu koṭṭhāsesu kataraṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ gahetvā kusalaṃ kātabbanti?
tika-s0404t0:186_6: “Bhoge bhuñjeyyā”ti vuttakoṭṭhāsaṃ. Tato gaṇhitvā hi bhikkhūnampi kapaṇaddhikānampi
tika-s0404t0:186_7: dānaṃ dātabbaṃ, pesakāranhāpitādīnampi vetanaṃ dātabbaṃ. Samaṇabrāhmaṇakapaṇaddhikādīnaṃ
tika-s0404t0:186_8: dānavasena ceva, adhivatthadevatādīnaṃ petabalivasena, nhāpitādīnaṃ vetanavasena
tika-s0404t0:187: Apenti gacchanti, apentā vā etehīti apāyā, apāyā eva mukhāni dvārānīti apāyamukhāni. Vināsadvārānīti etthāpi eseva nayo. Pañcame natthi vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:190: 56-58. Chaṭṭhe gabbhavāso idha uttarapadalopena gabbho vuttoti āha “gabbhoti gabbhavāso”ti. Sattamaṭṭhamāni uttānatthāni.
tika-s0404t0:193_0: 59-60. Navame dānaṃ dadantānanti dakkhiṇeyyaṃ uddissa dānaṃ dentānaṃ. Upadhī vipaccanti
tika-s0404t0:193_1: etena, upadhīsu vā vipaccati, upadhayo vā vipākā etassāti upadhivipākaṃ. Saṅghe dinnaṃ
tika-s0404t0:193_2: mahapphalanti ariyasaṅghe dinnaṃ vipphāraṭṭhānaṃ hoti, vipulaphalanti attho. Dasame natthi vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:198_1: abhibhu, parikammaṃ, ñāṇaṃ vā. Abhibhu āyatanaṃ etassāti abhibhāyatanaṃ, jhānaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:198_2: Abhibhavitabbaṃ vā ārammaṇasaṅkhātaṃ āyatanaṃ etassāti abhibhāyatanaṃ. Atha vā ārammaṇābhibhavanato
tika-s0404t0:198_3: abhitu ca taṃ āyatanañca yogino sukhavisesānaṃ adhiṭṭhānabhāvato manāyatanadhammāyatanabhāvato
tika-s0404t0:198_5: hīti abhibhāyatanasaññitāni jhānāni. “Puggalassa ñāṇuttariyatāyā”ti idaṃ ubhayatthāpi
tika-s0404t0:198_6: yojetabbaṃ. Kathaṃ? Paṭipakkhabhāvena paccanīkadhamme abhibhavanti puggalassa ñāṇuttariyatāya
tika-s0404t0:198_7: ārammaṇāni abhibhavanti. Ñāṇabaleneva hi ārammaṇābhibhavanaṃ viya paṭipakkhābhibhavopīti.
tika-s0404t0:199_0: Parikammavasena ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī, na appanāvasena. Na hi paṭibhāganimittārammaṇā
tika-s0404t0:199_1: appanā ajjhattavisayā sambhavati. Taṃ pana ajjhattaparikammavasena laddhaṃ kasiṇanimittaṃ
tika-s0404t0:199_2: avisuddhameva hoti, na bahiddhāparikammavasena laddhaṃ viya visuddhaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:200_1: vaṇṇavasena ābhoge vijjamānepi parittavaseneva idaṃ abhibhāyatanaṃ vuttaṃ. Parittatā
tika-s0404t0:200_2: hettha abhibhavanassa kāraṇaṃ. Vaṇṇābhoge satipi asatipi abhibhāyatanabhāvanā nāma
tika-s0404t0:200_3: tikkhapaññasseva sambhavati, na itarassāti āha “ñāṇuttariko puggalo”ti. Abhibhavitvā
tika-s0404t0:200_5: appanājhānuppādananti āha “saha nimittuppādenevettha appanaṃ pāpetī”ti. Saha nimittuppādenāti
tika-s0404t0:200_6: ca appanāparivāsābhāvassa lakkhaṇavacanametaṃ. Yo “khippābhiñño”ti vuccati, tatopi
tika-s0404t0:200_7: ñāṇuttarasseva abhibhāyatanabhāvanā. Etthāti etasmiṃ nimitte. Appanaṃ pāpetīti bhāvanaṃ appanaṃ neti.
tika-s0404t0:201_0: Ettha ca keci “uppanne upacārajjhāne taṃ ārabbha ye heṭṭhimantena dve tayo javanavārā
tika-s0404t0:201_1: pavattanti, te upacārajjhānapakkhikā eva, tadanantarañca bhavaṅgaparivāsena upacārāsevanāya
tika-s0404t0:201_2: ca vinā appanā hoti, saha nimittuppādeneva appanaṃ pāpetī”ti vadanti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:201_3: Na hi pārivāsikakammena appanāvāro icchito, nāpi mahaggatappamāṇajjhānesu viya upacārajjhāne
tika-s0404t0:201_4: ekantato paccavekkhaṇā icchitabbā, tasmā upacārajjhānādhigamato paraṃ katipayabhavaṅgacittāvasāne
tika-s0404t0:201_5: appanaṃ pāpuṇanto “saha nimittuppādenevettha appanaṃ pāpetī”ti vutto. “Saha nimittuppādenā”ti
tika-s0404t0:201_6: ca adhippāyikamidaṃ vacanaṃ, na nītatthaṃ. Adhippāyo vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
tika-s0404t0:202_0: Na antosamāpattiyaṃ tadā tathārūpassa ābhogassa asambhavato, samāpattito vuṭṭhitassa
tika-s0404t0:202_1: ābhogo pubbabhāgabhāvanāya vasena jhānakkhaṇe pavattaṃ abhibhavanākāraṃ gahetvā pavattoti
tika-s0404t0:202_2: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana “iminā panassa pubbabhogo kathito”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:202_3: Antosamāpattiyaṃ tathā ābhogābhāve kasmā “jhānasaññāyapī”ti vuttanti āha “abhibhavana…pe… atthī”ti.
tika-s0404t0:203_0: Vaḍḍhitappamāṇānīti vipulappamāṇānīti attho, na ekaṅguladvaṅgulādivasena vaḍḍhiṃ
tika-s0404t0:203_2: bhuñjanabhājane vaḍḍhitvā dinnaṃ bhattaṃ, ekāsane purisena bhuñjitabbabhattato upaḍḍhabhattanti attho.
tika-s0404t0:204_0: Rūpe saññā rūpasaññā, sā assa atthīti rūpasaññī, na rūpasaññī arūpasaññī. Saññāsīsena
tika-s0404t0:204_1: jhānaṃ vadati. Rūpasaññāya anuppādanamevettha alābhitā. Bahiddhāva uppannanti bahiddhāvatthusmiṃyeva
tika-s0404t0:204_2: uppannaṃ. Abhidhamme pana “ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittāni
tika-s0404t0:204_3: suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni, appamāṇāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānī”ti evaṃ catunnaṃ abhibhāyatanānaṃ
tika-s0404t0:204_4: āgatattā abhidhammaṭṭhakathāyaṃ “kasmā pana yathā suttante ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī eko
tika-s0404t0:204_5: bahiddhā rūpāni passati parittānītiādi vuttaṃ, evaṃ avatvā idha catūsupi abhibhāyatanesu
tika-s0404t0:204_6: ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññitāva vuttā”ti codanaṃ katvā “ajjhattarūpānaṃ anabhibhavanīyato”ti
tika-s0404t0:204_7: kāraṇaṃ vatvā “tattha vā idha vā bahiddhā rūpāneva abhibhavitabbāni, tasmā tāni niyamatova
tika-s0404t0:204_8: vattabbānīti tatrāpi idhāpi vuttāni, ‘ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī’ti idaṃ pana satthu desanāvilāsamattamevā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:205_0: Ettha ca vaṇṇābhogarahitāni sahitāni ca sabbāni “parittāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānī”ti vuttāni,
tika-s0404t0:205_1: tathā “appamāṇāni suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānī”ti. Atthi hi so pariyāyo “parittāni abhibhuyya,
tika-s0404t0:205_2: tāni ce kadāci vaṇṇavasena ābhujitāni honti suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇāni abhibhuyyā”ti. Pariyāyakathā
tika-s0404t0:205_3: hi suttantadesanāti. Abhidhamme pana nippariyāyadesanattā vaṇṇābhogarahitāni visuṃ
tika-s0404t0:205_4: vuttāni, tathā sahitāni. Atthi hi ubhayattha abhibhavanavisesoti, tathā idha pariyāyadesanattā
tika-s0404t0:205_7: tatiyavimokkho ca abhibhavanappavattito saṅgahito. Abhidhamme pana nippariyāyadesanattā
tika-s0404t0:205_8: vimokkhābhibhāyatanāni asaṅkarato dassetuṃ vimokkhe vajjetvā abhibhāyatanāni kathitāni.
