tika-s0404t0:205_9: Sabbāni ca vimokkhakiccāni jhānāni vimokkhadesanāyaṃ vuttāni. Tadetaṃ “ajjhattaṃ
tika-s0404t0:205_10: rūpasaññī”ti āgatassa abhibhāyatanadvayassa abhidhamme abhibhāyatanesu avacanato
tika-s0404t0:205_12: katanti viññāyati. “Ajjhattarūpānaṃ anabhibhavanīyato”ti idaṃ abhidhamme katthacipi
tika-s0404t0:205_13: “ajjhattaṃ rūpāni passatī”ti avatvā sabbattha yaṃ vuttaṃ “bahiddhā rūpāni passatī”ti,
tika-s0404t0:205_14: tassa kāraṇavacanaṃ. Tena yaṃ aññahetukaṃ, taṃ tena hetunā vuttaṃ. Yaṃ pana desanāvilāsahetukaṃ
tika-s0404t0:205_15: ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññitāya eva abhidhamme vacanaṃ, na tassa aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ maggitabbanti dasseti.
tika-s0404t0:206_0: Ajjhattarūpānaṃ anabhibhavanīyatā ca tesaṃ bahiddhārūpānaṃ viya avibhūtattā desanāvilāso
tika-s0404t0:206_2: “Suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānī”ti eteneva siddhattā na nīlādiabhibhāyatanāni vattabbānīti ce?
tika-s0404t0:206_3: Taṃ na. Nīlādīsu katādhikārānaṃ nīlādibhāvasseva abhibhavanakāraṇattā. Na hi tesaṃ
tika-s0404t0:206_4: parisuddhāparisuddhavaṇṇānaṃ parittatā vā appamāṇatā vā abhibhavanakāraṇaṃ, atha
tika-s0404t0:206_5: kho nīlādibhāvo evāti. Etesu ca parittādikasiṇarūpesu yaṃ yaṃ caritassa imāni abhibhāyatanāni
tika-s0404t0:206_6: ijjhanti, taṃ dassetuṃ “imesu panā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Sabbasaṅgāhikavasenāti nīlavaṇṇanīlanidassananīlanibhāsānaṃ
tika-s0404t0:209_0: 66. Chaṭṭhe kenaṭṭhenāti kena sabhāvena. Sabhāvo hi ñāṇena yāthāvato araṇīyato ñātabbato
tika-s0404t0:209_1: “attho”ti vuccati, so eva ttha-kārassa ṭṭha-kāraṃ katvā “aṭṭho”ti vutto. Adhimuccanaṭṭhenāti
tika-s0404t0:209_2: adhikaṃ savisesaṃ muccanaṭṭhena. Etena satipi sabbassapi rūpāvacarajjhānassa vikkhambhanavasena
tika-s0404t0:209_3: paṭipakkhato vimuttabhāve yena bhāvanāvisesena taṃ jhānaṃ sātisayaṃ paṭipakkhato
tika-s0404t0:209_4: vimuccitvā pavattati, so bhāvanāviseso dīpito. Bhavati hi samānajātiyuttopi bhāvanāvisesena
tika-s0404t0:209_5: pavattiākāraviseso. Yathā taṃ saddhāvimuttato diṭṭhippattassa, tathā paccanīkadhammehi
tika-s0404t0:209_6: suṭṭhu vimuttatāya eva aniggahitabhāvena nirāsaṅkatāya abhirativasena suṭṭhu adhimuccanaṭṭhenapi
tika-s0404t0:209_7: vimokkho. Tenāha “ārammaṇe cā”tiādi. Ayaṃ panatthoti ayaṃ adhimuccanaṭṭho pacchime
tika-s0404t0:209_8: vimokkhe nirodhe natthi. Kevalo vimuttaṭṭho eva tattha labbhati, taṃ sayameva parato vakkhati.
tika-s0404t0:210_0: Rūpīti yenāyaṃ sasantatipariyāpannena rūpena samannāgato, taṃ yassa jhānassa hetubhāvena
tika-s0404t0:210_1: visiṭṭharūpaṃ hoti, yena visiṭṭhena rūpena “rūpī”ti vucceyya rūpīsaddassa atisayatthadīpanato,
tika-s0404t0:210_2: tadeva sasantatipariyāpannarūpassa vasena paṭiladdhajjhānaṃ idha paramatthato rūpibhāvasādhakanti
tika-s0404t0:210_3: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenāha “ajjhatta”ntiādi. Rūpajjhānaṃ rūpaṃ uttarapadalopena. Rūpānīti
tika-s0404t0:210_4: panettha purimapadalopo daṭṭhabbo. Tena vuttaṃ “nīlakasiṇādīni rūpānī”ti. Rūpe kasiṇarūpe
tika-s0404t0:210_5: saññā rūpasaññā, sā etassa atthīti rūpasaññī, saññāsīsena jhānaṃ vadati. Tappaṭipakkhena
tika-s0404t0:211_0: Anto appanāyaṃ “subha”nti ābhogo natthīti iminā pubbābhogavasena tathā adhimutti
tika-s0404t0:211_1: siyāti dasseti. Evañhettha tathāvattabbatāpatticodanā anavaṭṭhānā hoti. Yasmā suvisuddhesu
tika-s0404t0:211_2: nīlādīsu vaṇṇakasiṇesu tattha katādhikārānaṃ abhirativasena suṭṭhu adhimuccanaṭṭho
tika-s0404t0:211_3: sambhavati, tasmā aṭṭhakathāyaṃ tathā tatiyo vimokkho saṃvaṇṇito. Yasmā pana mettādivasena
tika-s0404t0:211_4: pavattamānā bhāvanā satte appaṭikūlato dahanti, te subhato adhimuccitvā pavattati,
tika-s0404t0:211_5: tasmā paṭisambhidāmagge brahmavihārabhāvanā “subhavimokkho”ti vuttā. Tayidaṃ ubhayampi
tika-s0404t0:211_6: tena tena pariyāyena vuttattā na virujjhatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:212_0: Sabbasoti anavasesato. Na hi catunnaṃ arūpakkhandhānaṃ ekadesopi tattha avasissati.
tika-s0404t0:212_1: Vissaṭṭhattāti yathāparicchinnakāle nirodhitattā. Uttamo vimokkho nāma ariyeheva
tika-s0404t0:212_2: samāpajjitabbato ariyaphalapariyosānattā diṭṭheva dhamme nibbānappattibhāvato ca.
tika-s0404t0:215_0: 67. Sattame anariyānaṃ lāmakānaṃ vohāro anariyavohāro. Diṭṭhavāditāti diṭṭhaṃ mayāti
tika-s0404t0:215_1: evaṃ vāditā. Evaṃ sesesupi. Ettha ca taṃtaṃsamuṭṭhāpakacetanāvasena attho veditabbo.
tika-s0404t0:218_0: 69. Navame samāgantabbato, samāgacchatīti vā samāgamo, parisā. Bimbisārappamukho
tika-s0404t0:218_1: samāgamo bimbisārasamāgamo. Sesadvayepi eseva nayo. Bimbisāra…pe… samāgamasadisaṃ
tika-s0404t0:218_2: khattiyaparisanti yojanā. Aññesu cakkavāḷesupi labbhateva satthu khattiyaparisādiupasaṅkamanaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:218_3: Ādito tehi saddhiṃ satthu bhāsanaṃ ālāpo, kathanappaṭikathanaṃ sallāpo. Dhammūpasaṃhitā
tika-s0404t0:218_4: pucchāpaṭipucchā dhammasākacchā. Saṇṭhānaṃ paṭicca kathitaṃ saṇṭhānapariyāyattā vaṇṇa-saddassa
tika-s0404t0:218_5: “mahantaṃ hatthirājavaṇṇaṃ abhinimminitvā”tiādīsu viya. Tesanti padaṃ ubhayapadāpekkhaṃ
tika-s0404t0:218_6: “tesampi lakkhaṇasaṇṭhānaṃ viya satthu sarīrasaṇṭhānaṃ tesaṃ kevalaṃ paññāyati evā”ti.
tika-s0404t0:218_7: Nāpi āmuttamaṇikuṇḍalo bhagavā hotīti yojanā. Chinnassarāti dvidhā bhinnassarā. Gaggarassarāti
tika-s0404t0:218_8: jajjaritassarā. Bhāsantaranti tesaṃ sattānaṃ bhāsāto aññaṃ bhāsaṃ. Vīmaṃsāti cintanā.
tika-s0404t0:218_9: Kimatthaṃ…pe… desetīti idaṃ nanu attānaṃ jānāpetvā dhamme kathite tesaṃ sātisayo
tika-s0404t0:218_10: pasādo hotīti iminā adhippāyena vuttaṃ? Yesaṃ attānaṃ ajānāpetvāva dhamme kathite
tika-s0404t0:218_11: pasādo hoti, na jānāpetvā, tādise sandhāya satthā tathā karoti. Tattha payojanamāha
tika-s0404t0:218_12: “vāsanatthāyā”ti. Evaṃ sutopīti evaṃ aviññātadesako aviññātāgamanopi suto dhammo
tika-s0404t0:218_13: attano dhammasudhammatāyeva anāgate paccayo hoti suṇantassa.
tika-s0404t0:221_0: 70. Dasame udenayakkhassa cetiyaṭṭhāneti udenassa nāma yakkhassa āyatanabhāvena iṭṭhakāhi
tika-s0404t0:221_1: kate mahājanassa cittīkataṭṭhāne. Katavihāroti bhagavantaṃ uddissa katavihāro. Vuccatīti
tika-s0404t0:221_3: Eseva nayoti cetiyaṭṭhāne katavihārabhāvaṃ atidisati. Tathā hi sattambanti kikissa
tika-s0404t0:221_4: rañño dhītaro satta kumāriyo saṃvegajātā gehato nikkhamitvā tattha padhānaṃ padahiṃsu,
tika-s0404t0:221_5: taṃ ṭhānaṃ “sattambaṃ cetiya”nti vadanti. Bahuputtakanti ca bahupāroho eko nigrodharukkho,
tika-s0404t0:221_6: tasmiṃ adhivatthaṃ devataṃ bahū manussā putte patthenti, tadupādāya taṃ ṭhānaṃ “bahuputtakaṃ
tika-s0404t0:221_7: cetiya”nti paññāyittha. Sārandadassa nāma yakkhassa vasitaṭṭhānaṃ, cāpālassa nāma
tika-s0404t0:221_8: yakkhassa vasitaṭṭhānaṃ, iti sabbānevetāni buddhuppādato pubbadevatā pariggahetvā
tika-s0404t0:221_9: cetiyavohārena voharitāni, bhagavato vihāre katepi tatheva sañjānanti. Ramaṇīyāti
tika-s0404t0:221_10: ettha vesāliyā tāva bhūmibhāgasampattiyā sulabhapiṇḍatāya ramaṇīyabhāvo veditabbo.
tika-s0404t0:221_11: Vihārānaṃ pana nagarato nātidūratāya naccāsannatāya gamanāgamanasampattiyā anākiṇṇavihāraṭṭhānatāya
tika-s0404t0:222_0: Vaḍḍhitāti bhāvanāpāripūrivasena paribrūhitā. Punappunaṃ katāti bhāvanāya bahulīkaraṇena
tika-s0404t0:222_1: aparāparaṃ pavattitā. Yuttayānaṃ viya katāti yathā yuttamājaññayānaṃ chekena sārathinā
tika-s0404t0:222_2: adhiṭṭhitaṃ yathāruci pavattati, evaṃ yathāruci pavattirahataṃ gamitā. Patiṭṭhānaṭṭhenāti
tika-s0404t0:222_3: adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena. Vatthu viya katāti sabbaso upakkilesavisodhanena iddhivisayatāya
tika-s0404t0:222_4: patiṭṭhānabhāvato suvisodhitaparissayavatthu viya katā. Adhiṭṭhitāti paṭipakkhadūrībhāvato
tika-s0404t0:222_5: subhāvitabhāvena taṃtaṃadhiṭṭhānayogyatāya ṭhapitā. Samantato citāti sabbabhāgena
tika-s0404t0:222_6: bhāvanupacayaṃ gamitā. Tenāha “suvaḍḍhitā”ti. Suṭṭhu samāraddhāti iddhibhāvanāya
tika-s0404t0:223_1: niyametvā. Āyuppamāṇanti paramāyuppamāṇaṃ vadati. Kiṃ panettha paramāyu nāma, kathaṃ
tika-s0404t0:223_2: vā taṃ paricchinnappamāṇanti? Vuccate – yo tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhavavisese
tika-s0404t0:223_6: So yathāsakaṃ khaṇamattāvaṭṭhāyīnampi attano sahajātānaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ ṭhapanākāravuttitāya
tika-s0404t0:223_7: pavattanakāni rūpārūpajīvitindriyāni yasmā na kevalaṃ tesaṃ khaṇaṭhitiyā eva kāraṇabhāvena
tika-s0404t0:223_8: anupālakāni, atha kho yāva bhavaṅgupacchedā anupabandhassa avicchedahetubhāvenapi,
tika-s0404t0:223_9: tasmā āyuhetukattā kāraṇūpacārena āyu, ukkaṃsaparicchedavasena paramāyūti ca vuccati.
tika-s0404t0:223_10: Taṃ pana devānaṃ nerayikānaṃ uttarakurukānañca niyataparicchedaṃ. Uttarakurukānaṃ
tika-s0404t0:223_13: vasena cirācirakālato aniyataparicchedaṃ, tassa ca yathā purimasiddhabhavapatthanāvasena
tika-s0404t0:223_15: ādito gahaṇasiddhiyā. Evaṃ tāsu tāsu upapattīsu nibbattasattānaṃ yebhuyyena samappamāṇaṭṭhitikālaṃ
tika-s0404t0:223_16: dassanānussavehi labhitvā taṃparamataṃ ajjhosāya pavattitabhavapatthanāvasena ādito
tika-s0404t0:223_17: paricchedaniyamo veditabbo. Yasmā pana kammaṃ tāsu tāsu upapattīsu yathā taṃtaṃupapattiniyatavaṇṇādinibbattane
tika-s0404t0:223_18: samatthaṃ, evaṃ niyatāyuparicchedāsu upapattīsu paricchedātikkamena vipākanibbattane
tika-s0404t0:223_19: samatthaṃ na hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ “tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle yaṃ manussānaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ, taṃ
tika-s0404t0:224_0: Mahāsīvatthero pana “mahābodhisattānaṃ carimabhave paṭisandhidāyino kammassa asaṅkhyeyyāyukatāsaṃvattanasamatthataṃ
tika-s0404t0:224_1: hadaye ṭhapetvā buddhānañca āyusaṅkhārassa parissayavikkhambhanasamatthatā pāḷiyaṃ
tika-s0404t0:224_2: āgatā evāti imaṃ bhaddakappameva tiṭṭheyyā”ti avoca. Khaṇḍiccādīhi abhibhuyyatīti
tika-s0404t0:224_3: etena yathā iddhibalena jarāya na paṭighāto, evaṃ tena maraṇassapi na paṭighātoti
tika-s0404t0:224_4: atthato āpannamevāti. “Kva saro khitto, kva ca nipatito”ti aññathā vuṭṭhitenapi theravādena
tika-s0404t0:224_5: aṭṭhakathāvacanameva samatthitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenāha “yo pana vuccati…pe… niyāmita”nti.
tika-s0404t0:225_0: Oḷārike nimitteti thūle saññuppādane. Thūlasaññuppādanañhetaṃ “tiṭṭhatu bhagavā kappa”nti
tika-s0404t0:225_1: sakalaṃ kappaṃ avaṭṭhānayācanāya, yadidaṃ “yassa kassaci, ānanda, cattāro iddhipādā
tika-s0404t0:225_2: bhāvitā”tiādinā aññāpadesena attano caturiddhipādabhāvanānubhāvena kappaṃ avaṭṭhānasamatthatāvibhāvanaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:225_3: Obhāseti pākaṭavacane. Pākaṭavacanañhetaṃ, yadidaṃ pariyāyaṃ muñcitvā ujukameva attano
tika-s0404t0:225_4: adhippāyavibhāvanaṃ. Pariyuṭṭhitacittoti yathā kiñci atthānatthaṃ sallakkhetuṃ na
tika-s0404t0:225_5: sakkā, evaṃ abhibhūtacitto. So pana abhibhavo mahatā udakoghena appakassa udakassa
tika-s0404t0:225_6: ajjhottharaṇaṃ viya ahosīti vuttaṃ “ajjhotthaṭacitto”ti. Aññoti therato, ariyehi
tika-s0404t0:225_7: vā aññopi yo koci puthujjano. Puthujjanaggahaṇañcettha yathā sabbena sabbaṃ appahīnavipallāso
tika-s0404t0:225_8: mārena pariyuṭṭhitacitto kiñci atthānatthaṃ sallakkhetuṃ na sakkoti, evaṃ thero bhagavatā
tika-s0404t0:225_9: katanimittobhāsaṃ sabbaso na sallakkhesīti dassanatthaṃ. Tenāha “māro hī”tiādi.
tika-s0404t0:226_0: Cattāro vipallāsāti asubhe “subha”nti saññāvipallāso, cittavipallāso, dukkhe “sukha”nti
tika-s0404t0:226_1: saññāvipallāso, cittavipallāsoti ime cattāro vipallāsā. Tenāti yadipi itare aṭṭha
tika-s0404t0:226_2: vipallāsā pahīnā, tathāpi yathāvuttānaṃ catunnaṃ vipallāsānaṃ appahīnabhāvena. Assāti
tika-s0404t0:226_3: therassa. Maddatīti phusanamattena maddanto viya hoti, aññathā tena maddite sattānaṃ
tika-s0404t0:226_4: maraṇameva siyā. Kiṃ sakkhissati, na sakkhissatīti adhippāyo. Kasmā na sakkhissati,
tika-s0404t0:226_5: nanu esa aggasāvakassa kucchiṃ paviṭṭhoti? Saccaṃ paviṭṭho, tañca kho attano ānubhāvadassanatthaṃ,
tika-s0404t0:226_6: na vibādhanādhippāyena. Vibādhanādhippāyena pana idha “kiṃ sakkhissatī”ti vuttaṃ
tika-s0404t0:226_7: hadayamaddanassa adhikatattā. Nimittobhāsanti ettha “tiṭṭhatu bhagavā kappa”nti sakalakappaṃ
tika-s0404t0:226_8: avaṭṭhānayācanāya “yassa kassaci, ānanda, cattāro iddhipādā bhāvitā”tiādinā aññāpadesena
tika-s0404t0:226_10: nimittaṃ. Tathā pana pariyāyaṃ muñcitvā ujukameva attano adhippāyavibhāvanaṃ obhāso.
tika-s0404t0:226_11: Jānantoyevāti mārena pariyuṭṭhitabhāvaṃ jānantoyeva. Attano aparādhahetuto sattānaṃ
tika-s0404t0:226_12: soko tanuko hoti, na balavāti āha “dosāropanena sokatanukaraṇattha”nti. Kiṃ pana
tika-s0404t0:226_13: thero mārena pariyuṭṭhitacittakāle pavattiṃ pacchā jānātīti? Na jānāti sabhāvena,
tika-s0404t0:227_0: Gaccha tvaṃ, ānandāti yasmā divāvihāratthāya idhāgato, tasmā, ānanda, gaccha tvaṃ
tika-s0404t0:227_1: yathārucitaṭṭhānaṃ divāvihārāya. Tenāha “yassadāni kālaṃ maññasī”ti. Anatthe niyojento
tika-s0404t0:227_2: guṇamāraṇena māreti, virāgavibandhanena vā jātinimittatāya tattha tattha jātaṃ mārento
tika-s0404t0:227_3: viya hotīti “māretīti māro”ti vuttaṃ. Ati viya pāpatāya pāpimā. Kaṇhadhammehi samannāgato
tika-s0404t0:227_4: kaṇho. Virāgādiguṇānaṃ antakaraṇato antako. Sattānaṃ anatthāvahaṃ paṭipattiṃ na muñcatīti
tika-s0404t0:227_5: namuci. Attano mārapāsena pamatte bandhati, pamattā vā bandhū etassāti pamattabandhu.
tika-s0404t0:227_6: Sattamasattāhato paraṃ satta ahāni sandhāyāha “aṭṭhame sattāhe”ti na pana pallaṅkasattāhādi
tika-s0404t0:227_7: viya niyatakiccassa aṭṭhamasattāhassa nāma labbhanato. Sattamasattāhassa hi parato
tika-s0404t0:227_8: ajapālanigrodhamūle mahābrahmuno sakkassa ca devarañño paṭiññātadhammadesanaṃ bhagavantaṃ
tika-s0404t0:227_9: ñatvā “idāni satte dhammadesanāya mama visayaṃ samatikkamāpessatī”ti sañjātadomanasso
tika-s0404t0:227_10: hutvā ṭhito cintesi – “handa dānāhaṃ naṃ upāyena parinibbāpessāmi, evamassa manoratho
tika-s0404t0:227_11: aññathattaṃ gamissati, mama ca manoratho ijjhissatī”ti. Evaṃ pana cintetvā bhagavantaṃ
tika-s0404t0:227_12: upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito “parinibbātu dāni, bhante, bhagavā”tiādinā parinibbānaṃ
tika-s0404t0:227_13: yāci. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “aṭṭhame sattāhe”tiādi. Tattha ajjāti āyusaṅkhārossajjanadivasaṃ
tika-s0404t0:227_14: sandhāyāha. Bhagavā cassa atibandhanādhippāyaṃ jānantopi taṃ anāvikatvā parinibbānassa
tika-s0404t0:227_15: akālabhāvameva pakāsento yācanaṃ paṭikkhipi. Tenāha “na tāvāha”ntiādi.
tika-s0404t0:228_0: Maggavasena byattāti saccasampaṭivedhaveyyattiyena byattā. Tatheva vinītāti maggavaseneva
tika-s0404t0:228_1: kilesānaṃ samucchedavinayena vinītā. Tathā visāradāti ariyamaggādhigameneva satthusāsane
tika-s0404t0:228_3: visāradabhāvaṃ pattāti attho. Yassa sutassa vasena vaṭṭadukkhato nissaraṇaṃ sambhavati,
tika-s0404t0:228_4: taṃ idha ukkaṭṭhaniddesena sutanti adhippetanti āha “tepiṭakavasenā”ti. Tiṇṇaṃ piṭakānaṃ
tika-s0404t0:228_5: samūho tepiṭakaṃ, tīṇi vā piṭakāni tipiṭakaṃ, tipiṭakameva tepiṭakaṃ, tassa vasena.
tika-s0404t0:228_6: Tamevāti yaṃ taṃ tepiṭakaṃ sotabbabhāvena “suta”nti vuttaṃ, tameva. Dhammanti pariyattidhammaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:228_7: Dhārentīti suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittasīhavasaṃ viya avinassantaṃ katvā suppaguṇasuppavattibhāvena
tika-s0404t0:228_8: dhārenti hadaye ṭhapenti. Iti pariyattidhammavasena bahussutadhammadharabhāvaṃ dassetvā
tika-s0404t0:228_9: idāni paṭivedhadhammavasenapi taṃ dassetuṃ “atha vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ariyadhammassāti
tika-s0404t0:228_10: maggaphaladhammassa, navavidhassapi vā lokuttaradhammassa. Anudhammabhūtanti adhigamāya
tika-s0404t0:228_11: anurūpadhammabhūtaṃ. Anucchavikappaṭipadanti ca tameva vipassanādhammamāha, chabbidhā
tika-s0404t0:228_12: visuddhiyo vā. Anudhammanti tassā yathāvuttappaṭipadāya anurūpaṃ abhisallekhitaṃ
tika-s0404t0:228_13: appichatādidhammaṃ. Caraṇasīlāti samādāya vattanasīlā. Anumaggaphaladhammo etissāti
tika-s0404t0:228_14: vā anudhammā, vuṭṭhānagāminī vipassanā. Tassā caraṇasīlā. Attano ācariyavādanti attano
tika-s0404t0:228_15: ācariyassa sammāsambuddhassa vādaṃ. Sadevakassa lokassa ācārasikkhāpanena ācariyo,
tika-s0404t0:229_0: Ācikkhissantīti ādito kathessanti, attanā uggahitaniyāmena pare uggaṇhāpessantīti
tika-s0404t0:229_1: attho. Desessantīti vācessanti, pāḷiṃ sammā pabodhessantīti attho. Paññapessantīti
tika-s0404t0:229_2: pajānāpessanti, saṅkāsessantīti attho. Paṭṭhapessantīti pakārehi ṭhapessanti, pakāsessantīti
tika-s0404t0:229_3: attho. Vivarissantīti vivaṭaṃ karissanti. Vibhajissantīti vibhattaṃ karissanti. Uttānīkarissantīti
tika-s0404t0:229_4: anuttānaṃ gambhīraṃ uttānaṃ pākaṭaṃ karissanti. Sahadhammenāti ettha dhamma-saddo
tika-s0404t0:229_5: kāraṇapariyāyo “hetumhi ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā”tiādīsu viyāti āha “sahetukena sakāraṇena
tika-s0404t0:229_6: vacanenā”ti. Sappāṭihāriyanti sanissaraṇaṃ. Yathā paravādaṃ bhañjitvā sakavādo patiṭṭhahati,
tika-s0404t0:229_7: evaṃ hetudāharaṇehi yathādhigatamatthaṃ sampādetvā dhammaṃ kathessanti. Tenāha “niyyānikaṃ
tika-s0404t0:229_8: katvā dhammaṃ desessantī”ti, navavidhaṃ lokuttaradhammaṃ pabodhessantīti attho. Ettha
tika-s0404t0:229_9: ca “paññapessantī”tiādīhi chahi padehi cha atthapadāni dassitāni, ādito pana dvīhi
tika-s0404t0:229_10: padehi cha byañjanapadāni. Ettāvatā tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ saṃvaṇṇanānayena saṅgahetvā
tika-s0404t0:229_11: dassitaṃ hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ nettiyaṃ “dvādasa padāni suttaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ byañjanañca attho cā”ti.
tika-s0404t0:230_1: anavasesaṃ satthusāsanabhūtaṃ seṭṭhacariyaṃ. Samiddhanti sammadeva vaḍḍhitaṃ. Jhānassādavasenāti
tika-s0404t0:230_2: tehi tehi bhikkhūhi samadhigatajjhānasukhavasena. Vuddhippattanti uḷārapaṇītabhāvūpagamena
tika-s0404t0:230_3: sabbaso parivuddhimupagataṃ. Sabbapāliphullaṃ viya abhiññāsampattivasena abhiññāsampadāhi
tika-s0404t0:230_5: attho. Paṭivedhavasena bahuno janassa hitanti bāhujaññaṃ. Tenāha “mahājanābhisamayavasenā”ti.
tika-s0404t0:230_6: Puthu puthulaṃ bhūtaṃ jātaṃ, puthu vā puthuttaṃ pattanti puthubhūtaṃ. Tenāha “sabbā…pe...
tika-s0404t0:230_7: patta”nti. Suṭṭhu pakāsitanti suṭṭhu sammadeva ādikalyāṇādibhāvena paveditaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:231_0: Satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvāti ayaṃ kāyādivibhāgo attabhāvasaññito dukkhabhāro mayā ettakaṃ
tika-s0404t0:231_1: kālaṃ vahito, idāni pana na vahitabbo, etassa avahanatthañhi cirataraṃ kālaṃ ariyamaggasambhāro
tika-s0404t0:231_2: sambhato, svāyaṃ ariyamaggo paṭividdho. Yato ime kāyādayo asubhādito sabhāvādito
tika-s0404t0:231_3: sammadeva pariññātāti catubbidhampi sammāsatiṃ yatātathaṃ visaye suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitaṃ
tika-s0404t0:231_4: katvā. Ñāṇena paricchinditvāti imassa attabhāvasaññitassa dukkhabhārassa vahane payojanabhūtaṃ
tika-s0404t0:231_5: attahitaṃ tāva bodhimūle eva parisamāpitaṃ, parahitaṃ pana buddhaveneyyavinayaṃ parisamāpitabbaṃ,
tika-s0404t0:231_6: taṃ idāni māsattayeneva parisamāpanaṃ pāpuṇissati, ahampi visākhāpuṇṇamāyaṃ parinibbāyissāmīti
tika-s0404t0:231_7: evaṃ buddhañāṇena paricchinditvā sabbabhāgena nicchayaṃ katvā. Āyusaṅkhāraṃ vissajjīti
tika-s0404t0:231_8: āyuno jīvitassa abhisaṅkhārakaṃ phalasamāpattidhammaṃ na samāpajjissāmīti vissajji.
tika-s0404t0:231_9: Taṃvissajjaneneva tena abhisaṅkhariyamānaṃ jīvitasaṅkhāraṃ “na pavattessāmī”ti vissajji.
tika-s0404t0:232_0: Ṭhānamahantatāyapi pavattiākāramahantatāyapi mahanto pathavīkampo. Tattha ṭhānamahantatāya
tika-s0404t0:232_1: bhūmicālassa mahantattaṃ dassetuṃ “tadā kira…pe… kampitthā”ti vuttaṃ. Sā pana jābhikkhettabhūtā
tika-s0404t0:232_2: dasasahassī lokadhātu eva, na yā kāci. Yā mahābhinīhāramahābhijātiādīsupi kampittha,
tika-s0404t0:232_3: tadāpi tattikāya eva kampane kiṃ kāraṇaṃ? Jātikkhettabhāvena tasseva ādito pariggahassa
tika-s0404t0:232_4: katattā, pariggahakaraṇaṃ cassa dhammatāvasena veditabbaṃ. Tathā hi purimabuddhānampi
tika-s0404t0:232_5: tāvattakameva jātikkhettaṃ ahosi. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “dasasahassī lokadhātu, nissaddā
tika-s0404t0:232_6: hoti nirākulā…pe… mahāsamuddo ābhujati, dasasahassī pakampatī”ti ca ādi. Udakapariyantaṃ
tika-s0404t0:232_7: katvā chappakārapavedhanena avītarāge bhiṃsetīti bhiṃsano, so eva bhiṃsanakoti āha
tika-s0404t0:232_9: kāci bherī “dundubhī”ti adhippetā, atha kho uppātabhāvena labbhamāno ākāsagato nigghosasaddo.
tika-s0404t0:232_10: Tenāha “devo”tiādi. Devoti megho. Tassa hi gajjabhāvena ākāsassa vassābhāvena sukkhagajjitasaññite
tika-s0404t0:232_11: sadde niccharante devadundubhisamaññā. Tenāha “devo sukkhagajjitaṃ gajjī”ti.
tika-s0404t0:233_0: Pītivegavissaṭṭhanti “evaṃ cirataraṃ kālaṃ vahito ayaṃ attabhāvasaññito dukkhabhāro,
tika-s0404t0:233_1: idāni na cirasseva nikkhipissāmī”ti sañjātasomanasso bhagavā sabhāveneva pītivegavissaṭṭhaṃ
tika-s0404t0:233_2: udānaṃ udānesi. Evaṃ pana udānentena ayampi attho sādhito hotīti dassanatthaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
tika-s0404t0:234_0: Tulīyatīti tulanti tula-saddo kammasādhanoti dassetuṃ “tulita”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Appānubhāvatāya
tika-s0404t0:234_1: paricchinnaṃ. Tathā hi taṃ parito khaṇḍitabhāvena “paritta”nti vuccati. Paṭipakkhavikkhambhanato
tika-s0404t0:234_2: dīghasantānatāya vipulaphalatāya ca na tulaṃ na paricchinnaṃ. Yehi kāraṇehi pubbe
tika-s0404t0:234_3: avisesato mahaggataṃ “atula”nti vuttaṃ, tāni kāraṇāni rūpāvacarato arūpassa sātisayāni
tika-s0404t0:234_4: vijjantīti arūpāvacaraṃ “atula”nti vuttaṃ itarañca “tula”nti. Appavipākanti tīsupi
tika-s0404t0:234_5: kammesu yaṃ tanuvipākaṃ hīnaṃ, taṃ tulaṃ. Bahuvipākanti yaṃ mahāvipākaṃ paṇītaṃ,
tika-s0404t0:234_6: taṃ atulaṃ. Yaṃ panettha majjhimaṃ, taṃ hīnaṃ ukkaṭṭhanti dvidhā bhinditvā dvīsupi
tika-s0404t0:234_7: bhāgesu pakkhipitabbaṃ. Hīnattikavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayena vā appabahuvipākataṃ niddhāretvā
tika-s0404t0:234_8: tassa vasena tulātulabhāvo veditabbo. Sambhavati etasmāti sambhavoti āha “sambhavahetubhūta”nti.
tika-s0404t0:234_9: Niyakajjhattaratoti sasantānadhammesu vipassanāvasena gocarāsevanāya ca nirato. Savipākampi
tika-s0404t0:234_10: samānaṃ pavattivipākamattadāyikammaṃ savipākaṭṭhena sambhavaṃ, na ca taṃ kāmādibhavābhisaṅkhārakanti
tika-s0404t0:234_11: tato visesanatthaṃ “sambhava”nti vatvā “bhavasaṅkhāra”nti vuttaṃ. Ossajīti ariyamaggena
tika-s0404t0:234_12: avassaji. Kavacaṃ viya attabhāvaṃ pariyonandhitvā ṭhitaṃ attani sambhūtattā attasambhavaṃ
tika-s0404t0:234_13: kilesañca abhindīti kilesabhedasahabhāvikammossajjanaṃ dassento tadubhayassa kāraṇamavoca
tika-s0404t0:235_0: Paṭhamavikappe avasajjanameva vuttaṃ, ettha avasajjanākāroti taṃ dassento “atha vā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0404t0:235_1: Tattha tīrentoti “uppādo bhayaṃ, anuppādo khema”ntiādinā vīmaṃsanto. “Tulento tīrento”tiādinā
tika-s0404t0:235_2: saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ “pañcakkhandhā”tiādiṃ vatvā bhavasaṅkhārassa
tika-s0404t0:235_3: avasajjanākāraṃ sarūpato dasseti. Evantiādinā pana udānagāthāvaṇṇanāyaṃ ādito vuttamatthaṃ
tika-s0404t0:236_0: Yanti karaṇe, adhikaraṇe vā paccattavacananti āha “yena samayena, yasmiṃ vā samaye”ti.
tika-s0404t0:236_1: Ukkhepakavātāti udakasandhārakavātaṃ upacchinditvā ṭhitaṭṭhānato khepakavātā. Saṭṭhi…pe…
tika-s0404t0:236_2: bahalanti idaṃ tassa vātassa ubbedhappamāṇameva gahetvā vuttaṃ, āyāmavitthārato pana
tika-s0404t0:236_4: upacchindatiyeva. Ākāseti pubbe vātena patiṭṭhitākāse. Puna vātoti ukkhepakavāte
tika-s0404t0:236_5: tathā katvā vigate udakasandhārakavāto puna ābandhitvā gaṇhāti. Yathā taṃ udakaṃ
tika-s0404t0:236_6: na bhassati, evaṃ upatthambhentaṃ ābandhanavitānavasena bandhitvā gaṇhāti. Tato udakaṃ
tika-s0404t0:236_7: uggacchatīti tato ābandhitvā gahaṇato tena vātena uṭṭhāpitaṃ udakaṃ uggacchati upari
tika-s0404t0:236_8: gacchati. Hotiyevāti antarantarā hotiyeva. Bahubhāvenāti mahāpathaviyā mahantabhāvena.
tika-s0404t0:236_9: Sakalā hi mahāpathavī tadā oggacchati ca uggacchati ca, tasmā kampanaṃ na paññāyati.
tika-s0404t0:237_1: paṭiladdhamattā nātisubhāvitā. Tathā ca bhāvanā balavatī na hotīti āha “dubbalā”ti.
tika-s0404t0:237_2: Saññāsīsena hi bhāvanā vuttā. Appamāṇāti paguṇā subhāvitā. Sā hi thirā daḷhatarā
tika-s0404t0:237_3: hotīti āha “balavā”ti. “Parittā pathavīsaññā, appamāṇā āposaññā”ti desanāmattametaṃ,
tika-s0404t0:237_4: āposaññāya pana subhāvitāya pathavīkampo sukheneva ijjhatīti ayamettha adhippāyo
tika-s0404t0:237_5: veditabbo. Saṃvejento vā dibbasampattiyā pamattaṃ sakkaṃ devarājānaṃ, vīmaṃsanto
tika-s0404t0:237_6: vā tāvadeva samadhigataṃ attano iddhibalaṃ. So kirāyasmā khuragge arahattaṃ patvā
tika-s0404t0:237_7: cintesi – “atthi nu kho koci bhikkhu yena pabbajitadivaseyeva arahattaṃ patvā vejayanto
tika-s0404t0:237_8: pāsādo kampitapubbo”ti. Tato “natthi kocī”ti ñatvā “ahaṃ kampessāmī”ti abhiññābalena
tika-s0404t0:237_9: vejayantamatthake ṭhatvā pādena paharitvā kampetuṃ nāsakkhi. Atha naṃ sakkassa nāṭakitthiyo
tika-s0404t0:237_10: āhaṃsu – “putta saṅgharakkhita, tvaṃ pūtigandheneva sīsena vejayantaṃ kampetuṃ icchasi,
tika-s0404t0:237_11: suppatiṭṭhito, tāta, pāsādo, kathaṃ kampetuṃ sakkhissasī”ti.
tika-s0404t0:238_0: Sāmaṇero “imā devatā mayā saddhiṃ keḷiṃ karonti, ahaṃ kho pana ācariyaṃ nālatthaṃ,
tika-s0404t0:238_1: kahaṃ nu kho me ācariyo sāmuddikamahānāgatthero”ti āvajjetvā “mahāsamudde udakaleṇaṃ
tika-s0404t0:238_2: māpetvā divāvihāraṃ nisinno”ti ñatvā tattha gantvā theraṃ vanditvā aṭṭhāsi. Tato
tika-s0404t0:238_3: naṃ thero, “tāta saṅgharakkhita, asikkhitvāva yuddhaṃ paviṭṭhosī”ti vatvā “nāsakkhi,
tika-s0404t0:238_4: tāta, vejayantaṃ kampetu”nti pucchi. Ācariyaṃ, bhante, nālatthanti. Atha naṃ thero,
tika-s0404t0:238_5: “tāta, tumhādise akampente añño ko kampessati, diṭṭhapubbaṃ te, tāta, udakapiṭṭhe
tika-s0404t0:238_6: gomayakhaṇḍaṃ pilavantaṃ, tāta, kapallapūvaṃ paccantaṃ antantena paricchinnanti iminā
tika-s0404t0:238_7: opammena jānāhī”ti āha. So “vaṭṭissati, bhante, ettakenā”ti vatvā “pāsādena patiṭṭhitokāsaṃ
tika-s0404t0:238_8: udakaṃ hotū”ti adhiṭṭhāya vejayantābhimukho agamāsi. Devadhītaro taṃ disvā “ekavāraṃ
tika-s0404t0:238_9: lajjitvā gato, punapi sāmaṇero eti, punapi etī”ti vadiṃsu. Sakko devarājā “mā mayhaṃ
tika-s0404t0:238_10: puttena saddhiṃ kathayittha, idāni tena ācariyo laddho khaṇena pāsādaṃ kampessatī”ti
tika-s0404t0:238_11: āha. Sāmaṇeropi pādaṅguṭṭhena pāsādathūpikaṃ pahari, pāsādo catūhi disāhi oṇamati.
tika-s0404t0:238_12: Devatā “patiṭṭhātuṃ dehi, tāta, pāsādassa, patiṭṭhātuṃ dehi, tāta, pāsādassā”ti viraviṃsu.
tika-s0404t0:238_13: Sāmaṇero pāsādaṃ yathāṭhāne ṭhapetvā pāsādamatthake ṭhatvā udānaṃ udānesi –
tika-s0404t0:245_0: “Dhammatā esā, bhikkhave, yadā bodhisatto tusitakāyā cavitvā mātukucchiṃ okkamatī”ti
tika-s0404t0:245_1: vatvā “ayañca dasasahassī lokadhātu saṅkampi sampakampi sampavedhī”ti, tathā “dhammatā
tika-s0404t0:245_2: esā, bhikkhave, yadā bodhisatto mātukucchimhā nikkhamatī”ti vatvā “ayañca dasasahassī
tika-s0404t0:245_3: lokadhātu saṅkampi sampakampi sampavedhī”ti ca mahāsattassa gabbhokkantiyaṃ abhijātiñca
tika-s0404t0:245_4: dhammatāvasena mahāpadāne pathavīkampassa vuttattā itaresupi catūsu ṭhānesu pathavīkampo
tika-s0404t0:246_0: Idāni nesaṃ pathavīkampānaṃ kāraṇato pavattiākārato ca vibhāgaṃ dassetuṃ “iti imesū”tiādi
tika-s0404t0:246_1: vuttaṃ. Dhātukopenāti ukkhepakavātasaṅkhātāya vāyodhātuyā pakopena. Iddhānubhāvenāti
tika-s0404t0:246_2: ñāṇiddhiyā, kammavipākajiddhiyā vā sabhāvena, tejenāti attho. Puññatejenāti puññānubhāvena,
tika-s0404t0:246_3: mahābodhisattassa puññabalenāti attho. Ñāṇatejenāti anaññasādhāraṇena paṭivedhañāṇānubhāvena.
tika-s0404t0:246_5: abhisambodhiyaṃ kampittha, evaṃ anaññasādhāraṇena desanāñāṇānubhāvena abhihatā mahāpathavī
tika-s0404t0:246_6: kampittha, taṃ panassā sādhukāradānaṃ viya hotīti “sādhukāradānavasenā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:247_2: paramukkaṃsagato asamo asamasamo appaṭipuggalo arahaṃ sammāsambuddho attano attabhāvasaññitaṃ
tika-s0404t0:247_3: khandhapañcakaṃ kappaṃ vā kappāvasesaṃ vā ṭhapetuṃ samatthopi saṅkhatadhammaparijigucchanākārappavattena
tika-s0404t0:247_4: ñāṇavisesena tiṇāyapi amaññamāno āyusaṅkhārossajjanavidhinā nirapekkho ossajji. Tadanubhāvābhihatā
tika-s0404t0:247_5: mahāpathavī āyusaṅkharossajjane akampittha. Taṃ panassā kāruññasabhāvasaṇṭhitā viya
tika-s0404t0:248_0: Yasmā bhagavā parinibbānasamaye catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassasaṅkhā samāpattiyo samāpajji,
tika-s0404t0:248_1: antarantarā phalasamāpattisamāpajjanena tassa pubbabhāge sātisayaṃ tikkhaṃ sūraṃ
tika-s0404t0:248_2: vipassanāñāṇañca pavattesi. “Yadatthañca mayā evaṃ sucirakālaṃ anaññasādhāraṇo paramukkaṃsagato
tika-s0404t0:248_3: ñāṇasambhāro sambhato, anuttaro ca vimokkho samadhigato, tassa vata me sikhāppattaphalabhūtā
tika-s0404t0:248_4: accantaniṭṭhā anupādisesaparinibbānadhātu ajja samijjhatī”ti bhiyyo ativiya somanassappattassa
tika-s0404t0:248_6: yassa samāpattibalasamupabrūhitassa ñāṇātisayassa ānubhāvaṃ sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ
tika-s0404t0:248_7: “dveme piṇḍapātā samasamaphalā samasamavipākā”tiādi, tasmā tassānubhāvena samabhihatā
tika-s0404t0:248_8: mahāpathavī akampittha, taṃ panassā tassaṃ velāyaṃ ārodanākārappatti viya hotīti
tika-s0404t0:249_0: Idāni saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivaranto “mātukucchiṃ okkamante”tiādimāha. Ayaṃ panatthoti
tika-s0404t0:249_1: “sādhukāradānavasenā”tiādinā vutta attho. Pathavīdevatāya vasenāti ettha samuddadevatā
tika-s0404t0:249_2: viya mahāpathaviyā adhidevatā kira nāma atthi, tādise kāraṇe sati tassā cittavasena
tika-s0404t0:249_3: ayaṃ mahāpathavī saṅkampati sampakampati sampavedhati. Yathā vātavalāhakadevatānaṃ
tika-s0404t0:249_4: cittavasena vātā vāyanti, sītuṇhaabbhavassavalāhakadevatānaṃ cittavasena sītādayo
tika-s0404t0:249_5: bhavanti, tathā hi visākhapuṇṇamāyaṃ abhisambodhiatthaṃ bodhirukkhamūle nisinnassa
tika-s0404t0:252_0: Vacanasamanantaraṃ mahāpathavī bhijjitvā saparisaṃ māraṃ parivattesi. Etanti sādhukāradānādi.
tika-s0404t0:252_1: Yadipi natthi acetanattā, dhammatāvasena pana vuttanayena siyāti sakkā vattuṃ. Dhammatā
tika-s0404t0:252_2: pana atthato dhammabhāvo, so puññadhammassa vā ñāṇadhammassa vā ānubhāvasabhāvoti.
tika-s0404t0:256_0: Ayaṃ pana mahāpathavī aparesupi aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu akampittha mahābhinikkhamane bodhimaṇḍūpasaṅkamane
tika-s0404t0:256_3: Paṃsukūlaggahaṇe “dvisahassadīpaparivāre nāma cattāro mahādīpe pahāya pabbajitvā
tika-s0404t0:256_4: susānaṃ gantvā paṃsukūlaṃ gaṇhantena dukkaraṃ bhagavatā kata”nti acchariyavegābhihatā
tika-s0404t0:256_6: “ahaṃ sakkhī bhagavā”ti sakkhibhāvena akampittha. Brahmajāle pana dvāsaṭṭhiyā diṭṭhigatesu
tika-s0404t0:256_7: vijaṭetvā niggumbaṃ katvā desiyamānesu sādhukāradānavasena akampitthāti veditabbā.
tika-s0404t0:257_0: Na kevalañca etesuyeva ṭhānesu pathavī akampittha, atha kho tīsu saṅgahesupi mahāmahindattherassa
tika-s0404t0:257_1: imaṃ dīpaṃ āgantvā jotivane nisīditvā dhammaṃ desitadivasepi akampittha. Kalyāṇiyamahāvihāre
tika-s0404t0:257_2: ca piṇḍapātiyattherassa cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ sammajjitvā tattheva nisīditvā buddhārammaṇaṃ
tika-s0404t0:257_3: pītiṃ gahetvā imaṃ suttantaṃ āraddhassa suttapariyosāne udakapariyantaṃ katvā akampittha.
tika-s0404t0:257_4: Lohapāsādassa pācīnaambalaṭṭhikaṭṭhānaṃ nāma ahosi, tattha nisīditvā dīghabhāṇakattherā
tika-s0404t0:257_5: brahmajālasuttaṃ ārabhiṃsu. Tesaṃ sajjhāyapariyosānepi udakapariyantameva katvā pathavī akampittha.
tika-s0404t0:258_0: Yadi evaṃ “aṭṭhime, ānanda, hetū aṭṭha paccayā mahato bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāyā”ti
tika-s0404t0:258_1: kasmā aṭṭheva hetū vuttāti? Niyamahetubhāvato. Imeyeva hi aṭṭha hetū niyamanti, nāññe.
tika-s0404t0:258_2: Te hi kadāci sambhavantīti aniyamabhāvato na gaṇitā. Vuttañhetaṃ nāgasenattherena milindapañhe –
tika-s0404t0:259_0: “Aṭṭhime, bhikkhave, hetū aṭṭha paccayā mahato bhūmicālassa pātubhāvāyāti. Yaṃ vessantarena
tika-s0404t0:259_1: raññā mahādāne dīyamāne sattakkhattuṃ mahāpathavī kampitā, tañca pana akālikaṃ kadācuppattikaṃ
tika-s0404t0:259_2: aṭṭhahi hetūhi vippamuttaṃ, tasmā agaṇitaṃ aṭṭhahi hetūhi.
tika-s0404t0:260_0: “Yathā, mahārāja, loke tayoyeva meghā gaṇīyanti vassiko, hemantiko, pāvusakoti. Yadi
tika-s0404t0:260_1: te muñcitvā añño megho pavassati, na so megho gaṇīyati sammatehi meghehi, akālameghotveva
tika-s0404t0:260_2: saṅkhaṃ gacchati, evameva kho, mahārāja, vessantarena raññā mahādāne dīyamāne yaṃ
tika-s0404t0:260_3: sattakkhattuṃ mahāpathavī kampitā, akālikaṃ etaṃ kadācuppattikaṃ aṭṭhahi hetūhi vippamuttaṃ,
tika-s0404t0:261_0: “Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, himavantā pabbatā pañca nadisatāni sandanti, tesaṃ, mahārāja,
tika-s0404t0:261_1: pañcannaṃ nadisatānaṃ daseva nadiyo nadigaṇanāya gaṇīyanti. Seyyathidaṃ – gaṅgā,
tika-s0404t0:261_2: yamunā, aciravatī, sarabhū, mahī, sindhu, sarassatī, vetravatī, vītaṃsā, candabhāgāti.
tika-s0404t0:261_3: Avasesā nadiyo nadigaṇanāya agaṇitā. Kiṃkāraṇā? Na tā nadiyo dhuvasalilā, evameva
tika-s0404t0:261_4: kho, mahārāja, vessantarena raññā mahādāne dīyamāne yaṃ sattakkhattuṃ mahāpathavī
tika-s0404t0:261_5: kampitā, akālikaṃ etaṃ kadācuppattikaṃ aṭṭhahi hetūhi vippamuttaṃ, na taṃ gaṇīyati aṭṭhahi hetūhi.
tika-s0404t0:262_0: “Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, rañño satampi dvisatampi tisatampi amaccā honti, tesaṃ
tika-s0404t0:262_1: chayeva janā amaccagaṇanāya gaṇīyanti. Seyyathidaṃ – senāpati, purohito, akkhadasso,
tika-s0404t0:262_2: bhaṇḍāgāriko, chattaggāhako, khaggaggāhako, eteyeva amaccagaṇanāya gaṇīyanti. Kiṃkāraṇā?
tika-s0404t0:262_3: Yuttattā rājaguṇehi. Avasesā agaṇitā, sabbe amaccātveva saṅkhaṃ gacchanti, evameva
tika-s0404t0:262_4: kho, mahārāja, vessantarena raññā mahādāne dīyamāne yaṃ sattakkhattuṃ mahāpathavī
tika-s0404t0:262_5: kampitā, akālikaṃ etaṃ kadācuppattikaṃ aṭṭhahi hetūhi vippamuttaṃ, na taṃ gaṇīyati aṭṭhahi hetūhī”ti.
tika-s0404t0:267_0: 71-80. Aṭṭhamassa paṭhamādīni uttānatthāneva. Dasame kucchitaṃ sīdatīti kusīto da-kārassa
tika-s0404t0:267_1: ta-kāraṃ katvā. Yassa dhammassa vasena puggalo “kusīto”ti vuccati, so kusitabhāvo
tika-s0404t0:267_2: idha kusita-saddena vutto. Vināpi hi bhāvajotanasaddaṃ bhāvattho viññāyati yathā
tika-s0404t0:267_4: attho”ti. Kammaṃ nāma samaṇasāruppaṃ īdisanti āha “cīvaravicāraṇādī”ti. Vīriyanti
tika-s0404t0:267_5: padhānavīriyaṃ. Taṃ pana caṅkamanavasena karaṇe kāyikantipi vattabbataṃ labhatīti
tika-s0404t0:267_6: āha “duvidhampī”ti. Pattiyāti pāpuṇanatthaṃ. Osīdananti bhāvanānuyoge saṅkoco. Māsehi
tika-s0404t0:267_7: ācitaṃ nicitaṃ viyāti māsācitaṃ, taṃ maññe. Yasmā māsā tintā visesena garukā honti,
tika-s0404t0:267_8: tasmā “yathā tintamāso”tiādi vuttaṃ. Vuṭṭhito hoti gilānabhāvāti adhippāyo.
tika-s0404t0:268_0: Tesanti ārambhavatthūnaṃ. Imināva nayenāti iminā kusītavatthūsu vutteneva nayena
tika-s0404t0:268_1: “duvidhampi vīriyaṃ ārabhatī”tiādinā. Idaṃ paṭhamanti “idaṃ, handāhaṃ, vīriyaṃ ārabhāmī”ti,
tika-s0404t0:268_2: “evaṃ bhāvanāya abbhussahanaṃ paṭhamaṃ ārambhavatthū”tiādinā ca attho veditabbo.
tika-s0404t0:268_3: Yathā tathā paṭhamaṃ pavattaṃ abbhussahanañhi upari vīriyārambhassa kāraṇaṃ hoti.
tika-s0404t0:268_4: Anurūpapaccavekkhaṇasahitāni hi abbhussahanāni tammūlakāni vā paccavekkhaṇāni aṭṭha
tika-s0404t0:280_0: 3. Tatiye meghiyoti tassa therassa nāmaṃ. Upaṭṭhāko hotīti paricārako hoti. Bhagavato
tika-s0404t0:280_1: hi paṭhamabodhiyaṃ upaṭṭhākā anibaddhā ahesuṃ. Ekadā nāgasamalo, ekadā nāgito, ekadā
tika-s0404t0:280_2: upavāṇo, ekadā sunakkhatto, ekadā cundo samaṇuddeso, ekadā sāgato, ekadā meghiyo,
tika-s0404t0:280_3: tadāpi meghiyattherova upaṭṭhāko hoti. Tenāha “tena kho pana samayena āyasmā meghiyo
tika-s0404t0:281_0: Kimikāḷāyāti kāḷakimīnaṃ bahulatāya “kimikāḷā”ti laddhanāmāya nadiyā. Jaṅghāvihāranti
tika-s0404t0:281_1: ciranisajjāya jaṅghāsu uppannakilamathavinodanatthaṃ vicaraṇaṃ. Pāsādikanti aviraḷarukkhatāya
tika-s0404t0:281_2: siniddhapattatāya ca passantānaṃ pasādaṃ āvahatīti pāsādikaṃ. Sandacchāyatāya manuññabhūmibhāgatāya
tika-s0404t0:281_3: ca anto paviṭṭhānaṃ pītisomanassajananaṭṭhena cittaṃ rametīti ramaṇīyaṃ. Alanti pariyattaṃ,
tika-s0404t0:281_4: yuttantipi attho. Padhānatthikassāti padhānena bhāvanānuyogena atthikassa. Yasmā
tika-s0404t0:281_5: so padhānakamme yutto padhānakammiko nāma hoti, tasmā vuttaṃ “padhānakammikassā”ti.
tika-s0404t0:281_6: Āgaccheyyāhanti āgaccheyyaṃ ahaṃ. Therena kira pubbe taṃ ṭhānaṃ anuppaṭipāṭiyā pañca
tika-s0404t0:281_7: jātisatāni raññā eva satā anubhūtapubbaṃ uyyānaṃ ahosi, tenassa diṭṭhamatteyeva tattha
tika-s0404t0:282_0: Yāva aññopi koci bhikkhu āgacchatīti añño kocipi bhikkhu mama santikaṃ yāva āgacchati,
tika-s0404t0:282_1: tāva āgamehīti attho. “Koci bhikkhu dissatī”tipi pāṭho, “āgacchatū”tipi paṭhanti,
tika-s0404t0:282_2: tathā “dissatū”tipi. Natthi kiñci uttari karaṇīyanti catūsu saccesu catūhi maggehi
tika-s0404t0:282_3: pariññādīnaṃ soḷasannaṃ kiccānaṃ katattā abhisambodhiyā vā adhigatattā tato aññaṃ
tika-s0404t0:282_4: uttari karaṇīyaṃ nāma natthi. Catūsu saccesu catunnaṃ kiccānaṃ katattāti idaṃ pana
tika-s0404t0:282_5: maggavasena labbhabhānaṃ bhedaṃ anupekkhitvā vuttaṃ. Atthi katassa paṭicayoti mayhaṃ
tika-s0404t0:282_6: santāne nipphāditassa sīlādidhammassa ariyamaggassa anadhigatattā tadatthaṃ puna
tika-s0404t0:283_0: Tividhanāṭakaparivāroti mahantitthiyo majjhimitthiyo atitaruṇitthiyoti evaṃ vadhūkumārikakaññāvatthāhi
tika-s0404t0:283_1: tividhāhi nāṭakitthīhi parivuto. Akusalavitakkehīti yathāvuttehi kāmavitakkādīhi.
tika-s0404t0:283_2: Apare pana “tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe pupphaphalapallavādīsu lobhavasena kāmavitakko, kharassarānaṃ
tika-s0404t0:283_3: pakkhiādīnaṃ saddassavanena byāpādavitakko, leḍḍuādīhi tesaṃ viheṭhanādhippāyena
tika-s0404t0:283_4: vihiṃsāvitakko. ‘Idhevāhaṃ vaseyya’nti tattha sāpekkhatāvasena vā kāmavitakko, vanacarake
tika-s0404t0:283_5: tattha tattha disvā tesu cittadubbhanena byāpādavitakko, tesaṃ viheṭhanādhippāyena
tika-s0404t0:283_6: vihiṃsāvitakko tassa uppajjatī”ti vadanti. Yathā tathā vā tassa micchāvitakkappavattiyeva
tika-s0404t0:283_7: acchariyakāraṇaṃ. Acchariyaṃ vata, bhoti garahaṇacchariyaṃ nāma kiretaṃ. Yathā āyasmā
tika-s0404t0:283_8: ānando bhagavato valiyagattaṃ disvā avoca “acchariyaṃ, bhante, abbhutaṃ, bhante”ti.
tika-s0404t0:283_9: Samparivāritāti vokiṇṇā. Attani garumhi ca ekattepi bahuvacanaṃ dissati. “Anvāsatto”tipi
tika-s0404t0:283_10: pāṭho. Kasmā panassa bhagavā tattha gamanaṃ anujāni? “Ananuññātopi cāyaṃ maṃ ohāya
tika-s0404t0:283_11: gacchissateva, paricārakāmatāya maññe bhagavā gantuṃ na detīti cassa siyā aññathattaṃ,
tika-s0404t0:283_12: tadassa dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvatteyyā”ti anujāni.
tika-s0404t0:284_0: Evaṃ tasmiṃ attano pavattiṃ ārocetvā nisinne athassa bhagavā sappāyadhammaṃ desento
tika-s0404t0:284_2: appattāya. Cetovimuttiyāti kilesehi cetaso vimuttiyā. Pubbabhāge hi tadaṅgavasena
tika-s0404t0:284_3: ceva vikkhambhanavasena ca cetaso vimutti hoti, aparabhāge samucchedavasena ceva
tika-s0404t0:284_4: paṭippassaddhivasena ca. Sāyaṃ vimutti heṭṭhā vitthārato kathitāva, tasmā tattha
tika-s0404t0:284_5: vuttanayena veditabbā. Tattha vimuttiparipācanīyehi dhammehi āsaye paripācite sodhite
tika-s0404t0:284_6: vipassanāya maggagabbhaṃ gaṇhantiyā paripākaṃ gacchantiyā cetovimutti paripakkā nāma
tika-s0404t0:285: Katame pana vimuttiparipācanīyā dhammā? Saddhindriyādīnaṃ visuddhikaraṇavasena pannarasa dhammā veditabbā. Vuttañhetaṃ –
tika-s0404t0:286: “Assaddhe puggale parivajjayato, saddhe puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato, pasādanīye suttante paccavekkhato imehi tīhākārehi saddhindriyaṃ visujjhati.
tika-s0404t0:287: “Kusīte puggale parivajjayato, āraddhavīriye puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato, sammappadhāne paccavekkhato imehi tīhākārehi vīriyindriyaṃ visujjhati.
tika-s0404t0:288: “Muṭṭhassatī puggale parivajjayato, upaṭṭhitassatī puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato, satipaṭṭhāne paccavekkhato imehi tīhākārehi satindriyaṃ visujjhati.
tika-s0404t0:289: “Asamāhite puggale parivajjayato, samāhite puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato, jhānavimokkhe paccavekkhato imehi tīhākārehi samādhindriyaṃ visujjhati.
tika-s0404t0:290: “Duppaññe puggale parivajjayato, paññavante puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato, gambhīrañāṇacariyaṃ paccavekkhato imehi tīhākārehi paññindriyaṃ visujjhati.
tika-s0404t0:291: “Iti ime pañca puggale parivajjayato, pañca puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato, pañca suttante paccavekkhato imehi pannarasahi ākārehi imāni pañcindriyāni visujjhantī”ti.
tika-s0404t0:292_0: Aparehipi pannarasahi ākārehi imāni pañcindriyāni visujjhanti. Aparepi pannarasa
tika-s0404t0:292_1: dhammā vimuttiparipācanīyā. Saddhāpañcamāni indriyāni, aniccasaññā anicce, dukkhasaññā
tika-s0404t0:292_2: dukkhe, anattasaññā, pahānasaññā, virāgasaññāti imā pañca nibbedhabhāgiyā saññā,
tika-s0404t0:292_3: kalyāṇamittatā, sīlasaṃvaro, abhisallekhatā, vīriyārambho, nibbedhikapaññāti. Tesu
tika-s0404t0:292_4: veneyyadamanakusalo satthā veneyyassa meghiyattherassa ajjhāsayavasena idha kalyāṇamittatādayo
tika-s0404t0:292_5: vimuttiparipācanīye dhamme dassento “pañca dhammā paripakkāya saṃvattantī”ti vatvā
tika-s0404t0:292_6: te vitthārento “idha, meghiya, bhikkhu kalyāṇamitto hotī”tiādimāha.
tika-s0404t0:293_0: Tattha kalyāṇamittoti kalyāṇo bhaddo sundaro mitto etassāti kalyāṇamitto. Yassa sīlādiguṇasampanno
tika-s0404t0:293_1: “aghassa tātā hitassa vidhātā”ti evaṃ sabbākārena upakāro mitto hoti, so puggalo
tika-s0404t0:293_2: kalyāṇamittova. Yathāvuttehi kalyāṇapuggaleheva sabbiriyāpathesu saha ayati pavattati,
tika-s0404t0:293_3: na vinā tehīti kalyāṇasahāyo. Kalyāṇapuggalesu eva cittena ceva kāyena ca ninnapoṇapabbhārabhāvena
tika-s0404t0:293_4: pavattatīti kalyāṇasampavaṅko. Padattayena kalyāṇamittasaṃsagge ādaraṃ uppādeti.
tika-s0404t0:293_5: Ayaṃ kalyāṇamittatāsaṅkhāto brahmacariyavāsassa ādibhāvato sabbesañca kusaladhammānaṃ
tika-s0404t0:293_6: bahukāratāya padhānabhāvato ca imesu pañcasu dhammesu ādito vuttattā paṭhamo anavajjadhammo
tika-s0404t0:293_7: avisuddhānaṃ saddhādīnaṃ visuddhikaraṇavasena cetovimuttiyā paripakkāya saṃvattati.
tika-s0404t0:293_8: Ettha ca kalyāṇamittassa bahukāratā padhānatā ca “upaḍḍhamidaṃ, bhante, brahmacariyassa
tika-s0404t0:293_9: yadidaṃ kalyāṇamittatā”ti vadantaṃ dhammabhaṇḍāgārikaṃ “mā hevaṃ, ānandā”ti dvikkhatuṃ
tika-s0404t0:293_10: paṭisedhetvā “sakalameva hidaṃ, ānanda, brahmacariyaṃ yadidaṃ kalyāṇamittatā kalyāṇasahāyatā”ti
tika-s0404t0:294_0: Puna caparanti puna ca aparaṃ dhammajātaṃ. Sīlavāti ettha kenaṭṭhena sīlaṃ? Sīlanaṭṭhena
tika-s0404t0:294_1: sīlaṃ. Kimidaṃ sīlanaṃ nāma? Samādhānaṃ, kāyakammādīnaṃ susīlyavasena avippakiṇṇatāti
tika-s0404t0:294_2: attho. Atha vā upadhāraṇaṃ, jhānādikusaladhammānaṃ patiṭṭhānavasena ādhārabhāvoti
tika-s0404t0:294_3: attho. Tasmā sīleti, sīlatīti vā sīlaṃ. Ayaṃ tāva saddalakkhaṇanayena sīlaṭṭho. Apare
tika-s0404t0:294_4: pana “siraṭṭho sīlaṭṭho, sītalaṭṭho, sīlaṭṭho”ti niruttinayena atthaṃ vaṇṇenti. Tayidaṃ
tika-s0404t0:294_5: pāripūrito atisayato vā sīlaṃ assa atthīti sīlavā, sīlasampannoti attho.
tika-s0404t0:295_0: Yathā ca sīlavā hoti sīlasampanno, taṃ dassetuṃ “pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:295_1: Tattha pātimokkhanti sikkhāpadasīlaṃ. Tañhi yo naṃ pāti rakkhati, taṃ mokkheti moceti
tika-s0404t0:295_2: āpāyikādīhi dukkhehīti pātimokkhaṃ. Saṃvaraṇaṃ saṃvaro, kāyavācāhi avītikkamo. Pātimokkhameva
tika-s0404t0:295_3: saṃvaro pātimokkhasaṃvaro, tena saṃvuto pihitakāyavācoti pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto.
tika-s0404t0:295_4: Idamassa tasmiṃ sīle patiṭṭhitabhāvaparidīpanaṃ. Viharatīti tadanurūpavihārasamaṅgibhāvaparidīpanaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:295_5: Ācāragocarasampannoti heṭṭhā pātimokkhasaṃvarassa upari visesānaṃ yogassa ca upakāradhammaparidīpanaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:295_6: Aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvīti pātimokkhasīlato acavanadhammatāparidīpanaṃ. Samādāyāti
tika-s0404t0:295_7: sikkhāpadānaṃ anavasesato ādānaparidīpanaṃ. Sikkhatīti sikkhāya samaṅgibhāvaparidīpanaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:296_0: Aparo nayo – kilesānaṃ balavabhāvato pāpakiriyāya sukarabhāvato puññakiriyāya ca
tika-s0404t0:296_1: dukkarabhāvato bahukkhattuṃ apāyesu patanasīloti pātī, puthujjano. Aniccatāya vā
tika-s0404t0:296_2: bhavādīsu kammavegukkhitto ghaṭiyantaṃ viya anavaṭṭhānena paribbhamanato gamanasīloti
tika-s0404t0:296_3: pātī. Maraṇavasena vā tamhi tamhi sattanikāye attabhāvassa patanasīlo vā pātī, sattasantāno,
tika-s0404t0:296_4: cittameva vā. Taṃ pātinaṃ saṃsāradukkhato mokkhetīti pātimokkhaṃ. Cittassa hi vimokkhena
tika-s0404t0:297_0: Atha vā avijjādihetunā saṃsāre patati gacchati pavattatīti pāti. “Avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ
tika-s0404t0:297_1: sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsarata”nti hi vuttaṃ. Tassa pātino sattassa
tika-s0404t0:298_0: Atha vā pāteti vinipāteti dukkheti pāti, cittaṃ. Vuttañhi “cittena nīyatī loko, cittena
tika-s0404t0:298_1: parikassatī”ti. Tassa pātino mokkho etenāti pātimokkhaṃ. Patati vā etena apāyadukkhe
tika-s0404t0:298_2: saṃsāradukkhe cāti pāti, taṇhādisaṃkileso. Vuttañhi “taṇhā janeti purisaṃ. Taṇhādutiyo
tika-s0404t0:298_3: puriso”ti ca ādi. Tato pātito mokkhoti pātimokkhaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:299_0: Atha vā patati etthāti pāti, cha ajjhattikabāhirāni āyatanāni. Vuttañhi “chasu loko
tika-s0404t0:299_1: samuppanno, chasu kubbati santhava”nti. Tato chaajjhattikabāhirāyatanasaṅkhātato
tika-s0404t0:299_2: pātito mokkhoti pātimokkhaṃ. Atha vā pāto vinipāto assa atthīti pātī, saṃsāro. Tato
tika-s0404t0:299_3: mokkhoti pātimokkhaṃ. Atha vā sabbalokādhipatibhāvato dhammissaro bhagavā patīti
tika-s0404t0:299_4: vuccati, muccati etenāti mokkho, patino mokkho tena paññattattāti patimokkho, patimokkho
tika-s0404t0:299_5: eva pātimokkhaṃ. Sabbaguṇānaṃ vā mūlabhāvato uttamaṭṭhena pati ca so yathāvuttenatthena
tika-s0404t0:299_6: mokkho cāti patimokkho, patimokkho eva pātimokkhaṃ. Tathā hi vuttaṃ “pātimokkhanti
tika-s0404t0:300_0: Atha vā pa-iti pakāre, atīti accantatthe nipāto, tasmā pakārehi accantaṃ mokkhetīti
tika-s0404t0:300_1: pātimokkhaṃ. Idañhi sīlaṃ sayaṃ tadaṅgavasena, samādhisahitaṃ paññāsahitañca vikkhambhanavasena
tika-s0404t0:300_2: samucchedavasena accantaṃ mokkheti mocetīti pātimokkhaṃ. Pati pati mokkhoti vā patimokkho,
tika-s0404t0:300_3: tamhā tamhā vītikkamadosato paccekaṃ mokkhoti attho. Patimokkho eva pātimokkhaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:300_4: Mokkhoti vā nibbānaṃ, tassa mokkhassa paṭibimbabhūtoti patimokkho. Sīlasaṃvaro hi
tika-s0404t0:300_5: sūriyassa aruṇuggamanaṃ viya nibbānassa udayabhūto tappaṭibhāgova yathārahaṃ kilesanibbāpanato.
tika-s0404t0:300_6: Patimokkhoyeva pātimokkhaṃ. Atha vā mokkhaṃ pati vattati, mokkhābhimukhanti vā patimokkhaṃ,
tika-s0404t0:300_7: patimokkhameva pātimokkhanti evaṃ tāva ettha pātimokkhasaddassa attho veditabbo.
tika-s0404t0:301_0: Saṃvarati pidahati etenāti saṃvaro, pātimokkhameva saṃvaroti pātimokkhasaṃvaro. Atthato
tika-s0404t0:301_1: pana tato tato vītikkamitabbato viratiyo cetanā ca, tena pātimokkhasaṃvarena upeto
tika-s0404t0:301_3: upeto hoti samupeto upagato sampanno samannāgato, tena vuccati pātimokkhasaṃvarasaṃvuto”ti.
tika-s0404t0:302_0: Viharatīti iriyāpathavihārena viharati iriyati vattati. Ācāragocarasampannoti veḷudānādimicchājīvassa
tika-s0404t0:302_1: kāyapāgabbhiyādīnañca akaraṇena sabbaso anācāraṃ vajjetvā kāyiko avītikkamo, vācasiko
tika-s0404t0:302_2: avītikkamo, kāyikavācasiko avītikkamoti evaṃ vuttabhikkhu sāruppaācārasampattiyā
tika-s0404t0:303_0: Apica yo bhikkhu satthari sagāravo sappatisso sabrahmacārīsu sagāravo sappatisso
tika-s0404t0:303_1: hirottappasampanno sunivattho supāruto pāsādikena abhikkantena paṭikkantena ālokitena
tika-s0404t0:303_2: vilokitena samiñjitena pasāritena iriyāpathasampanno indriyesu guttadvāro bhojane
tika-s0404t0:303_3: mattaññū jāgariyaṃ anuyutto satisampajaññena samannāgato appiccho santuṭṭho pavivitto
tika-s0404t0:303_4: asaṃsaṭṭho ābhisamācārikesu sakkaccakārī garucittīkārabahulo viharati, ayaṃ vuccati ācārasampanno.
tika-s0404t0:304_0: Gocaro pana upanissayagocaro, ārakkhagocaro, upanibandhagocaroti tividho. Tattha
tika-s0404t0:304_1: yo dasakathāvatthuguṇasamannāgato vuttalakkhaṇo kalyāṇamitto, yaṃ nissāya assutaṃ
tika-s0404t0:304_2: suṇāti, sutaṃ pariyodāpeti, kaṅkhaṃ vitarati, diṭṭhiṃ ujuṃ karoti, cittaṃ pasādeti,
tika-s0404t0:304_3: yassa ca anusikkhanto saddhāya vaḍḍhati, sīlena, sutena, cāgena, paññāya vaḍḍhati,
tika-s0404t0:305_0: Yo bhikkhu antaragharaṃ paviṭṭho vīthiṃ paṭipanno okkhittacakkhu yugamattadassī saṃvuto
tika-s0404t0:305_1: gacchati, na hatthiṃ olokento, na assaṃ, na rathaṃ, na pattiṃ, na itthiṃ, na purisaṃ
tika-s0404t0:305_2: olokento, na uddhaṃ ullokento, na adho olokento, na disāvidisaṃ pekkhamāno gacchati, ayaṃ ārakkhagocaro.
tika-s0404t0:306_0: Upanibandhagocaro pana cattāro satipaṭṭhānā, yattha bhikkhu attano cittaṃ upanibandhati.
tika-s0404t0:306_1: Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā – “ko ca, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno gocaro sako pettiko visayo,
tika-s0404t0:306_2: yadidaṃ cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”ti. Tattha upanissayagocarassa pubbe vuttattā itaresaṃ
tika-s0404t0:306_3: vasenettha gocaro veditabbo. Iti yathāvuttāya ācārasampattiyā imāya ca gocarasampattiyā
tika-s0404t0:307_0: Aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvīti appamattakattā aṇuppamāṇesu assatiyā asañcicca
tika-s0404t0:307_1: āpannasekhiyaakusalacittuppādādibhedesu vajjesu bhayadassanasīlo. Yo hi bhikkhu paramāṇumattaṃ
tika-s0404t0:307_3: yopi sabbalahukaṃ dubbhāsitamattaṃ pārājikasadisaṃ katvā passati, ayampi aṇumattesu
tika-s0404t0:307_4: vajjesu bhayadassāvī nāma. Samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesūti yaṃkiñci sikkhāpadesu
tika-s0404t0:307_5: sikkhitabbaṃ, taṃ sabbena sabbaṃ sabbathā sabbaṃ anavasesaṃ samādiyitvā sikkhati,
tika-s0404t0:308_0: Abhisallekhikāti ativiya kilesānaṃ sallekhanīyā, tesaṃ tanubhāvāya pahānāya yuttarūpā.
tika-s0404t0:308_1: Cetovivaraṇasappāyāti cetaso paṭicchādakānaṃ nīvaraṇānaṃ dūrībhāvakaraṇena cetovivaraṇasaṅkhātānaṃ
tika-s0404t0:308_2: samathavipassanānaṃ sappāyā, samathavipassanācittasseva vā vivaraṇāya pākaṭīkaraṇāya
tika-s0404t0:309_0: Idāni yena nibbidādiāvahaṇena ayaṃ kathā abhisallekhikā cetovivaraṇasappāyā ca nāma
tika-s0404t0:309_1: hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ “ekantanibbidāyā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ekantanibbidāyāti ekaṃseneva
tika-s0404t0:309_2: vaṭṭadukkhato nibbindanatthāya. Virāgāya nirodhāyāti tasseva virajjanatthāya ca nirujjhanatthāya
tika-s0404t0:309_3: ca. Upasamāyāti sabbakilesavūpasamāya. Abhiññāyāti sabbassapi abhiññeyyassa abhijānanāya.
tika-s0404t0:309_4: Sambodhāyāti catumaggasambodhāya. Nibbānāyāti anupādisesanibbānāya. Etesu hi ādito
tika-s0404t0:309_5: tīhi padehi vipassanā vuttā, dvīhi nibbānaṃ vuttaṃ. Samathavipassanā ādiṃ katvā nibbānapariyosāno
tika-s0404t0:309_6: ayaṃ sabbo uttarimanussadhammo dasakathāvatthulābhino sijjhatīti dasseti.
tika-s0404t0:310_0: Idāni taṃ kathaṃ vibhajitvā dassento “appicchakathā”tiādimāha. Tattha appicchoti
tika-s0404t0:310_1: niiccho, tassa kathā appicchakathā, appicchabhāvappaṭisaṃyuttakathā vā appicchakathā.
tika-s0404t0:310_2: Ettha ca atriccho, pāpiccho, mahiccho, appicchoti icchāvasena cattāro puggalā. Tesu
tika-s0404t0:310_3: attanā yathāladdhena lābhena atitto uparūpari lābhaṃ icchanto atriccho nāma. Yaṃ sandhāya –
tika-s0404t0:313: Icchāhatassa posassa, cakkaṃ bhamati matthake”ti. ca;
tika-s0404t0:315_1: vuttaṃ “idhekacco assaddho samāno ‘saddhoti maṃ jano jānātū’ti icchati, dussīlo samāno
tika-s0404t0:316_0: Santaguṇasambhāvanādhippāyo paṭiggahaṇe amattaññū mahiccho, yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “idhekacco
tika-s0404t0:316_1: saddho samāno ‘saddhoti maṃ jano jānātū’ti icchati, sīlavā samāno ‘sīlavāti maṃ jano
tika-s0404t0:316_2: jānātū’ti icchatī”tiādi. Duttappiyatāya hissa vijātamātāpi cittaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti. Tenetaṃ vuccati –
tika-s0404t0:319_0: Ete pana atricchatādayo dose ārakā vivajjetvā santaguṇaniguhanādhippāyo paṭiggahaṇe
tika-s0404t0:319_1: ca mattaññū appiccho. Attani vijjamānampi guṇaṃ paṭicchādetukāmatāya saddho samāno
tika-s0404t0:319_2: “saddhoti maṃ jano jānātū”ti na icchati, sīlavā, bahussuto, pavivitto, āraddhavīriyo,
tika-s0404t0:319_3: upaṭṭhitassati, samāhito, paññavā samāno “paññavāti maṃ jano jānātū”ti na icchati.
tika-s0404t0:319_4: Svāyaṃ paccayappiccho, dhutaṅgappiccho, pariyattiappiccho adhigamappicchoti catubbidho.
tika-s0404t0:319_5: Tattha catūsu paccayesu appiccho paccayadāyakaṃ deyyadhammaṃ attano thāmañca oloketvā
tika-s0404t0:319_6: sacepi hi deyyadhammo bahu hoti, dāyako appaṃ dātukāmo, dāyakassa vasena appameva
tika-s0404t0:319_7: gaṇhāti. Deyyadhammo ce appo, dāyako bahuṃ dātukāmo, deyyadhammassa vasena appameva
tika-s0404t0:319_8: gaṇhāti. Deyyadhammopi ce bahu, dāyakopi bahuṃ dātukāmo, attano thāmaṃ ñatvā pamāṇayuttameva
tika-s0404t0:319_9: gaṇhāti. Evarūpo hi bhikkhu anuppannaṃ lābhaṃ uppādeti, uppannaṃ lābhaṃ thāvaraṃ
tika-s0404t0:319_10: karoti, dāyakānaṃ cittaṃ ārādheti. Dhutaṅgasamādānassa pana attani atthibhāvaṃ na
tika-s0404t0:319_11: jānāpetukāmo dhutaṅgappiccho. Yo attano bahussutabhāvaṃ jānāpetuṃ na icchati, ayaṃ
tika-s0404t0:319_12: pariyattiappiccho. Yo pana sotāpannādīsu aññataro hutvā sabrahmacārīnampi attano
tika-s0404t0:319_13: sotāpannādibhāvaṃ jānāpetuṃ na icchati, ayaṃ adhigamappiccho. Evametesaṃ appicchānaṃ
tika-s0404t0:319_14: yā appicchatā, tassā saddhiṃ sandassanādividhinā anekākāravokārānisaṃsavibhāvanavasena
tika-s0404t0:319_15: sappaṭipakkhassa atricchatādibhedassa icchācārassa ādīnavavibhāvanavasena ca pavattā
tika-s0404t0:320_0: Santuṭṭhikathāti ettha santuṭṭhīti sakena attanā laddhena tuṭṭhi santuṭṭhi. Atha
tika-s0404t0:320_1: vā visamaṃ paccayicchaṃ pahāya samaṃ tuṭṭhi santuṭṭhi, santena vā vijjamānena tuṭṭhi
tika-s0404t0:323_0: Sammā vā ñāyena bhagavatā anuññātavidhinā paccayehi tuṭṭhi santuṭṭhi, atthato itarītarapaccayasantoso,
tika-s0404t0:323_1: so dvādasavidho hoti. Kathaṃ? Cīvare yathālābhasantoso, yathābalasantoso, yathāsāruppasantosoti
tika-s0404t0:324_0: Tatrāyaṃ pabhedavaṇṇanā – idha bhikkhu cīvaraṃ labhati sundaraṃ vā asundaraṃ vā,
tika-s0404t0:324_1: so teneva yāpeti, aññaṃ na pattheti, labhantopi na gaṇhāti, ayamassa cīvare yathālābhasantoso.
tika-s0404t0:324_2: Atha pana pakatidubbalo vā hoti ābādhajarābhibhūto vā, garucīvaraṃ pārupanto kilamati,
tika-s0404t0:324_3: so sabhāgena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ taṃ parivattetvā lahukena yāpentopi santuṭṭhova hoti,
tika-s0404t0:324_4: ayamassa cīvare yathābalasantoso. Aparo paṇītapaccayalābhī hoti, so paṭṭacīvarādīnaṃ
tika-s0404t0:324_5: aññataraṃ mahagghacīvaraṃ bahūni vā labhitvā “idaṃ therānaṃ cirapabbajitānaṃ bahussutānaṃ
tika-s0404t0:324_6: anurūpaṃ, idaṃ gilānānaṃ dubbalānaṃ appalābhīnaṃ hotū”ti tesaṃ datvā attanā saṅkārakūṭādito
tika-s0404t0:324_7: vā nantakāni uccinitvā saṅghāṭiṃ katvā tesaṃ vā purāṇacīvarāni gahetvā dhārentopi
tika-s0404t0:325_0: Idha pana bhikkhu piṇḍapātaṃ labhati lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā, so teneva yāpeti, aññaṃ
tika-s0404t0:325_1: na pattheti, labhantopi na gaṇhāti, ayamassa piṇḍapāte yathālābhasantoso. Atha pana
tika-s0404t0:325_2: ābādhiko hoti, lūkhaṃ paṇītaṃ pakativiruddhaṃ byādhiviruddhaṃ vā piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjitvā
tika-s0404t0:325_3: gāḷhaṃ vā rogābādhaṃ pāpuṇāti, so sabhāgassa bhikkhuno datvā tassa hatthato sappāyabhojanaṃ
tika-s0404t0:325_4: bhuñjitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti, ayamassa piṇḍapāte yathābalasantoso.
tika-s0404t0:325_5: Aparo bahuṃ paṇītaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ labhati, so “ayaṃ piṇḍapāto cirapabbajitānaṃ anurūpo”ti
tika-s0404t0:325_6: cīvaraṃ viya tesaṃ datvā tesaṃ vā sesakaṃ attanā piṇḍāya caritvā missakāhāraṃ vā
tika-s0404t0:325_7: bhuñjantopi santuṭṭhova hoti, ayamassa piṇḍapāte yathāsāruppasantoso.
tika-s0404t0:326_0: Idha pana bhikkhuno senāsanaṃ pāpuṇāti manāpaṃ vā āmanāpaṃ vā antamaso tiṇasanthārakampi,
tika-s0404t0:326_1: so teneva santussati, puna aññaṃ sundarataraṃ pāpuṇāti, taṃ na gaṇhāti, ayamassa
tika-s0404t0:326_2: senāsane yathālābhasantoso. Atha pana ābādhiko hoti dubbalo vā, pakativiruddhaṃ vā
tika-s0404t0:326_3: so byādhiviruddhaṃ vā senāsanaṃ labhati, yatthassa vasato aphāsu hoti, so taṃ sabhāgassa
tika-s0404t0:326_4: bhikkhuno datvā tassa santake sappāyasenāsane vasitvā samaṇadhammaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova
tika-s0404t0:326_5: hoti, ayamassa senāsane yathābalasantoso. Aparo sundaraṃ senāsanaṃ pattampi na sampaṭicchati
tika-s0404t0:326_7: bahūni paṇītasenāsanāni labhati, so tāni cīvarādīni viya cirapabbajitādīnaṃ datvā
tika-s0404t0:326_8: yattha katthaci vasantopi santuṭṭhova hoti, ayamassa senāsane yathāsāruppasantoso.
tika-s0404t0:327_0: Idha pana bhikkhu bhesajjaṃ labhati lūkhaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā, so teneva tussati, aññaṃ
tika-s0404t0:327_1: na pattheti, labhantopi na gaṇhāti, ayaṃ gilānapaccaye yathālābhasantoso. Atha pana
tika-s0404t0:327_2: telena atthiko phāṇitaṃ labhati, so yaṃ labhati, so taṃ sabhāgassa bhikkhuno datvā
tika-s0404t0:327_3: tassa hatthato telena bhesajjaṃ katvā samaṇadhammaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti, ayamassa
tika-s0404t0:327_4: gilānapaccaye yathābalasantoso. Aparo mahāpuñño bahuṃ telamadhuphāṇitādipaṇītabhesajjaṃ
tika-s0404t0:327_5: labhati, so taṃ cīvarādīni viya cirapabbajitādīnaṃ datvā tesaṃ ābhatakena yena kenaci
tika-s0404t0:327_6: bhesajjaṃ karontopi santuṭṭhova hoti. Yo pana ekasmiṃ bhājane muttaharītakaṃ, ekasmiṃ
tika-s0404t0:327_7: catumadhuraṃ ṭhapetvā “gaṇhatha, bhante, yadicchasī”ti vuccamāno “sacassa tesu aññatarenapi
tika-s0404t0:327_8: rogo vūpasammati, idaṃ muttaharītakaṃ nāma buddhādīhi vaṇṇita”nti, “pūtimuttabhesajjaṃ
tika-s0404t0:327_9: nissāya pabbajjā, tattha te yāvajīvaṃ ussāho karaṇīyo”ti vacanaṃ anussaranto catumadhuraṃ
tika-s0404t0:327_10: paṭikkhipitvā muttaharītakena bhesajjaṃ karonto paramasantuṭṭhova hoti, ayamassa
tika-s0404t0:328_0: So evaṃpabhedo sabbopi santoso santuṭṭhīti pavuccati. Tena vuttaṃ “atthato itarītarapaccayasantoso”ti.
tika-s0404t0:328_1: Tassā santuṭṭhiyā saddhiṃ sandassanādividhinā ānisaṃsavibhāvanavasena tappaṭipakkhassa
tika-s0404t0:328_2: atricchatādibhedassa icchācārassa ādīnavavibhāvanavasena ca pavattā kathā santuṭṭhikathā.
tika-s0404t0:328_3: Ito parāsupi kathāsu eseva nayo. Visesamattameva vakkhāma.
tika-s0404t0:329_0: Pavivekakathāti ettha kāyaviveko, cittaviveko, upadhivivekoti tayo vivekā. Tesu eko
tika-s0404t0:329_1: gacchati, eko tiṭṭhati, eko nisīdati, eko seyyaṃ kappeti, eko gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisati,
tika-s0404t0:329_2: eko paṭikkamati, eko abhikkamati, eko caṅkamaṃ adhiṭṭhāti, eko carati, eko viharati,
tika-s0404t0:329_3: evaṃ sabbiriyāpathesu sabbakiccesu gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ pahāya vivittavāso kāyaviveko nāma.
tika-s0404t0:329_4: Aṭṭha samāpattiyo pana cittaviveko nāma. Nibbānaṃ upadhiviveko nāma. Vuttañhetaṃ
tika-s0404t0:329_5: “kāyaviveko ca vivekaṭṭhakāyānaṃ nekkhammābhiratānaṃ, cittaviveko ca parisuddhacittānaṃ
tika-s0404t0:329_6: paramavodānappattānaṃ, upadhiviveko ca nirupadhīnaṃ puggalānaṃ visaṅkhāragatāna”nti.
tika-s0404t0:329_7: Vivekoyeva paviveko, paviveke paṭisaṃyuttā kathā pavivekakathā.
tika-s0404t0:330_0: Asaṃsaggakathāti ettha savanasaṃsaggo, dassanasaṃsaggo, samullapanasaṃsaggo, sambhogasaṃsaggo,
tika-s0404t0:330_1: kāyasaṃsaggoti pañca saṃsaggā. Tesu idhekacco bhikkhu suṇāti “amukasmiṃ ṭhāne gāme
tika-s0404t0:330_2: vā nigame vā itthī abhirūpā dassanīyā pāsādikā paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgatā”ti,
tika-s0404t0:330_3: so taṃ sutvā saṃsīdati visīdati, na sakkoti brahmacariyaṃ sandhāretuṃ, sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya
tika-s0404t0:330_5: nāma. Na heva kho bhikkhu suṇāti, apica kho sāmaṃ passati itthiṃ abhirūpaṃ dassanīyaṃ
tika-s0404t0:330_6: pāsādikaṃ paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgataṃ, so taṃ disvā saṃsīdati visīdati,
tika-s0404t0:330_7: na sakkoti brahmacariyaṃ sandhāretuṃ, sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattati, evaṃ visabhāgārammaṇadassanena
tika-s0404t0:330_8: uppannakilesasanthavo dassanasaṃsaggo nāma. Disvā pana aññamaññaṃ ālāpasallāpavasena
tika-s0404t0:330_9: uppanno kilesasanthavo samullapanasaṃsaggo nāma. Sañjagghanādipi eteneva saṅgayhati.
tika-s0404t0:330_10: Attano pana santakaṃ yaṃ kiñci mātugāmassa datvā adatvā vā tena dinnassa vanabhaṅginiyādino
tika-s0404t0:330_11: paribhogavasena uppanno kilesasanthavo sambhogasaṃsaggo nāma. Mātugāmassa hatthaggāhādivasena
tika-s0404t0:331_0: Yopi cesa “gihīhi saṃsaṭṭho viharati ananulomikena saṃsaggena sahasokī sahanandī
tika-s0404t0:331_1: sukhitesu sukhito dukkhitesu dukkhito uppannesu kiccakaraṇīyesu attanā vo yogaṃ āpajjatī”ti
tika-s0404t0:331_2: evaṃ vutto ananulomiko gihisaṃsaggo nāma, yo ca sabrahmacārīhipi kilesuppattihetubhūto
tika-s0404t0:331_3: saṃsaggo, taṃ sabbaṃ pahāya yvāyaṃ saṃsāre thirataraṃ saṃvegasaṅkhāresu tibbaṃ bhayasaññaṃ
tika-s0404t0:331_4: sarīre paṭikkūlasaññaṃ sabbākusalesu jigucchāpubbaṅgamaṃ hirottappaṃ sabbakiriyāsu
tika-s0404t0:331_5: satisampajaññanti sabbaṃ paccupaṭṭhapetvā kamaladale jalabindu viya sabbattha alaggabhāvo,
tika-s0404t0:331_6: ayaṃ sabbasaṃsaggappaṭipakkhatāya asaṃsaggo, tappaṭisaṃyuttā kathā asaṃsaggakathā.
tika-s0404t0:332_0: Vīriyārambhakathāti ettha vīrassa bhāvo, kammanti vā vīriyaṃ, vidhinā īretabbaṃ pavattetabbanti
tika-s0404t0:332_1: vā vīriyaṃ, vīriyañca taṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya, kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ upasampadāya
tika-s0404t0:332_2: ārabhanaṃ vīriyārambho. Svāyaṃ kāyiko, cetasiko cāti duvidho, ārambhadhātu, nikkamadhātu,
tika-s0404t0:332_3: parakkamadhātu, cāti tividho, sammappadhānavasena catubbidho. So sabbopi yo bhikkhu
tika-s0404t0:332_4: gamane uppannakilesaṃ ṭhānaṃ pāpuṇituṃ na deti, ṭhāne uppannaṃ nisajjaṃ, nisajjāya
tika-s0404t0:332_5: uppannaṃ sayanaṃ pāpuṇituṃ na deti, tattha tattheva ajapadena daṇḍena kaṇhasappaṃ
tika-s0404t0:332_6: uppīḷetvā gaṇhanto viya tikhiṇena asinā amittaṃ gīvāya paharanto viya sīsaṃ ukkhipituṃ
tika-s0404t0:332_7: adatvā vīriyabalena niggaṇhāti, tassevaṃ vīriyārambho āraddhavīriyassa vasena veditabbo,
tika-s0404t0:333_0: Sīlakathātiādīsu duvidhaṃ sīlaṃ lokiyaṃ lokuttarañca. Tattha lokiyaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvarādi
tika-s0404t0:333_1: catupārisuddhisīlaṃ. Lokuttaraṃ maggasīlaṃ phalasīlañca. Tathā samādhipi. Vipassanāya
tika-s0404t0:333_2: pādakabhūtā saha upacārena aṭṭha samāpattiyo lokiyo samādhi, maggasampayutto panettha
tika-s0404t0:333_3: lokuttaro samādhi nāma. Tathā paññāpi. Lokiyā sutamayā, cintāmayā, jhānasampayuttā,
tika-s0404t0:333_4: vipassanāñāṇañca. Visesato panettha vipassanāpaññā gahetabbā. Lokuttarā maggapaññā
tika-s0404t0:333_5: phalapaññā ca. Vimutti ariyaphalavimutti nibbānañca. Apare pana tadaṅgavikkhambhanasamucchedavimuttīnampi
tika-s0404t0:333_6: vasenettha atthaṃ saṃvaṇṇenti. Vimuttiñāṇadassanampi ekūnavīsatividhaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:333_7: Iti imesaṃ sīlādīnaṃ saddhiṃ sandassanādividhinā anekākāravokāraānisaṃsavibhāvanavasena
tika-s0404t0:333_8: ceva tappaṭipakkhānaṃ dussīlyādīnaṃ ādīnavavibhāvanavasena ca pavattā kathā, tappaṭisaṃyuttā
tika-s0404t0:334_0: Ettha ca “attanā ca appiccho hoti, appiccha kathañca paresaṃ kattā”ti “santuṭṭho
tika-s0404t0:334_1: hoti itarītarena cīvarena, itarītaracīvarasantuṭṭhiyā ca vaṇṇavādī”ti ca ādivacanato
tika-s0404t0:334_2: sayañca appicchatādiguṇasamannāgatena paresampi tadatthāya hitajjhāsayena pavattetabbā
tika-s0404t0:334_3: tathārūpī kathā. Yā idha abhisallekhikādibhāvena visesetvā vuttā appicchakathādīti
tika-s0404t0:334_4: veditabbā. Kārakasseva hi kathā visesato adhippetatthasādhinī. Tathā hi vakkhati
tika-s0404t0:335_0: Evarūpiyāti īdisāya yathāvuttāya. Nikāmalābhīti yathicchitalābhī yathārucilābhī,
tika-s0404t0:335_1: sabbakālaṃ imaṃ kathaṃ sotuṃ vicāretuñca yathāsukhaṃ labhanto. Akicchalābhīti nidukkhalābhī.
tika-s0404t0:336_0: Āraddhavīriyoti paggahitavīriyo. Akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāyāti akosallasambhūtaṭṭhena
tika-s0404t0:336_1: akusalānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ pajahanatthāya. Kusalānaṃ dhammānanti kucchitānaṃ salanādiatthena
tika-s0404t0:336_2: anavajjaṭṭhena ca kusalānaṃ sahavipassanānaṃ maggaphaladhammānaṃ. Upasampadāyāti
tika-s0404t0:336_3: sampādanāya attano santāne uppādanāya. Thāmavāti ussoḷhisaṅkhātena vīriyathāmena
tika-s0404t0:336_4: samannāgato. Daḷhaparakkamoti thiraparakkamo asithilavīriyo. Anikkhittadhuroti anorohitadhuro anosakkavīriyo.
tika-s0404t0:337_0: Paññavāti vipassanāpaññāya paññavā. Udayatthagāminiyāti pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ udayañca
tika-s0404t0:337_1: vayañca paṭivijjhantiyā. Ariyāyāti vikkhambhanavasena kilesehi ārakā dūre ṭhitāya
tika-s0404t0:337_2: niddosāya. Nibbedhikāyāti nibbedhabhāgiyāya. Sammā dukkhakkhayagāminiyāti vaṭṭadukkhassa
tika-s0404t0:337_3: khepanato “dukkhakkhayo”ti laddhanāmaṃ ariyamaggaṃ sammā hetunā nayena gacchantiyā.
tika-s0404t0:337_4: Imesu ca pana pañcasu dhammesu sīlaṃ vīriyaṃ paññā ca yogino ajjhattikaṃ aṅgaṃ, itaradvayaṃ
tika-s0404t0:337_5: bāhiraṃ aṅgaṃ. Tatthāpi kalyāṇamittasannissayeneva sesaṃ catubbidhaṃ ijjhati, kalyāṇamittassevettha
tika-s0404t0:337_6: bahukārataṃ dassento satthā “kalyāṇamittassetaṃ, meghiya, bhikkhuno pāṭikaṅkha”ntiādinā
tika-s0404t0:337_7: desanaṃ vaḍḍhesi. Tattha pāṭikaṅkhanti ekaṃsena icchitabbaṃ, avassaṃbhāvīti attho.
tika-s0404t0:337_8: Yanti kiriyāparāmasanaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – “sīlavā bhavissatī”ti ettha yadetaṃ kalyāṇamittassa
tika-s0404t0:337_9: bhikkhuno sīlavantatāya bhavanaṃ sīlasampannattaṃ, tassa bhikkhuno sīlasampannattā
tika-s0404t0:337_10: etaṃ tassa pāṭikaṅkhaṃ, avassaṃbhāvī ekaṃseneva tassa tattha niyojanatoti adhippāyo.
tika-s0404t0:338_0: Evaṃ bhagavā sadevake loke uttamakalyāṇamittasaṅkhātassa attano vacanaṃ anādiyitvā
tika-s0404t0:338_1: taṃ vanasaṇḍaṃ pavisitvā tādisaṃ vippakāraṃ pattassa āyasmato meghiyassa kalyāṇamittatādinā
tika-s0404t0:338_2: sakalaṃ sāsanasampadaṃ dassetvā idānissa tattha ādarajātassa pubbe yehi kāmavitakkādīhi
tika-s0404t0:338_3: upaddutattā kammaṭṭhānaṃ na sampajjati, tassa tesaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhūtattā ca bhāvanānayaṃ
tika-s0404t0:338_4: pakāsetvā tato paraṃ arahattassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ ācikkhanto “tena ca pana, meghiya,
tika-s0404t0:338_5: bhikkhunā imesu pañcasu dhammesu patiṭṭhāya cattāro dhammā uttari bhāvetabbā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0404t0:338_6: Tattha tenāti evaṃ kalyāṇamittasannissayena yathāvuttasīlādiguṇasamannāgatena. Tenevāha
tika-s0404t0:338_7: “imesu pañcasu dhammesu patiṭṭhāyā”ti. Uttarīti āraddhataruṇavipassanassa rāgādiparissayā
tika-s0404t0:338_8: ce uppajjeyyuṃ, tesaṃ visodhanatthaṃ tato uddhaṃ cattāro dhammā bhāvetabbā uppādetabbā vaḍḍhetabbā ca.
tika-s0404t0:339_0: Asubhāti ekādasasu asubhakammaṭṭhānesu yathārahaṃ yattha katthaci asubhabhāvanā.
tika-s0404t0:339_1: Rāgassa pahānāyāti kāmarāgassa pajahanatthāya. Ayamattho sālilāvakopamāya vibhāvetabbo.
tika-s0404t0:339_2: Evaṃbhūtaṃ bhāvanāvidhiṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “asubhā bhāvetabbā rāgassa pahānāyā”ti.
tika-s0404t0:339_3: Mettāti mettākammaṭṭhānaṃ. Byāpādassa pahānāyāti vuttanayeneva uppannassa kopassa
tika-s0404t0:339_4: pajahanatthāya. Ānāpānassatīti soḷasavatthukā ānāpānassati. Vitakkupacchedāyāti vuttanayeneva
tika-s0404t0:340_0: Aniccasaññinoti hutvā abhāvato udayabbayavantato pabhaṅguto tāvakālikato niccappaṭikkhepato
tika-s0404t0:340_1: ca “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”ti pavattaaniccānupassanāvasena aniccasaññino. Anattasaññā
tika-s0404t0:340_2: saṇṭhātīti asārakato avasavattanato parato rittato tucchato suññato ca “sabbe dhammā
tika-s0404t0:340_3: anattā”ti evaṃ pavattaanattānupassanāsaṅkhātā anattasaññā citte saṇṭhahati atidaḷhaṃ
tika-s0404t0:340_4: patiṭṭhahati. Aniccalakkhaṇe hi diṭṭhe anattalakkhaṇaṃ diṭṭhameva hoti. Tīsu lakkhaṇesu
tika-s0404t0:340_5: hi ekasmiṃ diṭṭhe itaradvayaṃ diṭṭhameva hoti. Tena vuttaṃ “aniccasaññino, meghiya,
tika-s0404t0:340_6: anattasaññā saṇṭhātī”ti. Anattalakkhaṇe sudiṭṭhe “asmī”ti uppajjanakamāno suppajahova
tika-s0404t0:340_7: hotīti āha “anattasaññī asmimānasamugghātaṃ pāpuṇātī”ti. Diṭṭheva dhamme nibbānanti
tika-s0404t0:340_8: diṭṭheva dhamme imasmiṃyeva attabhāve apaccayaparinibbānaṃ pāpuṇāti. Ayamettha saṅkhepo,
tika-s0404t0:340_9: vitthārato pana asubhādibhāvanānayo visuddhimagge vuttanayena veditabbo.
tika-s0404t0:343_0: 4-5. Catutthe āgamayamānoti olokayamāno, buddho sahasā apavisitvā yāva sā kathā niṭṭhāti,
tika-s0404t0:343_1: tāva aṭṭhāsīti attho. Tenāha “idamavocāti idaṃ kathāvasānaṃ udikkhamāno”ti. Aniccadukkhādivasena
tika-s0404t0:343_3: Mānasanti rāgopi cittampi arahattampi. “Antalikkhacaro pāso, yvāyaṃ carati mānaso”ti
tika-s0404t0:343_4: ettha rāgo mānasaṃ. “Cittaṃ mano mānasa”nti ettha cittaṃ. “Appattamānaso sekho, kālaṃ
tika-s0404t0:343_5: kayirā jane sutā”ti ettha arahattaṃ. Idhāpi arahattameva adhippetaṃ. Tenāha “appattamānasāti
tika-s0404t0:343_6: appattaarahattā”ti. Appattaṃ mānasaṃ arahattaṃ etehīti appattamānasā. Idāni cittapariyāyameva
tika-s0404t0:346_0: 6. Chaṭṭhe jīvitasambhārāti jīvitappavattiyā sambhārā paccayā. Samudānetabbāti sammā
tika-s0404t0:346_1: ñāyena anavajjauñchācariyādinā uddhamuddhamānetabbā pāpuṇitabbā. Te pana samudānitā
tika-s0404t0:346_2: samāhatā nāma hontīti āha “samāharitabbā”ti. Dukkhena uppajjantīti sulabhuppādā na
tika-s0404t0:346_3: honti. Etena gocaraasappāyādibhāvaṃ dasseti. Rattibhāgaṃ vā divasabhāgaṃ vāti bhummatthe
tika-s0404t0:346_4: upayogavacananti āha “rattikoṭṭhāse vā divasakoṭṭhāse vā”ti. Rattiṃyeva pakkamitabbaṃ
tika-s0404t0:346_5: samaṇadhammassa tattha anipphajjanato. Saṅkhāpīti “yadatthamahaṃ pabbajito, na metaṃ
tika-s0404t0:346_6: idha nipphajjati, cīvarādi pana samudāgacchati, nāhaṃ tadatthaṃ pabbajito, kiṃ me
tika-s0404t0:346_7: idha vāsenā”ti paṭisaṅkhāyapi. Tenāha “sāmaññatthassa bhāvanāpāripūriagamanaṃ jānitvā”ti.
tika-s0404t0:346_8: Anantaravāre saṅkhāpīti samaṇadhammassa nipphajjanabhāvaṃ jānitvā. So puggalo anāpucchā
tika-s0404t0:346_10: sambandho. Yassa yena hi sambandho, dūraṭṭhenapi so bhavati. Taṃ puggalanti so puggaloti
tika-s0404t0:346_11: paccattavacanaṃ upayogavasena pariṇāmetvā taṃ puggalaṃ anāpucchā pakkamitabbanti
tika-s0404t0:346_12: attho. Atthavasena hi vibhattipariṇāmoti. Āpucchā pakkamitabbanti ca kataññukataveditāya
tika-s0404t0:346_13: niyojanaṃ. Evarūpoti yaṃ nissāya bhikkhuno guṇehi vuddhiyeva pāṭikaṅkhā, paccayehi
tika-s0404t0:346_14: na parissayo, evarūpo daṇḍakammādīhi niggaṇhāti cepi, na pariccajitabboti dasseti “sacepī”tiādinā.
tika-s0404t0:349_0: 7-10. Sattame abhabbo khīṇāsavo bhikkhu sañcicca pāṇantiādi desanāsīsameva, sotāpannādayopi
tika-s0404t0:349_1: pana abhabbāva, puthujjanakhīṇāsavānaṃ nindāpasaṃsatthampi evaṃ vuttaṃ. Puthujjano
tika-s0404t0:349_2: nāma gārayho mātughātādīni karoti, khīṇāsavo pana pāsaṃso kunthakipillikaghātādīnipi
tika-s0404t0:349_3: na karotīti. Sannidhikārakaṃ kāme paribhuñjitunti yathā gihibhūto sannidhiṃ katvā
tika-s0404t0:349_4: vatthukāme paribhuñjati, evaṃ tilataṇḍulasappinavanītādīni sannidhiṃ katvā idāni
tika-s0404t0:349_5: paribhuñjituṃ abhabboti attho. Vatthukāme pana nidahitvā paribhuñjantā tannissitaṃ
tika-s0404t0:349_6: kilesakāmampi nidahitvā paribhuñjanti nāmāti āha “vatthukāmakilesakāme”ti. Nanu ca
tika-s0404t0:349_7: khīṇāsavasseva vasanaṭṭhāne tilataṇḍulādayo paññāyantīti? Na pana te attano atthāya
tika-s0404t0:349_8: nidhenti, aphāsukapabbajitādīnaṃ atthāya nidhenti. Anāgāmissa kathanti? Tassapi pañca
tika-s0404t0:349_9: kāmaguṇā sabbasova pahīnā, dhammena pana laddhaṃ vicāretvā paribhuñjati. Akappiyakāmaguṇe
tika-s0404t0:349_10: sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ, na mañcapīṭhaattharaṇapāvuraṇādisannissitaṃ. Seyyāthāpi pubbe
tika-s0404t0:349_11: agāriyabhūtoti yathā pubbe gihibhūto paribhuñjati, evaṃ paribhuñjituṃ abhabbo. Agāramajjhe
tika-s0404t0:349_12: vasantā hi sotāpannādayo yāvajīvaṃ gihibyañjanena tiṭṭhanti. Khīṇāsavo pana arahattaṃ
tika-s0404t0:349_13: patvāva manussabhūto parinibbāti vā pabbajati vā. Cātumahārājikādīsu kāmāvacaradevesu
tika-s0404t0:349_14: muhuttampi na tiṭṭhati. Kasmā? Vivekaṭṭhānassa abhāvā. Bhummadevattabhāve pana ṭhito
tika-s0404t0:349_15: arahattaṃ patvāpi tiṭṭhati vivekaṭṭhānasambhavā. Aṭṭhamādīni uttānatthāneva.
tika-s0404t0:354_0: 11. Dutiyassa paṭhame avāpurenti vivaranti dvāraṃ etenāti avāpuraṇaṃ. Rajaṃ haranti
tika-s0404t0:354_2: ca vadanti. Chinnāni visāṇāni etassāti chinnavisāṇo, usabho ca so chinnavisāṇo cāti
tika-s0404t0:354_3: usabhachinnavisāṇo. Visesanaparoyaṃ samāso. Ahikuṇapena vātiādi atijegucchappaṭikūlakuṇapadassanatthaṃ
tika-s0404t0:354_4: vuttaṃ. Kaṇṭhe āsattenāti kenacideva paccatthikena ānetvā kaṇṭhe baddhena, omukkenāti
tika-s0404t0:354_5: attho. Aṭṭo āturo duggandhapīḷāya pīḷito. Accayassa paṭiggaṇhanaṃ vā adhivāsanaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:354_6: Evañhi so kāraṇe desiyamāne tato vigato nāma hoti. Tenāha “paṭiggaṇhatūti khamatū”ti.
tika-s0404t0:357: 12. Dutiye bhavassa appamattakatā nāma ittarakālatāyāti āha “accharāsaṅghātamattampī”ti.
tika-s0404t0:360_0: 13. Tatiye diṭṭhadhammo vuccati paccakkhabhūto attabhāvo, tasmiṃ veditabbaṃ phalaṃ
tika-s0404t0:360_2: saññābhavūpagaṃ kammaṃ bahuvedanīyaṃ. Ekakkhandhaphalattā asaññābhavūpagaṃ kammaṃ
tika-s0404t0:360_4: bahuvedanīyaṃ, itaraṃ appavedanīyaṃ. Rūpārūpāvacarakammaṃ vā bahuvedanīyaṃ, parittaṃ
tika-s0404t0:360_5: kammaṃ appavedanīya”nti vadanti. Vedanīyanti paccayantarasamavāye vipākuppādanasamatthaṃ,
tika-s0404t0:360_6: na āraddhavipākameva. Avedanīyanti paccayavekallena vipaccituṃ asamatthaṃ ahosikammādibhedaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:363_0: 14. Catutthe samiddhīti therassa kira attabhāvo samiddho abhirūpo pāsādiko, tasmā
tika-s0404t0:366_0: 15-19. Pañcame mātāpettikasambhavassāti mātito ca pitito ca nibbattena mātāpettikena
tika-s0404t0:366_2: parimadditabbasabhāvassa. Ettha ca odanakummāsūpacayaucchādanapadehi vaḍḍhi kathitā,
tika-s0404t0:366_3: aniccabhedanaviddhaṃsanapadehi hāni. Purimehi vā samudayo, pacchimehi atthaṅgamoti
tika-s0404t0:366_4: evaṃ cātumahābhūtikassa kāyassa vaḍḍhiparihāninibbattibhedā dassitā. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
tika-s0404t0:369_0: 20. Dasame sakuṇḍakabhattanti sakuṇḍakaṃ uttaṇḍulabhattaṃ. Parittehi sakuṇḍehi taṇḍulehipi
tika-s0404t0:369_1: saddhiṃ vipakkabhattaṃ uttaṇḍulameva hoti. Biḷaṅgaṃ vuccati āranāḷaṃ, biḷaṅgato nibbattanato
tika-s0404t0:369_2: tadeva kañjiyato jātanti kañjiyaṃ, taṃ dutiyaṃ etassāti biḷaṅgadutiyaṃ, taṃ kañjiyadutiyanti
tika-s0404t0:369_3: vuttaṃ. Asakkaritvāti deyyadhammampi puggalampi asakkaritvā. Deyyadhammassa asakkaraṇaṃ
tika-s0404t0:369_4: asampannakāro, puggalassa asakkaraṇaṃ agarukaraṇaṃ. Deyyadhammaṃ asakkaronto hi uttaṇḍulādidosasamannāgataṃ
tika-s0404t0:369_5: āhāraṃ deti, na sampannaṃ karoti. Puggalaṃ asakkaronto nisīdanaṭṭhānaṃ asammajjitvā
tika-s0404t0:369_6: yattha tattha vā nisīdāpetvā yaṃ vā taṃ vā dārakaṃ pesetvā deti. Acittīkatvāti na
tika-s0404t0:369_7: cittiṃ katvā, na pūjetvāti attho. Pūjento hi pūjetabbavatthuṃ citte ṭhapeti, na tato
tika-s0404t0:369_8: bahi karoti. Cittaṃ vā acchariyaṃ katvā paṭipatti cittīkaraṇaṃ sambhāvanakiriyā,
tika-s0404t0:369_10: viya avakhittakaṃ. Yo hi chaḍḍetukāmo hutvā rogino sarīre odanādīni majjitvā vammike
tika-s0404t0:369_11: rogaṃ pakkhipanto viya deti, ayaṃ apaviddhaṃ deti nāma. Anāgamanadiṭṭhikoti “addhā
tika-s0404t0:369_12: imassa dānassa phalaṃ mama āgacchatī”ti evaṃ yassa kammassakatadiṭṭhi atthi, so āgamanadiṭṭhiko.
tika-s0404t0:369_13: Ayaṃ pana na tādisoti anāgamanadiṭṭhiko, phalaṃ pāṭikaṅkhaṃ hutvā na detīti attho.
tika-s0404t0:370_0: Velāmoti ettha mā-saddo paṭisedhavacano. Jātigottarūpabhogādiguṇānaṃ velā mariyādā
tika-s0404t0:370_1: natthi etasminti velāmo. Atha vā yathāvuttaguṇānaṃ velā mariyādā amati osānaṃ gacchati
tika-s0404t0:370_2: etasminti velāmo, velaṃ vā mariyādaṃ amati gacchati atikkamatīti velāmo. Tenāha “jātigotta…pe…
tika-s0404t0:370_3: evaṃladdhanāmo”ti. Dīyatīti dānaṃ, dānavatthu. Taṃ aggīyati nissajjīyati etthāti
tika-s0404t0:370_4: dānaggaṃ. Dānaṃ vā gaṇhanti etthāti dānaggaṃ, evaṃ bhattaggaṃ, parivesanaṭṭhānaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:370_5: Dukūlasandanānīti rajatabhājanādinissite dukūle khīrassa sandanaṃ etesanti dukūlasandanāni.
tika-s0404t0:370_8: Sodheyyāti mahapphalabhāvakaraṇena visodheyya. Mahapphalabhāvappattiyā hi dakkhiṇā visujjhati nāma.
tika-s0404t0:371_0: Maggenāgataṃ anivattanasaraṇanti iminā lokuttarasaraṇagamanaṃ dīpeti. Aparetiādinā
tika-s0404t0:371_1: lokiyasaraṇagamanaṃ vuttaṃ. Saraṇaṃ nāma tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ jīvitapariccāgamayaṃ puññaṃ
tika-s0404t0:371_2: sabbasampattiṃ deti, tasmā mahapphalataranti adhippāyo. Idañca – “sace tvaṃ yathā
tika-s0404t0:371_3: gahitaṃ saraṇaṃ na bhindissasi, evāhaṃ taṃ māremī”ti yadipi koci tiṇhena satthena
tika-s0404t0:371_4: jīvitā voropeyya, tathāpi “nevāhaṃ buddhaṃ na buddhoti, dhammaṃ na dhammoti, saṅghaṃ
tika-s0404t0:371_5: na saṅghoti vadāmī”ti daḷhataraṃ katvā gahitassa vasena vuttaṃ. Maggenāgatanti lokuttarasīlaṃ
tika-s0404t0:371_6: sandhāya vadati. Aparetiādinā pana lokiyasīlaṃ vuttaṃ. Sabbesaṃ sattānaṃ jīvitadānādinihitadaṇḍatāya
tika-s0404t0:372_0: Upasiṅghanamattanti ghāyanamattaṃ. Gaddohanamattanti pāṭhantare godohanamattaṃ kālanti
tika-s0404t0:372_1: attho. So ca na sakalo godohanakkhaṇo adhippetoti dassetuṃ “gāviyā ekavāraṃ thanaañchanamatta”nti
tika-s0404t0:372_2: attho vutto. Añchanamattanti ākaḍḍhanamattaṃ. Gāviyā thanaṃ gahetvā ekakhīrabinduduhanakālamattampi
tika-s0404t0:372_3: gadduhanamattanti vadanti. Ettakampi hi kālaṃ yo vasanagabbhapariveṇavihārūpacāraparicchedena
tika-s0404t0:372_4: vā aparimāṇāsu lokadhātūsu sabbasatte hitapharaṇaṃ mettacittaṃ bhāvetuṃ sakkoti.
tika-s0404t0:377_0: 21. Tatiyassa paṭhame amamāti vatthābharaṇapānabhojanādīsupi mamattavirahitā. Apariggahāti
tika-s0404t0:377_1: itthipariggahena apariggahā. Tesaṃ kira “ayaṃ mayhaṃ bhariyā”ti mamattaṃ na hoti,
tika-s0404t0:377_2: mātaraṃ vā bhaginiṃ vā disvā chandarāgo na uppajjati. Dhammatāsiddhassa sīlassa ānubhāvena
tika-s0404t0:377_3: putte diṭṭhamatte eva mātuthanato thaññaṃ paggharati, tena saññāṇena nesaṃ mātari
tika-s0404t0:377_4: puttassa mātusaññā, mātu ca putte puttasaññā paccupaṭṭhitāti keci.
tika-s0404t0:378_0: Apicettha uttarakurukānaṃ puññānubhāvasiddho ayampi viseso veditabbo. Tattha kira
tika-s0404t0:378_1: tesu tesu padesesu ghananicitapattasañchannasākhāpasākhā kūṭāgārasamā manoramā rukkhā
tika-s0404t0:378_2: tesaṃ manussānaṃ nivesanakiccaṃ sādhenti. Yattha sukhaṃ nivasanti, aññepi tattha
tika-s0404t0:378_3: rukkhā sujātā sabbadāpi pupphitaggā tiṭṭhanti. Jalāsayāpi vikasitakamalakuvalayapuṇḍarīkasogandhikādipupphasañchannā
tika-s0404t0:378_4: sabbakālaṃ paramasugandhaṃ samantato pavāyantā tiṭṭhanti. Sarīrampi tesaṃ atidīghādidosarahitaṃ
tika-s0404t0:378_7: ca nesaṃ kasivaṇijjādivasena āhārapariyeṭṭhivasena dukkhaṃ atthi, tato eva na dāsadāsikammakarādipariggaho
tika-s0404t0:378_8: atthi, na ca tattha sītuṇhaḍaṃsamakasavātātapasarīsapavāḷādiparissayo atthi. Yathā
tika-s0404t0:378_9: nāmettha gimhānaṃ pacchime māse paccūsavelāyaṃ samasītuṇho utu hoti, evameva sabbakālaṃ
tika-s0404t0:378_10: tattha samasītuṇhova utu hoti, na ca nesaṃ koci upaghāto vihesā vā uppajjati. Akaṭṭhapākimeva
tika-s0404t0:378_11: sāliṃ akaṇaṃ athusaṃ suddhaṃ sugandhaṃ taṇḍulapphalaṃ paribhuñjanti. Taṃ bhuñjantānaṃ
tika-s0404t0:378_12: nesaṃ kuṭṭhaṃ, gaṇḍo, kilāso, soso, kāso, sāso, apamāro, jaroti evamādiko na koci
tika-s0404t0:378_13: rogo uppajjati, na ca te khujjā vā vāmanā vā kāṇā vā kuṇī vā khañjā vā pakkhahatā
tika-s0404t0:378_14: vā vikalaṅgā vā vikalindriyā vā honti.
tika-s0404t0:379_0: Itthiyopi tattha nātidīghā, nātirassā, nātikisā, nātithūlā, nātikāḷā, naccodātā,
tika-s0404t0:379_1: sobhaggappattarūpā honti. Tathā hi dīghaṅgulī, tambanakhā, alambathanā, tanumajjhā,
tika-s0404t0:379_2: puṇṇacandamukhī, visālakkhī, mudugattā, sahitorū, odātadantā, gambhīranābhī, tanujaṅghā,
tika-s0404t0:379_3: dīghanīlavellitakesī, puthulasussoṇī, nātilomā, nālomā, subhagā, utusukhasamphassā,
tika-s0404t0:379_4: saṇhā, sakhilā, sukhasambhāsā, nānābharaṇavibhūsitā vicaranti. Sabbadāpi soḷasavassuddesikā
tika-s0404t0:379_5: viya honti, purisā ca pañcavīsativassuddesikā viya. Na puttadāresu rajjanti. Ayaṃ tattha dhammatā.
tika-s0404t0:380_0: Sattāhikameva ca tattha itthipurisā kāmaratiyā viharanti. Tato vītarāgā viya yathāsakaṃ
tika-s0404t0:380_1: gacchanti, na tattha idha viya gabbhokkantimūlakaṃ, gabbhapariharaṇamūlakaṃ, vijāyanamūlakaṃ
tika-s0404t0:380_2: vā dukkhaṃ hoti. Rattakañcukato kañcanapaṭimā viya dārakā mātukucchito amakkhitā
tika-s0404t0:380_3: eva semhādinā sukheneva nikkhamanti. Ayaṃ tattha dhammatā.
tika-s0404t0:381_0: Mātā pana puttaṃ vā dhītaraṃ vā vijāyitvā te vicaraṇakappadese ṭhapetvā anapekkhā
tika-s0404t0:381_1: yathāruci gacchati. Tesaṃ tattha sayitānaṃ ye passanti purisā vā itthiyo vā, te attano
tika-s0404t0:381_2: aṅguliyo upanāmenti. Tesaṃ kammabalena tato khīraṃ pavattati, tena te dārakā yāpenti.
tika-s0404t0:381_3: Evaṃ pana vaḍḍhentā katipayadivaseheva laddhabalā hutvā dārikā itthiyo upagacchanti,
tika-s0404t0:381_4: dārakā purise. Kapparukkhato eva ca tesaṃ tattha vatthābharaṇāni nipphajjanti. Nānāvirāgavaṇṇavicittāni
tika-s0404t0:381_5: hi sukhumāni mudusukhasamphassāni vatthāni tattha tattha kapparukkhesu olambantāni
tika-s0404t0:381_9: tūriyabhaṇḍāpi tato tato olambanti. Tattha bahū phalarukkhā kumbhamattāni phalāni
tika-s0404t0:381_10: phalanti madhurarasāni, yāni paribhuñjitvā te sattāhampi khuppipāsāhi na bādhīyanti.
tika-s0404t0:382_0: Najjopi tattha suvisuddhajalā suppatitthā ramaṇīyā akaddamā vālukatalā nātisītā naccuṇhā
tika-s0404t0:382_1: surabhigandhīhi jalajapupphehi sañchannā sabbakālaṃ surabhī vāyantiyo sandanti, na
tika-s0404t0:382_2: tattha kaṇṭakikā kakkhaḷagacchalatā honti, akaṇṭakā pupphaphalasampannā eva honti,
tika-s0404t0:382_3: candananāgarukkhā sayameva rasaṃ paggharanti, nahāyitukāmā ca nadititthe ekajjhaṃ
tika-s0404t0:382_4: vatthābharaṇāni ṭhapetvā nadiṃ otaritvā nhatvā uttiṇṇuttiṇṇā upariṭṭhimaṃ upariṭṭhimaṃ
tika-s0404t0:382_5: vatthābharaṇaṃ gaṇhanti, na tesaṃ evaṃ hoti “idaṃ mama, idaṃ parassā”ti. Tato eva
tika-s0404t0:382_6: na tesaṃ koci viggaho vā vivādo vā. Sattāhikā eva ca nesaṃ kāmaratikīḷā hoti, tato
tika-s0404t0:382_7: vītarāgā viya vicaranti. Yattha ca rukkhe sayitukāmā honti, tattheva sayanaṃ upalabbhati.
