tika-s0404t0:382_8: Mate ca satte disvā na rodanti na socanti. Tañca maṇḍayitvā nikkhipanti. Tāvadeva
tika-s0404t0:382_9: ca nesaṃ tathārūpā sakuṇā upagantvā mataṃ dīpantaraṃ nenti, tasmā susānaṃ vā asuciṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0404t0:382_10: vā tattha natthi, na ca tato matā nirayaṃ vā tiracchānayoniṃ vā pettivisayaṃ vā upapajjanti.
tika-s0404t0:382_11: Dhammatāsiddhassa pañcasīlassa ānubhāvena te devaloke nibbattantīti vadanti. Vassasahassameva
tika-s0404t0:382_12: ca nesaṃ sabbakālaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ, sabbametaṃ tesaṃ pañcasīlaṃ viya dhammatāsiddhamevāti.
tika-s0404t0:385_0: 23. Tatiye esanataṇhāti bhogānaṃ pariyesanavasena pavattā taṇhā. Esitataṇhāti pariyiṭṭhesu
tika-s0404t0:385_1: bhogesu uppajjamānataṇhā. Paritassanavasena pariyesati etāyāti pariyesanā, āsayato
tika-s0404t0:385_2: payogato ca pariyesanā tathāpavatto cittuppādo. Tenāha “taṇhāya sati hotī”ti. Rūpādiārammaṇappaṭilābhoti
tika-s0404t0:385_3: savatthukānaṃ rūpādiārammaṇānaṃ gavesanavasena paṭilābho. Yaṃ pana apariyiṭṭhaṃyeva
tika-s0404t0:385_4: labbhati, tampi atthato pariyesanāya laddhameva nāma tathārūpassa kammassa pubbekatattā
tika-s0404t0:385_5: eva labbhanato. Tenāha “so hi pariyesanāya sati hotī”ti.
tika-s0404t0:386_0: Sukhavinicchayanti sukhaṃ visesato nicchinotīti sukhavinicchayo. Sukhaṃ sabhāvato
tika-s0404t0:386_1: samudayato atthaṅgamato ādīnavato nissaraṇato ca yāthāvato jānitvā pavattañāṇaṃva
tika-s0404t0:386_2: sukhavinicchayaṃ. Jaññāti jāneyya. “Subhaṃ sukha”ntiādikaṃ ārammaṇe abhūtākāraṃ vividhaṃ
tika-s0404t0:386_3: ninnabhāvena cinoti āropetīti vinicchayo, assādānupassanā taṇhā. Diṭṭhiyāpi evameva
tika-s0404t0:386_4: vinicchayabhāvo veditabbo. Imasmiṃ pana sutte vitakkoyeva āgatoti yojanā. Imasmiṃ
tika-s0404t0:386_5: pana sutteti sakkapañhasutte. Tattha hi “chando kho, devānaminda, vitakkanidāno”ti
tika-s0404t0:386_6: āgataṃ. Idhāti imasmiṃ sutte. Vitakkeneva vinicchinantīti etena “vinicchinati etenāti
tika-s0404t0:387_0: Chandanaṭṭhena chando, evaṃ rañjanaṭṭhena rāgoti chandarāgo. Svāyaṃ anāsevanatāya
tika-s0404t0:387_1: mando hutvā pavatto idhādhippetoti āha “dubbalarāgassādhivacana”nti. Ajjhosānanti
tika-s0404t0:387_2: taṇhādiṭṭhivasena abhinivesanaṃ. “Mayhaṃ ida”nti hi taṇhāgāho yebhuyyena attaggāhasannissayova
tika-s0404t0:387_3: hoti. Tenāha “ahaṃ mamantī”ti. Balavasanniṭṭhānanti ca tesaṃ gāhānaṃ thirabhāvappattimāha.
tika-s0404t0:387_4: Taṇhādiṭṭhivasena pariggahakaraṇanti ahaṃ mamanti balavasanniṭṭhānavasena abhiniviṭṭhassa
tika-s0404t0:387_5: attattaniyaggāhavatthuno aññāsādhāraṇaṃ viya katvā pariggahetvā ṭhānaṃ, tathāpavatto
tika-s0404t0:387_6: lobhasahagatacittuppādo. Attanā pariggahitassa vatthuno yassa vasena parehi sādhāraṇabhāvassa
tika-s0404t0:387_7: asahamāno hoti puggalo, so dhammo asahanatā. Evaṃ vacanatthaṃ vadanti niruttinayena.
tika-s0404t0:387_8: Saddalakkhaṇena pana yassa dhammassa vasena macchariyayogato puggalo maccharo, tassa
tika-s0404t0:387_9: bhāvo, kammaṃ vā macchariyaṃ, maccharo dhammo. Macchariyassa balavabhāvato ādarena
tika-s0404t0:388_0: Attano phalaṃ karotīti karaṇaṃ, yaṃ kiñci kāraṇaṃ. Adhikaṃ karaṇanti adhikaraṇaṃ,
tika-s0404t0:388_3: Ādiyanti etenāti ādānaṃ, daṇḍassa ādānaṃ daṇḍādānaṃ, daṇḍaṃ āharitvā paraviheṭhanacittuppādo.
tika-s0404t0:388_4: Satthādānepi eseva nayo. Hatthaparāmāsādivasena kāyena kātabbo kalaho kāyakalaho.
tika-s0404t0:388_5: Mammaghaṭṭanādivasena vācāya kātabbo kalaho vācākalaho. Virujjhanavasena virūpaṃ
tika-s0404t0:388_6: gaṇhāti etenāti viggaho. Viruddhaṃ vadati etenāti vivādo. “Tuvaṃ tuva”nti agāravavacanasahacaraṇato
tika-s0404t0:388_7: tuvaṃtuvaṃ. Sabbepi te tathāpavattadosasahagatā cittuppādā veditabbā. Tenāha bhagavā
tika-s0404t0:391_0: 24-25. Catutthe sattā āvasanti etesūti sattāvāsā, nānattasaññiādibhedā sattanikāyā.
tika-s0404t0:391_1: Yasmā te te sattanivāsā tappariyāpannānaṃ sattānaṃ tāya eva tappariyāpannatāya ādhāro
tika-s0404t0:391_2: viya vattabbataṃ arahanti. Samudāyācāro hi avayavassa yathā “rukkhe sākhā”ti, tasmā
tika-s0404t0:391_3: “sattānaṃ āvāsā, vasanaṭṭhānānīti attho”ti vuttaṃ. Suddhāvāsāpi sattāvāsova “na so,
tika-s0404t0:391_4: bhikkhave, sattāvāso sulabharūpo, yo mayā anāvutthapubbo iminā dīghena addhunā aññatra
tika-s0404t0:391_5: suddhāvāsehi devehī”ti vacanato. Yadi evaṃ te kasmā idha na gahitāti tattha kāraṇamāha
tika-s0404t0:391_6: “asabbakālikattā”tiādi. Vehapphalā pana catuttheyeva sattāvāse bhajantīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:394_0: 26. Chaṭṭhe pamāṇamajjhimassa purisassa catuvīsataṅguliko hattho kukku, “kakkū”tipi
tika-s0404t0:394_1: tasseva nāmaṃ. Aṭṭha kukkū upari nemassāti aṭṭha hatthā āvāṭassa upari uggantvā ṭhitā
tika-s0404t0:397_0: 27. Sattame yatoti yasmiṃ kāle. Ayañhi to-saddo dā-saddo viya idha kālavisayo, yadāti
tika-s0404t0:397_1: vuttaṃ hoti. Bhayāni verānīti bhīyate bhayaṃ, bhayena yogā, bhāyitabbena vā bhayaṃ
tika-s0404t0:397_2: eva verappasavaṭṭhena veranti ca laddhanāmā cetanādayo. Pāṇātipātādayo hi yassa pavattanti,
tika-s0404t0:397_3: yañca uddissa pavattīyanti, ubhayesañca verāvahā, tato eva cete bhāyitabbā verasañjanakā
tika-s0404t0:397_4: nāmāti. Sotassa ariyamaggassa ādito pajjanaṃ paṭipatti adhigamo sotāpatti. Tadatthāya
tika-s0404t0:397_5: tattha patiṭṭhitassa ca aṅgāni sotāpattiyaṅgāni. Duvidhañhi sotāpattiyaṅgaṃ sotāpattiatthāya
tika-s0404t0:397_6: ca aṅgaṃ kāraṇaṃ, yaṃ sotāpattimaggappaṭilābhato pubbabhāge sotāpattippaṭilābhāya
tika-s0404t0:397_8: evaṃ āgataṃ. Paṭiladdhaguṇassa ca sotāpattiṃ patvā ṭhitassa aṅgaṃ, yaṃ “sotāpannassa
tika-s0404t0:397_9: aṅga”ntipi vuccati “sotāpanno aṅgīyati ñāyati etenā”ti katvā, buddhe aveccappasādādīnaṃ
tika-s0404t0:398_0: Khīṇanirayotiādīsu āyatiṃ tattha anuppajjanatāya khīṇo nirayo mayhati, so ahaṃ khīṇanirayo.
tika-s0404t0:398_1: Esa nayo sabbattha. Sotāpannoti maggasotaṃ āpanno. Avinipātadhammoti na vinipātasabhāvo.
tika-s0404t0:398_2: Niyatoti paṭhamamaggasaṅkhātena sammattaniyāmena niyato. Sambodhiparāyaṇoti uparimaggattayasaṅkhāto
tika-s0404t0:398_3: sambodhi paraṃ ayanaṃ mayhanti sohaṃ sambodhiparāyaṇo, sambodhiṃ avassaṃ abhisambujjhanakoti attho.
tika-s0404t0:399_0: Pāṇātipātapaccayāti pāṇātipātakammassa karaṇahetu. Bhayaṃ veranti atthato ekaṃ. Veraṃ
tika-s0404t0:399_1: vuccati virodho, tadeva bhāyitabbato “bhaya”nti vuccati. Tañca panetaṃ duvidhaṃ hoti
tika-s0404t0:399_2: – bāhiraṃ, ajjhattikanti. Ekena hi ekassa pitā mārito hoti. So cinteti “etena kira
tika-s0404t0:399_3: me pitā mārito, ahampi taṃyeva māressāmī”ti nisitaṃ satthaṃ ādāya carati. Yā tassa
tika-s0404t0:399_4: abbhantare uppannā veracetanā, idaṃ bāhiraṃ veraṃ nāma tassa verassa mūlabhūtato
tika-s0404t0:399_5: verakārakapuggalato bahibhāvattā. Yā pana itarassa “ayaṃ kira maṃ māressāmīti carati,
tika-s0404t0:399_6: ahameva naṃ paṭhamataraṃ māressāmī”ti cetanā uppajjati, idaṃ ajjhattikaṃ veraṃ nāma.
tika-s0404t0:399_7: Idaṃ tāva ubhayampi diṭṭhadhammikameva. Yā pana taṃ niraye uppannaṃ disvā “etaṃ paharissāmī”ti
tika-s0404t0:399_8: jalitaṃ ayamuggaraṃ gaṇhantassa nirayapālassa cetanā uppajjati, idamassa samparāyikaṃ
tika-s0404t0:399_9: bāhiraṃ veraṃ. Yā cassa “ayaṃ niddosaṃ maṃ paharissāmīti āgacchati, ahameva naṃ paṭhamataraṃ
tika-s0404t0:399_10: paharissāmī”ti cetanā uppajjati, idamassa samparāyikaṃ ajjhattaṃ veraṃ. Yaṃ panetaṃ
tika-s0404t0:399_11: bāhiraṃ veraṃ, taṃ aṭṭhakathāsu “puggalavera”nti vuccati. Dukkhaṃ domanassanti atthato
tika-s0404t0:399_12: ekameva. Yathā cettha, evaṃ sesesupi “iminā mama bhaṇḍaṃ haṭaṃ, mayhaṃ dāresu cārittaṃ
tika-s0404t0:399_13: āpannaṃ, musā vatvā attho bhaggo, surāmadamattena idaṃ nāma kata”ntiādinā nayena
tika-s0404t0:400_0: Aveccappasādenāti adhigatena acalappasādena. Ariyakantehīti pañcahi sīlehi. Tāni
tika-s0404t0:400_1: hi ariyānaṃ kantāni piyāni bhavanti, bhavantaragatāpi ariyā tāni na vijahanti, tasmā
tika-s0404t0:400_2: “ariyakantānī”ti vuccanti. Sesamettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ sabbaṃ visuddhimagge
tika-s0404t0:403_0: 29. Navame vasati ettha phalaṃ tannimittatāya pavattatīti vatthu, kāraṇanti āha “āghātavatthūnī”ti.
tika-s0404t0:403_1: Kopo nāmāyaṃ yasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ uppajjati, na tattha ekavārameva uppajjati, atha kho
tika-s0404t0:403_2: punapi uppajjatevāti vuttaṃ “bandhatī”ti. Atha vā yo paccayavisesena uppajjamāno
tika-s0404t0:403_3: āghāto savisaye baddho viya na vigacchati, punapi uppajjateva. Taṃ sandhāyāha “āghātaṃ
tika-s0404t0:403_4: bandhatī”ti. Taṃ panassa paccayavasena nibbattanaṃ uppādanamevāti vuttaṃ “uppādetī”ti.
tika-s0404t0:406_0: 30. Dasame taṃ kutettha labbhāti ettha tanti kiriyāparāmasanaṃ. Padajjhāhārena ca
tika-s0404t0:406_1: attho veditabboti “taṃ anatthacaraṇaṃ mā ahosī”tiādimāha. Kena kāraṇena laddhabbaṃ
tika-s0404t0:406_2: niratthakabhāvato. Kammassakā hi sattā. Te kassa ruciyā dukkhitā sukhitā vā bhavanti,
tika-s0404t0:406_3: tasmā kevalaṃ tasmiṃ mayhaṃ anatthacaraṇaṃ, taṃ kutettha labbhāti adhippāyo. Atha
tika-s0404t0:406_4: vā taṃ kopakāraṇaṃ ettha puggale kuto labbhā paramatthato kujjhitabbassa kujjhanakassa
tika-s0404t0:406_5: ca abhāvato. Saṅkhāramattañhetaṃ, yadidaṃ khandhapañcakaṃ yaṃ “satto”ti vuccati,
tika-s0404t0:406_6: te saṅkhārā ittarakhaṇikā, kassa ko kujjhatīti attho. Lābhā nāma ke siyuṃ aññatra anatthuppattito.
tika-s0404t0:409: 31. Ekādasame anupubbanirodhāti anupubbena anukkamena pavattetabbanirodhā. Tenāha “anupaṭipāṭinirodhā”ti.
tika-s0404t0:414: 32. Catutthassa paṭhame anupubbato viharitabbāti anupubbavihārā. Anupaṭipāṭiyāti anukkamena. Samāpajjitabbavihārāti samāpajjitvā samaṅgino hutvā viharitabbavihārā.
tika-s0404t0:417_0: 33-34. Dutiye chātaṃ vuccati taṇhādiṭṭhiyo kāmānaṃ pātabbato tāsaṃ vasena vattanato,
tika-s0404t0:417_1: tanninnattā natthi etesu chātanti nicchātā. Tenāha “taṇhādiṭṭhicchātāna”ntiādi. Tatiye natthi vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:420_0: 35. Catutthe pabbatacārinīti pakatiyā pabbate bahulacārinī. Akhettaññūti agocaraññū.
tika-s0404t0:420_2: abhāvena abyatto. Uparijhānassa padaṭṭhānabhāvānavabodhena akhettaññū. Sabbathāpi
tika-s0404t0:420_3: samāpattikosallābhāvena akusalo. Samādhinimittassa vā anāsevanāya bālo. Abhāvanāya
tika-s0404t0:420_4: abyatto. Abahulīkārena akhettaññū. Sammadeva anadhiṭṭhānato akusaloti yojetabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:420_5: Ubhato bhaṭṭhoti ubhayato jhānato bhaṭṭho. So hi appaguṇatāya na suppatiṭṭhitatāya
tika-s0404t0:420_6: saussāhopi vināsato asāmatthiyato ca jhānadvayato parihīno.
tika-s0404t0:423_0: 36. Pañcame aniccatoti iminā niccappaṭikkhepato tesaṃ aniccatamāha. Tato eva udayavayavantato
tika-s0404t0:423_1: vipariṇāmato tāvakālikato ca te aniccāti jotitaṃ hoti. Yañhi niccaṃ na hoti, taṃ
tika-s0404t0:423_2: udayavayaparicchinnajarāya maraṇena cāti dvedhā vipariṇataṃ ittarakkhaṇameva ca hoti.
tika-s0404t0:423_3: Dukkhatoti na sukhato. Iminā sukhappaṭikkhepato tesaṃ dukkhatamāha. Tato eva ca abhiṇhappaṭipīḷanato
tika-s0404t0:423_4: dukkhavatthuto ca te dukkhāti jotitaṃ hoti. Udayavayavantatāya hi te abhiṇhappaṭipīḷanato
tika-s0404t0:423_5: nirantaradukkhatāya dukkhasseva ca adhiṭṭhānabhūto. Paccayayāpanīyatāya rogamūlatāya
tika-s0404t0:423_6: ca rogato. Dukkhatāsūlayogato kilesāsucipaggharato uppādajarābhaṅgehi uddhumātapakkabhijjanato
tika-s0404t0:423_7: ca gaṇḍato. Pīḷājananato antotudanato dunnīharaṇato ca sallato. Avaḍḍhiāvahanato
tika-s0404t0:423_8: aghavatthuto ca aghato. Aseribhāvajananato ābādhappatiṭṭhānatāya ca ābādhato. Avasavattanato
tika-s0404t0:423_9: avidheyyatāya ca parato. Byādhijarāmaraṇehi palujjanīyatāya palokato. Sāminivāsīkārakavedakaadhiṭṭhāyakavirahato
tika-s0404t0:423_10: suññato. Attappaṭikkhepaṭṭhena anattato. Rūpādidhammāpi yathā na ettha attā atthīti
tika-s0404t0:423_11: anattā, evaṃ sayampi attā na hontīti anattā. Tena abyāpārato nirīhato tucchato anattāti dīpitaṃ hoti.
tika-s0404t0:424_0: Lakkhaṇattayameva sukhāvabodhanatthaṃ ekādasahi padehi vibhajitvā gahitanti dassetuṃ
tika-s0404t0:424_1: “yasmā aniccato”tiādi vuttaṃ. Antosamāpattiyanti samāpattīnaṃ sahajātatāya samāpattīnaṃ
tika-s0404t0:424_4: savanavasena. Thutivasenāti tatheva thomanāvasena guṇato saṃkittanavasena. Pariyattivasenāti
tika-s0404t0:424_5: tassa dhammassa pariyāpuṇanavasena. Paññattivasenāti tadatthassa paññāpanavasena.
tika-s0404t0:424_6: Ārammaṇakaraṇavaseneva upasaṃharati maggacittaṃ, “etaṃ santa”ntiādi pana avadhāraṇanivattitatthadassanaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:424_7: Yathā vipassanā “etaṃ santaṃ etaṃ paṇīta”ntiādinā asaṅkhatāya dhātuyā cittaṃ upasaṃharati,
tika-s0404t0:424_8: evaṃ maggo nibbānaṃ sacchikiriyābhisamayavasena abhisamento tattha labbhamāne sabbepi
tika-s0404t0:424_9: visese asammohato paṭivijjhanto tattha cittaṃ upasaṃharati. Tenāha “iminā pana ākārenā”tiādi.
tika-s0404t0:425_0: So tattha ṭhitoti so adandhavipassako yogī tattha tāya aniccādilakkhaṇattayārammaṇāya
tika-s0404t0:425_1: vipassanāya ṭhito. Sabbasoti sabbattha tassa tassa maggassa adhigamāya nibbattitasamathavipassanāsu.
tika-s0404t0:425_2: Asakkonto anāgāmī hotīti heṭṭhimamaggāvahāsu eva samathavipassanāya chandarāgaṃ pahāya
tika-s0404t0:425_3: aggamaggāvahāsu nikantiṃ pariyādātuṃ asakkonto anāgāmitāyameva saṇṭhāti.
tika-s0404t0:426_0: Samatikkantattāti samathavasena vipassanāvasena cāti sabbathāpi rūpassa samatikkantattā.
tika-s0404t0:426_1: Tenāha “ayaṃ hī”tiādi. Anenāti yoginā. Taṃ atikkammāti idaṃ yo paṭhamaṃ pañcavokāraekavokārapariyāpanne
tika-s0404t0:426_2: dhamme sammadeva sammasitvā te vissajjetvā tato arūpasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā arūpadhamme
tika-s0404t0:426_3: sammasati, taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tenāha “idāni arūpaṃ sammasatī”ti.
tika-s0404t0:429_0: 37. Chaṭṭhe okāsaṃ avasaraṃ adhigacchati etenāti okāsādhigamo, maggaphalasukhādhigamāya
tika-s0404t0:429_1: okāsabhāvato vā okāso, tassa adhigamo okāsādhigamo. Ettha ca dīghanikāyeneva pana
tika-s0404t0:429_2: suttantadesanāyaṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ, catutthajjhānaṃ, arahattamaggoti tayo okāsādhigamā
tika-s0404t0:429_3: āgatā. Tattha paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ pañca nīvaraṇāni vikkhambhetvā attano okāsaṃ gahetvā
tika-s0404t0:429_4: tiṭṭhatīti “paṭhamo okāsādhigamo”ti vuttaṃ. Catutthajjhānaṃ pana sukhadukkhaṃ vikkhambhetvā
tika-s0404t0:429_5: attano okāsaṃ gahetvā tiṭṭhatīti dutiyo okāsādhigamo. Arahattamaggo sabbakilese vikkhambhetvā
tika-s0404t0:429_6: attano okāsaṃ gahetvā tiṭṭhatīti “tatiyo okāsādhigamo”ti vutto. Idha pana vakkhamānāni
tika-s0404t0:429_7: tīṇi arūpajjhānāni sandhāya “okāsādhigamo”ti vuttaṃ. Tesaṃyeva ca gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ sayameva vakkhati.
tika-s0404t0:430_0: Sattānaṃ visuddhiṃ pāpanatthāyāti rāgādīhi malehi abhijjhāvisamalobhādīhi ca upakkilesehi
tika-s0404t0:430_1: kiliṭṭhacittānaṃ sattānaṃ visuddhipāpanatthāya samatikkamanatthāya. Āyatiṃ anuppajjanañhi
tika-s0404t0:430_2: idha “samatikkamo”ti vuttaṃ. Atthaṃ gamanatthāyāti kāyikadukkhassa ca cetasikadomanassassa
tika-s0404t0:430_3: cāti imesaṃ dvinnaṃ atthaṅgamāya, nirodhāyāti attho. Ñāyati nicchayena kamati nibbānaṃ,
tika-s0404t0:430_4: taṃ vā ñāyati paṭivijjhīyati etenāti ñāyo, samucchedabhāvo ariyamaggoti āha “sahavipassanakassa
tika-s0404t0:430_5: maggassā”ti. Paccakkhakaraṇatthāyāti attapaccakkhatāya. Parapaccayena vinā paccakkhakaraṇañhi
tika-s0404t0:431_0: Rāgānugato samādhi abhinato nāma hoti ārammaṇe abhimukhābhāvena pavattiyā, dosānugato
tika-s0404t0:431_1: pana apanato apagamanavasena pavattiyā, tadubhayappaṭikkhepena “na cābhinato na cāpanato”ti
tika-s0404t0:431_3: viya na sasaṅkhārena sappayogena tadaṅgappahānavikkhambhanappahānavasena ca niggahetvā
tika-s0404t0:431_4: vāretvā ṭhito. Kiñcarahi kilesānaṃ chinnante uppanno. Tathābhūtaṃ phalasamādhiṃ sandhāyetaṃ
tika-s0404t0:434_0: 38. Sattame lokāyatavādakāti āyatiṃ hitaṃ loko na yatati na viruhati etenāti lokāyataṃ,
tika-s0404t0:434_1: vitaṇḍasatthaṃ. Tañhi ganthaṃ nissāya sattā puññakiriyāya cittampi na uppādenti,
tika-s0404t0:435_0: Daḷhaṃ thiraṃ dhanu etassāti daḷhadhanvā, so eva “daḷhadhammā”ti vutto. Paṭisattuvidhamanatthaṃ
tika-s0404t0:435_1: dhanuṃ gaṇhātīti dhanuggaho. So eva usuṃ saraṃ asati khipatīti issāso. Dvisahassathāmanti
tika-s0404t0:435_2: lohādibhāraṃ vahituṃ samatthaṃ dvisahassathāmaṃ. Tenāha “dvisahassathāmaṃ nāmā”tiādi.
tika-s0404t0:435_3: Daṇḍeti dhanudaṇḍe. Yāva kaṇḍappamāṇāti dīghato yattakaṃ kaṇḍassa pamāṇaṃ, tattake
tika-s0404t0:435_4: dhanudaṇḍe ukkhittamatte āropitesuyeva jiyādaṇḍesu so ce bhāro pathavito muccati,
tika-s0404t0:435_5: evaṃ idaṃ dvisahassathāmaṃ nāma dhanūti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Uggahitasippoti uggahitadhanusippo.
tika-s0404t0:435_6: Katahatthoti thirataraṃ lakkhesu avirajjhanasarakkhepo. Īdiso pana tattha vasibhūto
tika-s0404t0:435_7: katahattho nāma hotīti āha “ciṇṇavasibhāvo”ti. Kataṃ rājakulādīsu upecca asanaṃ etena
tika-s0404t0:435_8: so katūpāsanoti āha “rājakulādīsu dassitasippo”ti. Evaṃ katanti evaṃ antosusirakaraṇādinā sallahukaṃ kataṃ.
tika-s0404t0:438_0: 39-40. Aṭṭhame abhiyiṃsūti kadā abhiyiṃsu? Yadā balavanto ahesuṃ, tadā. Tatrāyamanupubbikathā
tika-s0404t0:438_1: – sakko kira magadharaṭṭhe macalagāmake magho nāma māṇavo hutvā tettiṃsa purise gahetvā
tika-s0404t0:438_2: kalyāṇakammaṃ karonto satta vatapadāni pūretvā tattha kālaṅkato devaloke nibbatti.
tika-s0404t0:438_3: Taṃ balavakammānubhāvena saparisaṃ sesadevatā dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhantaṃ disvā
tika-s0404t0:438_4: “āgantukadevaputtā āgatā”ti nevāsikā gandhapānaṃ sajjayiṃsu. Sakko sakaparisāya saññaṃ
tika-s0404t0:438_5: adāsi “mārisā mā gandhapānaṃ pivittha, pivanākāramattameva dassethā”ti. Te tathā
tika-s0404t0:438_6: akaṃsu. Nevāsikadevatā suvaṇṇasarakehi upanītaṃ gandhapānaṃ yāvadatthaṃ pivitvā mattā
tika-s0404t0:438_7: tattha tattha suvaṇṇapathaviyaṃ patitvā sayiṃsu. Sakko “gaṇhatha puttahatāya putte”ti
tika-s0404t0:438_8: te pādesu gahetvā sinerupāde khipāpesi. Sakkassa puññatejena tadanuvattakāpi sabbe
tika-s0404t0:438_9: tattheva patiṃsu. Te sineruvemajjhakāle saññaṃ labhitvā, “tātā, suraṃ na pivimha,
tika-s0404t0:438_10: suraṃ na pivimhā”ti āhaṃsu. Tato paṭṭhāya asurā nāma jātā. Atha nesaṃ kammapaccayautusamuṭṭhānaṃ
tika-s0404t0:438_11: sinerussa heṭṭhimatale dasayojanasahassaṃ asurabhavanaṃ nibbatti. Sakko tesaṃ nivattitvā
tika-s0404t0:438_12: anāgamanatthāya ārakkhaṃ ṭhapesi. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ –
tika-s0404t0:443_0: Dve nagarāni hi yuddhena gahetuṃ asakkuṇeyyatāya ayujjhapurāni nāma jātāni devanagarañca
tika-s0404t0:443_1: asuranagarañca. Yadā hi asurā balavanto honti, atha devehi palāyitvā devanagaraṃ
tika-s0404t0:443_2: pavisitvā dvāre pidahite asurānaṃ satasahassampi kiñci kātuṃ na sakkoti. Yadā devā
tika-s0404t0:443_3: balavanto honti, athāsurehi palāyitvā asuranagarassa dvāre pidahite sakkānaṃ satasahassampi
tika-s0404t0:443_4: kiñci kātuṃ na sakkoti. Iti imāni dve nagarāni ayujjhapurāni nāma. Tesaṃ antarā etesu
tika-s0404t0:443_5: uragādīsu pañcasu ṭhānesu sakkena ārakkhā ṭhapitā. Tattha uragasaddena nāgā gahitā.
tika-s0404t0:443_6: Te hi udake balavanto honti, tasmā sinerussa paṭhamālinde etesaṃ ārakkhā. Karoṭisaddena
tika-s0404t0:443_7: supaṇṇā gahitā. Tesaṃ kira karoṭi nāma pānabhojanaṃ, tena taṃ nāmaṃ labhiṃsu, dutiyālinde
tika-s0404t0:443_8: tesaṃ ārakkhā. Payassahārisaddena kumbhaṇḍā gahitā, dānavarakkhasā kira te, tatiyālinde
tika-s0404t0:443_9: tesaṃ ārakkhā. Madanayutasaddena yakkhā gahitā. Visamacārino kira te yujjhasoṇḍā,
tika-s0404t0:443_10: catutthālinde tesaṃ ārakkhā. Caturo ca mahattāti cattāro mahārājāno vuttā, pañcamālinde
tika-s0404t0:443_11: tesaṃ ārakkhā, tasmā yadi asurā kupitāvilacittā devapuraṃ upayanti yujjhituṃ. Yaṃ
tika-s0404t0:443_12: girino paṭhamaṃ paribhaṇḍaṃ, taṃ uragā paṭibāhayanti. Evaṃ sesesu sesā.
tika-s0404t0:444_0: Te pana asurā āyuvaṇṇayasaissariyasampattīhi tāvatiṃsasadisāva, tasmā antarā attānaṃ
tika-s0404t0:444_1: ajānitvā pāṭaliyā pupphitāya “na idaṃ devanagaraṃ, tattha pāricchattako pupphati,
tika-s0404t0:444_2: idha pana cittapāṭalī, jarasakkenāmhākaṃ suraṃ pāyetvā vañcitā, devanagarañca no
tika-s0404t0:444_3: gahitaṃ, gacchāma, tena saddhiṃ yujjhissāmā”ti hatthiassarathe āruyha suvaṇṇarajatamaṇiphalakāni
tika-s0404t0:444_4: gahetvā yuddhasajjā hutvā asurabheriyo vādentā mahāsamudde udakaṃ dvidhā bhetvā uṭṭhahanti.
tika-s0404t0:444_5: Te deve vuṭṭhe vammikamakkhikā vammikaṃ viya sineruṃ āruhituṃ ārabhanti. Atha nesaṃ
tika-s0404t0:444_6: paṭhamaṃ nāgehi saddhiṃ yuddhaṃ hoti. Tasmiṃ kho pana yuddhe na kassaci chavi vā
tika-s0404t0:444_7: cammaṃ vā chijjati, na lohitaṃ uppajjati, kevalaṃ kumārakānaṃ dārumeṇḍakayuddhaṃ
tika-s0404t0:444_8: viya aññamaññasantāsanamattameva hoti. Koṭisatāpi koṭisahassāpi nāgā tehi saddhiṃ
tika-s0404t0:444_9: yujjhitvā te asurapuraṃyeva pavesetvā nivattanti. Yadā pana asurā balavanto honti,
tika-s0404t0:444_10: atha nāgā osakkitvā dutiye ālinde supaṇṇehi saddhiṃ ekatova hutvā yujjhanti. Esa
tika-s0404t0:444_11: nayo supaṇṇādīsupi. Yadā pana tāni pañcapi ṭhānāni asurā maddanti, tadā ekato sampiṇḍitānipi
tika-s0404t0:444_12: tāni pañca balāni osakkanti. Atha cattāro mahārājāno gantvā sakkassa taṃ pavattiṃ
tika-s0404t0:444_13: ārocenti. Sakko tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā diyaḍḍhayojanasatikaṃ vejayantarathaṃ āruyha
tika-s0404t0:444_14: sayaṃ vā nikkhamati, ekaṃ puttaṃ vā peseti. Yadā devā puna apaccāgamanāya asure jiniṃsu,
tika-s0404t0:444_15: tadā sakko asure palāpetvā pañcasu ṭhānesu ārakkhaṃ datvā vediyapāde vajirahatthā
tika-s0404t0:444_16: indapaṭimāyo ṭhapesi. Asurā kālena kālaṃ uṭṭhahitvā paṭimāyo disvā “sakko appamatto
tika-s0404t0:444_17: tiṭṭhatī”ti tatova nivattanti. Idha pana yadā asurānaṃ jayo ahosi, devānaṃ parājayo,
tika-s0404t0:444_18: taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ – “parājitā ca, bhikkhave, devā apayiṃsuyeva uttarenābhimukhā, abhiyiṃsu asurā”ti.
tika-s0404t0:445_0: Dakkhiṇābhimukhā hutvāti cakkavāḷapabbatābhimukhā hutvā. Asurā kira devehi parājitā
tika-s0404t0:445_2: vālikāpuline yattha paṇṇakuṭiyo māpetvā isayo vasanti, tattha gantvā isīnaṃ assamapadena
tika-s0404t0:445_3: gacchantā “sakko imehi saddhiṃ mantetvā amhe nāseti, gaṇhatha puttahatāya putte”ti
tika-s0404t0:445_4: kupitā assamapade pānīyaghaṭacaṅkamanapaṇṇasālādīni viddhaṃsenti. Isayo araññato
tika-s0404t0:445_5: phalāphalaṃ ādāya āgatā disvā puna dukkhena paṭipākatikaṃ karonti, tepi punappunaṃ
tika-s0404t0:445_6: tatheva parājitā gantvā vināsenti. Tena vuttaṃ – “parājitā ca kho, bhikkhave, asurā
tika-s0404t0:448: 41. Dasame pakkhandatīti pavisati. Pasīdatīti pasādaṃ abhiruciṃ āpajjati, patiṭṭhāti vimuccatīti attho. Kathāpābhatanti kathāya mūlaṃ. Mūlañhi “pābhata”nti vuccati. Yathāha –
tika-s0404t0:451: Tenevāha “kathāpābhatanti kathāmūla”nti. Vitakkaggahaṇeneva taṃsahacarito vicāropi gahito. Tenevettha bahuvacananiddeso katoti āha “vitakkesūti vitakkavicāresū”ti.
tika-s0404t0:456_0: 42-51. Pañcamassa paṭhame udāyīti tayo therā udāyī nāma kāḷudāyī, lāḷudāyī, mahāudāyīti,
tika-s0404t0:456_1: idha kāḷudāyī adhippetoti āha “udāyīti kāḷudāyitthero”ti. Sambādheti sampīḷitataṇhāsaṃkilesādinā
tika-s0404t0:456_2: sauppīḷanatāya paramasambādhe. Ativiya saṅkaraṭṭhānabhūto hi nīvaraṇasambādho adhippeto.
tika-s0404t0:456_3: Okāsoti jhānassetaṃ nāmaṃ. Nīvaraṇasambādhābhāvena hi jhānaṃ idha “okāso”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:456_4: Paṭilīnanisabhoti vā paṭilīno hutvā seṭṭho, paṭilīnānaṃ vā seṭṭhoti paṭilīnanisabho.
tika-s0404t0:456_5: Paṭilīnā nāma pahīnamānā vuccanti mānussayavasena uṇṇatābhāvato. Yathāha “kathañca,
tika-s0404t0:456_6: bhikkhave, bhikkhu paṭilīno hoti? Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno asmimāno pahīno hoti
tika-s0404t0:456_7: ucchinnamūlo tālāvatthukato anabhāvaṃgato āyatiṃ anuppādadhammo”ti. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānameva.
tika-s0404t0:464_1: avippaṭisārudayāni. Etena avippaṭisāro nāma sīlassa udayamattaṃ, saṃvaddhitassa rukkhassa
tika-s0404t0:464_2: chāyāpupphasadisaṃ, añño eva panānena nipphādetabbo samādhiādiguṇoti dasseti. “Yāva
tika-s0404t0:464_3: maggāmaggañāṇadassanavisuddhi, tāva taruṇavipassanā”ti hi vacanato upakkilesavimuttaudayabbayañāṇato
tika-s0404t0:464_4: paraṃ ayañca vipassanā virajjati yogāvacaro viratto puriso viya bhariyāya saṅkhārato etenāti virāgo.
tika-s0404t0:467_0: 2-5. Dutiye saṃsāramahoghassa paratīrabhāvato yo naṃ adhigacchati, taṃ pāreti gametīti
tika-s0404t0:467_1: pāraṃ, nibbānaṃ. Tabbidūratāya natthi ettha pāranti apāraṃ, saṃsāro. Tenāha “orimatīrabhūtā
tika-s0404t0:470_0: 6. Chaṭṭhe santaṃ santanti appetvā nisinnassātiādīsu santaṃ santaṃ paṇītaṃ paṇītantiādīni
tika-s0404t0:470_1: vadati. Iminā pana ākārena taṃ paṭivijjhitvā tattha cittaṃ upasaṃharato phalasamāpattisaṅkhāto
tika-s0404t0:470_2: cittuppādo tathā pavattatīti veditabbo. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānameva.
tika-s0404t0:475_0: 11-14. Dutiyassa paṭhame nātidūranti gocaraṭṭhānato aḍḍhagāvutato orabhāgatāya nātidūraṃ.
tika-s0404t0:475_1: Nāccāsannanti pacchimena pamāṇena gocaraṭṭhānato pañcadhanusatikatāya na atiāsannaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:475_3: gamanassa ca āgamanassa ca yuttarūpattā gamanāgamanasampannaṃ. Divasabhāge mahājanasaṃkiṇṇatābhāvena
tika-s0404t0:475_4: divā appākiṇṇaṃ. Abhāvattho hi ayaṃ appa-saddo “appiccho”tiādīsu viya. Rattiyaṃ manussasaddābhāvena
tika-s0404t0:476_0: Appakasirenāti akasirena sukheneva. Sīlādiguṇānaṃ thirabhāvappattiyā therā. Suttageyyādi
tika-s0404t0:476_1: bahu sutaṃ etesanti bahussutā. Tamuggahadhāraṇena sammadeva garūnaṃ santike āgamitabhāvena
tika-s0404t0:476_2: ca āgato pariyattidhammasaṅkhāto āgamo etesanti āgatāgamā. Suttābhidhammasaṅkhātassa
tika-s0404t0:476_3: dhammassa dhāraṇena dhammadharā. Vinayassa dhāraṇena vinayadharā. Tesaṃ dhammavinayānaṃ
tika-s0404t0:476_4: mātikāya dhāraṇena mātikādharā. Tattha tattha dhammaparipucchāya paripucchati. Atthaparipucchāya
tika-s0404t0:476_5: paripañhati vīmaṃsati vicāreti. Idaṃ, bhante, kathaṃ, imassa ko atthoti paripucchāparipañhākāradassanaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:476_6: Avivaṭañceva pāḷiyā atthaṃ padesantarapāḷidassanena āgamato vivaranti. Anuttānīkatañca
tika-s0404t0:476_7: yuttivibhāvanena uttāniṃ karonti. Kaṅkhāṭhāniyesu dhammesu saṃsayuppattiyā hetutāya
tika-s0404t0:476_8: gaṇṭhiṭṭhānabhūtesu pāḷippadesesu yāthāvato vinicchayappadānena kaṅkhaṃ paṭivinodenti.
tika-s0404t0:477_0: Ettha ca nātidūraṃ nāccāsannaṃ gamanāgamanasampannanti ekaṃ aṅgaṃ, divā appākiṇṇaṃ,
tika-s0404t0:477_2: ekaṃ, tasmiṃ kho pana senāsane viharantassa…pe… parikkhārāti ekaṃ, tasmiṃ kho pana
tika-s0404t0:477_3: senāsane therā…pe… kaṅkhaṃ paṭivinodentīti ekaṃ. Evaṃ pañca aṅgāni veditabbāni. Dutiyādīni uttānatthāni.
tika-s0404t0:480_0: 15-16. Pañcame kārāpakaappamādo nāma “ime akusalā dhammā pahātabbā, ime kusalā dhammā
tika-s0404t0:480_2: appamādo. Esāti appamādo. Lokiyova na lokuttaro. Ayañcāti ca esāti ca appamādameva
tika-s0404t0:481_0: Jaṅgalānanti jaṅgalacārīnaṃ. Jaṅgala-saddo cettha kharabhāvasāmaññena pathavīpariyāyo,
tika-s0404t0:481_3: pakkhepa”nti. “Upakkhepa”ntipi paṭhanti, upanetvā pakkhipitabbanti attho. Vassikāya
tika-s0404t0:481_4: pupphaṃ vassikaṃ yathā “āmalakiyā phalaṃ āmalaka”nti. Mahātalasminti uparipāsāde.
tika-s0404t0:484_0: 17-18. Sattame yehi sīlādīhi samannāgato bhikkhu dhammasaraṇatāya dhammeneva nāthati
tika-s0404t0:484_1: āsīsati abhibhavatīti nātho vuccati, te tassa nāthabhāvakarā dhammā nāthakaraṇāti
tika-s0404t0:484_2: vuttāti āha “attano sanāthabhāvakarā patiṭṭhakarāti attho”ti. Tattha attano patiṭṭhakarāti
tika-s0404t0:484_3: yassa nāthabhāvakarā, tassa attano patiṭṭhāvidhāyino. Appatiṭṭho anātho, sappatiṭṭho
tika-s0404t0:484_4: sanāthoti patiṭṭhattho nātha-saddo. Kalyāṇaguṇayogato kalyāṇāti dassento “sīlādiguṇasampannā”ti
tika-s0404t0:484_5: āha. Mijjanalakkhaṇā mettā etassa atthīti mitto. So vuttanayena kalyāṇo assa atthīti
tika-s0404t0:484_6: tassa atthitāmattaṃ kalyāṇamittapadena vuttaṃ. Assa tena sabbakālaṃ avijahitavāsoti
tika-s0404t0:484_7: taṃ dassetuṃ “kalyāṇasahāyo”ti vuttanti āha “tevassā”ti. Te eva kalyāṇamittā assa
tika-s0404t0:484_8: bhikkhuno. Saha ayanatoti saha pavattanato. Asamodhāne cittena, samodhāne pana cittena
tika-s0404t0:484_9: ceva kāyena ca sampavaṅko. Sukhaṃ vaco etasmiṃ anukūlagāhimhi ādaragāravavati puggaleti
tika-s0404t0:484_10: suvaco. Tenāha “sukhena vattabbo”tiādi. Khamoti khanto. Tamevassa khamabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ
tika-s0404t0:484_11: “gāḷhenā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Vāmatoti micchā, ayoniso vā gaṇhāti. Paṭippharatīti paṭāṇikabhāvena
tika-s0404t0:484_12: tiṭṭhati. Padakkhiṇaṃ gaṇhātīti sammā, yoniso vā gaṇhāti.
tika-s0404t0:485_0: Uccāvacānīti vipulakhuddakāni. Tatrupagamaniyāyāti tatra tatra mahante khuddake ca
tika-s0404t0:485_1: kamme sādhanavasena upāyena upagacchantiyā, tassa tassa kammassa nipphādane samatthāyāti
tika-s0404t0:485_2: attho. Tatrupāyāyāti vā tatra tatra kamme sādhetabbe upāyabhūtāya.
tika-s0404t0:486_0: Dhamme assa kāmoti dhammakāmoti byadhikaraṇānampi bāhirattho samāso hotīti katvā
tika-s0404t0:486_1: vuttaṃ. Kāmetabbato vā piyāyitabbato kāmo, dhammo. Dhammo kāmo assāti dhammakāmo.
tika-s0404t0:486_2: Dhammoti pariyattidhammo adhippetoti āha “tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ piyāyatīti attho”ti.
tika-s0404t0:486_3: Samudāharaṇaṃ kathanaṃ samudāhāro, piyo samudāhāro etassāti piyasamudāhāro. Sayañcāti
tika-s0404t0:486_4: ettha ca-saddena “sakkacca”nti padaṃ anukaḍḍhati. Tena sayañca sakkaccaṃ desetukāmo
tika-s0404t0:486_5: hotīti yojanā. Abhidhammo satta pakaraṇāni “adhiko abhivisiṭṭho ca pariyattidhammo”ti
tika-s0404t0:486_6: katvā. Vinayo ubhatovibhaṅgā vinayanato kāyavācānaṃ. Abhivinayo khandhakaparivārā
tika-s0404t0:486_8: Dhammo eva piṭakadvayassapi pariyattidhammabhāvato. Maggaphalāni abhidhammo “nibbānadhammassa
tika-s0404t0:486_9: abhimukho”ti katvā. Kilesavūpasamakaraṇaṃ pubbabhāgiyā tisso sikkhā saṅkhepato vivaṭṭanissito
tika-s0404t0:486_10: samatho vipassanā ca. Uḷārapāmojjoti balavapāmojjo. Kāraṇattheti nimittatthe. Kusaladhammanimittaṃ
tika-s0404t0:486_11: hissa vīriyārambho. Tenāha “tesaṃ adhigamatthāyā”ti. Kusalesu dhammesūti vā nipphādetabbe
tika-s0404t0:486_12: bhummaṃ yathā “cetaso avūpasame ayonisomanasikārapadaṭṭhāna”nti. Aṭṭhame natthi vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:489_0: 19. Navame ariyānaṃ eva āvāsāti ariyāvāsā anariyānaṃ tādisānaṃ asambhavato. Ariyāti
tika-s0404t0:489_1: cettha ukkaṭṭhaniddesena khīṇāsavā gahitā. Te ca yasmā tehi sabbakālaṃ avijahitavāsā
tika-s0404t0:489_2: eva, tasmā vuttaṃ “te āvasiṃsu āvasanti āvasissantī”ti. Tattha āvasiṃsūti nissāya
tika-s0404t0:489_3: āvasiṃsu. Pañcaṅgavippahīnatādayo hi ariyānaṃ apassayā. Tesu pañcaṅgavippahānapaccekasaccapanodanaesanāosaṭṭhāni,
tika-s0404t0:489_4: “saṅkhāyekaṃ paṭisevati, adhivāseti parivajjeti vinodetī”ti vuttesu apassenesu vinodanañca
tika-s0404t0:492_0: 20. Dasame kasmā pana bhagavā kurusu viharanto imaṃ suttaṃ abhāsīti āha “yasmā”tiādi.
tika-s0404t0:492_1: Kururaṭṭhaṃ kira tadā tannivāsisattānaṃ yonisomanasikāravantatādinā yebhuyyena suppaṭipannatāya
tika-s0404t0:492_2: pubbe ca katapuññatābalena vā tadā utuādisampattiyuttameva ahosi. Keci pana “pubbe
tika-s0404t0:492_4: hoti. Bhagavato kāle sātisayaṃ utusappāyādiyuttaṃ raṭṭhaṃ ahosī”ti vadanti. Tattha
tika-s0404t0:492_5: bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo upāsakā upāsikāyo utupaccayādisampannattā tassa raṭṭhassa sappāyautupaccayasevanena
tika-s0404t0:492_6: niccaṃ kallasarīrā kallacittā ca honti. Te cittasarīrakallatāya anuggahitapaññābalā
tika-s0404t0:493_0: Yuttappayuttāti satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāya yuttā ceva payuttā ca. Tasmiñhi janapade catasso
tika-s0404t0:493_1: parisā pakatiyāva satipaṭṭhānabhāvanānuyogamanuyuttā viharanti, antamaso dāsakammakaraparijanāpi
tika-s0404t0:493_3: niratthakakathā nāma nappavattati. Sace kāci itthī, “amma, tvaṃ kataraṃ satipaṭṭhānabhāvanaṃ
tika-s0404t0:493_4: manasi karosī”ti pucchitā “na kiñcī”ti vadati, taṃ garahanti “dhīratthu tava jīvitaṃ,
tika-s0404t0:493_5: jīvamānāpi tvaṃ matasadisā”ti. Atha naṃ “mā dāni puna evamakāsī”ti ovaditvā aññataraṃ
tika-s0404t0:493_6: satipaṭṭhānaṃ uggaṇhāpenti. Yā pana “ahaṃ asukaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ nāma manasi karomī”ti
tika-s0404t0:493_7: vadati, tassā “sādhu sādhū”ti sādhukāraṃ datvā “tava jīvitaṃ sujīvitaṃ, tvaṃ nāma
tika-s0404t0:493_8: manussattaṃ pattā, tavatthāya sammāsambuddho uppanno”tiādīhi pasaṃsanti. Na kevalañcettha
tika-s0404t0:493_9: manussajātikāyeva satipaṭṭhānamanasikārayuttā, te nissāya viharantā tiracchānagatāpi.
tika-s0404t0:494_0: Tatridaṃ vatthu – eko kira naṭako suvapotakaṃ gahetvā sikkhāpento vicarati. So bhikkhuniupassayaṃ
tika-s0404t0:494_1: upanissāya vasitvā gamanakāle suvapotakaṃ pamussitvā gato. Taṃ sāmaṇeriyo gahetvā
tika-s0404t0:494_2: paṭijaggiṃsu, “buddharakkhito”ti cassa nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Taṃ ekadivasaṃ purato nisinnaṃ
tika-s0404t0:494_3: disvā mahātherī āha “buddharakkhitā”ti. Kiṃ, ayyoti. Atthi te koci bhāvanāmanasikāroti?
tika-s0404t0:494_4: Natthayyeti. Āvuso, pabbajitānaṃ santike vasantena nāma vissaṭṭhaattabhāvena bhavituṃ
tika-s0404t0:494_5: na vaṭṭati, kocideva manasikāro icchitabbo, tvaṃ pana aññaṃ na sakkhissasi, “aṭṭhi
tika-s0404t0:494_6: aṭṭhī”ti sajjhāyaṃ karohīti. So theriyā ovāde ṭhatvā “aṭṭhi aṭṭhī”ti sajjhāyanto carati.
tika-s0404t0:495_0: Taṃ ekadivasaṃ pātova toraṇagge nisīditvā bālātapaṃ tapamānaṃ eko sakuṇo nakhapañjarena
tika-s0404t0:495_1: aggahesi. So “kiri kirī”ti saddamakāsi. Sāmaṇeriyo sutvā, “ayye, buddharakkhito sakuṇena
tika-s0404t0:495_2: gahito, mocema na”nti leḍḍuādīni gahetvā anubandhitvā mocesuṃ. Taṃ ānetvā purato
tika-s0404t0:495_3: ṭhapitaṃ therī āha, “buddharakkhita, sakuṇena gahitakāle kiṃ cintesī”ti. Ayye, na
tika-s0404t0:495_4: aññaṃ cintesiṃ, “aṭṭhipuñjova aṭṭhipuñjaṃ gahetvā gacchati, katarasmiṃ ṭhāne vippakirissatī”ti
tika-s0404t0:495_5: evaṃ, ayye, aṭṭhipuñjameva cintesinti. Sādhu sādhu, buddharakkhita, anāgate bhavakkhayassa
tika-s0404t0:495_6: te paccayo bhavissatīti. Evaṃ tattha tiracchānagatāpi satipaṭṭhānamanasikārayuttā.
tika-s0404t0:496: Dīghanikāyādīsu mahānidānādīnīti dīghanikāye mahānidānaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ majjhimanikāye satipaṭṭhānaṃ sāropamaṃ rukkhopamaṃ raṭṭhapālaṃ māgaṇḍiyaṃ āneñjasappāyanti evamādīni.
tika-s0404t0:497_0: Ñāṇādayoti ñāṇañceva taṃsampayuttadhammā ca. Tenāha “ñāṇanti vutte”tiādi. Ñāṇasampayuttacittāni
tika-s0404t0:497_1: labbhanti tehi vinā sampajānatāya asambhavato. Mahācittānīti aṭṭhapi mahākiriyacittāni
tika-s0404t0:497_3: Dasa cittānīti aṭṭha mahākiriyacittāni hasituppādavoṭṭhabbanacittehi saddhiṃ dasa
tika-s0404t0:497_4: cittāni labbhanti. Arajjanādussanavasena pavatti tesampi sādhāraṇāti. “Upekkhako
tika-s0404t0:497_5: viharatī”ti vacanato chaḷaṅgupekkhāvasena āgatānaṃ imesaṃ satatavihārānaṃ somanassaṃ
tika-s0404t0:497_6: kathaṃ labbhatīti āha “āsevanavasena labbhatī”ti. Kiñcāpi khīṇāsavo iṭṭhāniṭṭhepi
tika-s0404t0:497_7: ārammaṇe majjhatto viya bahulaṃ upekkhako viharati attano parisuddhapakatibhāvāvijahanato.
tika-s0404t0:497_8: Kadāci pana tathā cetobhisaṅkhārābhāve yaṃ taṃ sabhāvato iṭṭhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ, tattha
tika-s0404t0:497_9: yāthāvasabhāvaggahaṇavasenapi arahato cittaṃ somanassasahagataṃ hutvā pavattateva,
tika-s0404t0:497_10: tañca kho pubbāsevanavasena. Tena vuttaṃ “āsevanavasena labbhatī”ti. Ārakkhakiccaṃ
tika-s0404t0:497_11: sādheti sativepullappattattā. Caratotiādinā niccasamādānaṃ dasseti, taṃ vikkhepābhāvena daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:498_0: Pabbajjūpagatāti yaṃ kiñci pabbajjaṃ upagatā, na samitapāpā. Bhovādinoti jātimattabrāhmaṇe
tika-s0404t0:498_1: vadati. Pāṭekkasaccānīti tehi tehi diṭṭhigatikehi pāṭiyekkaṃ gahitāni “idameva sacca”nti
tika-s0404t0:498_2: abhiniviṭṭhāni diṭṭhisaccādīni. Tānipi hi “idameva sacca”nti gahaṇaṃ upādāya “saccānī”ti
tika-s0404t0:498_3: voharīyanti. Tenāha “idamevā”tiādi. Nīhaṭānīti attano santānato nīharitāni apanītāni.
tika-s0404t0:498_4: Gahitaggahaṇassāti ariyamaggādhigamato pubbe gahitassa diṭṭhiggāhassa. Vissaṭṭhabhāvavevacanānīti
tika-s0404t0:499_0: Natthi etāsaṃ vayo vekallanti avayāti āha “anūnā”ti, anavasesoti attho. Esanāti kāmesanādayo.
tika-s0404t0:499_1: Maggassa kiccanipphatti kathitā rāgādīnaṃ pahīnabhāvadīpanato. Paccavekkhaṇaphalaṃ
tika-s0404t0:499_2: kathitanti paccavekkhaṇamukhena ariyaphalaṃ kathitaṃ. Adhigate hi aggaphale sabbaso
tika-s0404t0:499_3: rāgādīnaṃ anuppādadhammataṃ pajānāti, tañca pajānanaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇanti.
tika-s0404t0:504_0: 21. Tatiyassa paṭhame visamaṭṭhānesūti papātādīsu visamaṭṭhānesu. “Aññehi asādhāraṇānī”ti
tika-s0404t0:504_1: kasmā vuttaṃ, nanu cetāni sāvakānampi ekaccānaṃ uppajjantīti? Kāmaṃ uppajjanti, yādisāni
tika-s0404t0:504_2: pana buddhānaṃ ṭhānāṭṭhānañāṇādīni, na tādisāni tadaññesaṃ kadācipi uppajjantīti
tika-s0404t0:504_3: aññehi asādhāraṇānīti. Tenāha “tathāgatasseva balānī”ti. Imameva hi yathāvuttalesaṃ
tika-s0404t0:504_4: apekkhitvā tadabhāvato āsayānusayañāṇādīsu eva asādhāraṇasamaññā niruḷhā. Kāmaṃ ñāṇabalānaṃ
tika-s0404t0:504_5: ñāṇasambhāro visesapaccayo, puññasambhāropi pana nesaṃ paccayo eva. Ñāṇasambhārassapi
tika-s0404t0:505_1: balena pākatikā hatthijāti. Dasannaṃ purisānanti thāmamajjhimānaṃ dasannaṃ purisānaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:505_2: Ekassa tathāgatassa kāyabalanti ānetvā sambandho. Ekassāti ca tathā heṭṭhā kathāyaṃ
tika-s0404t0:505_3: āgatattā desanāsotena vuttaṃ. Nārāyanasaṅghātabalanti ettha nārā vuccanti rasmiyo.
tika-s0404t0:505_4: Tā bahū nānāvidhā ito uppajjantīti nārāyanaṃ, vajiraṃ, tasmā nārāyanasaṅghātabalanti
tika-s0404t0:505_5: vajirasaṅghātabalanti attho. Ñāṇabalaṃ pana pāḷiyaṃ āgatameva, na kāyabalaṃ viya
tika-s0404t0:506_0: Saṃyuttake āgatāni tesattati ñāṇāni, sattasattati ñāṇānīti vuttaṃ, tattha pana nidānavagge
tika-s0404t0:506_1: sattasattati āgatāni catucattārīsañca. Tesattati pana paṭisambhidāmagge sutamayādīni
tika-s0404t0:506_2: āgatāni dissanti, na saṃyuttake. Aññānipīti etena ñāṇavatthuvibhaṅge ekakādivasena
tika-s0404t0:506_3: vuttāni, aññattha ca “pubbante ñāṇa”ntiādinā brahmajālādīsu ca “tayidaṃ tathāgato
tika-s0404t0:506_4: pajānāti ‘imāni diṭṭhiṭṭhānāni evaṃ gahitānī’ti”ādinā vuttāni anekāni ñāṇappabhedāni
tika-s0404t0:506_5: saṅgaṇhāti. Yāthāvappaṭivedhato sayañca akampiyaṃ puggalañca taṃsamaṅginaṃ neyyesu
tika-s0404t0:507_0: Usabhassa idanti āsabhaṃ, seṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ. Sabbaññutāpaṭijānanavasena abhimukhaṃ gacchanti,
tika-s0404t0:507_1: aṭṭha vā parisā upasaṅkamantīti āsabhā, pubbabuddhā. Idaṃ panāti buddhānaṃ ṭhānaṃ
tika-s0404t0:507_2: sabbaññutameva vadati. Tiṭṭhamānovāti avadantopi tiṭṭhamānova paṭijānāti nāmāti attho.
tika-s0404t0:508_0: Aṭṭhasu parisāsūti “abhijānāmi kho panāhaṃ, sāriputta, anekasataṃ khattiyaparisaṃ…pe…
tika-s0404t0:508_1: tatra vata maṃ bhayaṃ vā sārajjaṃ vā okkamissatīti nimittametaṃ, sāriputta, na samanupassāmī”ti
tika-s0404t0:508_2: vuttāsu aṭṭhasu parisāsu. Abhītanādaṃ nadatīti parato dassitañāṇayogena dasabalohanti abhītanādaṃ nadati.
tika-s0404t0:509_0: Paṭivedhaniṭṭhattā arahattamaggañāṇaṃ paṭivedhoti “phalakkhaṇe uppannaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:509_1: Tena paṭiladdhassapi desanāñāṇassa kiccanipphatti parassa avabujjhanamattena hotīti
tika-s0404t0:509_2: “aññāsikoṇḍaññassa sotāpattiphalakkhaṇe pavattaṃ nāmā”ti vuttaṃ. Tato paraṃ pana
tika-s0404t0:509_3: yāva parinibbānā desanāñāṇapavatti tasseva pavattitassa dhammacakkassa ṭhānanti veditabbaṃ
tika-s0404t0:510_0: Tiṭṭhatīti vuttaṃ, kiṃ bhūmiyaṃ puriso viya, noti āha “tadāyattavuttitāyā”ti. Ṭhānanti
tika-s0404t0:510_1: cettha attalābho dharamānatā ca, na gatinivattīti āha “uppajjati ceva pavattati cā”ti.
tika-s0404t0:510_2: Yattha panetaṃ dasabalañāṇaṃ vitthāritaṃ, taṃ dassento “abhidhamme panā”tiādimāha.
tika-s0404t0:511_0: Samādiyantīti samādānāni, tāni pana samādiyitvā katāni hontīti āha “samādiyitvā katāna”nti.
tika-s0404t0:511_1: Kammameva vā kammasamādānanti etena samādānasaddassa apubbatthābhāvaṃ dasseti muttagatasadde
tika-s0404t0:511_2: gatasaddassa viya. Gatīti nirayādigatiyo. Upadhīti attabhāvo. Kāloti kammassa vipaccanārahakālo.
tika-s0404t0:512_0: Agatigāmininti nibbānagāminiṃ. Vuttañhi “nibbānañcāhaṃ, sāriputta, pajānāmi nibbānagāminiñca
tika-s0404t0:512_1: paṭipada”nti. Bahūsupi manussesu ekameva pāṇaṃ ghātentesu kāmaṃ sabbesampi cetanā
tika-s0404t0:512_2: tassevekassa jīvitindriyārammaṇā, taṃ pana kammaṃ tesaṃ nānākāraṃ. Tesu hi eko ādarena
tika-s0404t0:512_3: chandajāto karoti, eko “ehi tvampi karohī”ti parehi nippīḷito karoti, eko samānacchando
tika-s0404t0:512_4: viya hutvā appaṭibāhamāno vicarati. Tesu eko teneva kammena niraye nibbattati, eko
tika-s0404t0:512_5: tiracchānayoniyaṃ, eko pettivisaye. Taṃ tathāgato āyūhanakkhaṇeyeva “iminā nīhārena
tika-s0404t0:512_6: āyūhitattā esa niraye nibbattissati, esa tiracchānayoniyaṃ, esa pettivisaye”ti jānāti.
tika-s0404t0:512_7: Niraye nibbattamānampi “esa mahāniraye nibbattissati, esa ussadaniraye”ti jānāti.
tika-s0404t0:512_8: Tiracchānayoniyaṃ nibbattamānampi “esa apādako bhavissati, esa dvipādako, esa catuppado,
tika-s0404t0:512_9: esa bahuppado”ti jānāti. Pettivisaye nibbattamānampi “esa nijjhāmataṇhiko bhavissati,
tika-s0404t0:512_10: esa khuppipāsiko, esa paradattūpajīvī”ti jānāti. Tesu ca kammesu “idaṃ kammaṃ paṭisandhiṃ
tika-s0404t0:512_11: ākaḍḍhissati, idaṃ aññena dinnāya paṭisandhiyā upadhivepakkaṃ bhavissatī”ti jānāti.
tika-s0404t0:513_0: Tathā sakalagāmavāsikesu ekato piṇḍapātaṃ dadamānesu kāmaṃ sabbesampi cetanā piṇḍapātārammaṇāva,
tika-s0404t0:513_1: taṃ pana kammaṃ tesaṃ nānākāraṃ. Tesu hi eko ādarena karotīti sabbaṃ purimasadisaṃ,
tika-s0404t0:513_2: tasmā tesu keci devaloke nibbattanti, keci manussaloke. Taṃ tathāgato āyūhanakkhaṇeyeva
tika-s0404t0:513_3: jānāti. “Iminā nīhārena āyūhitattā esa manussaloke nibbattissati, esa devaloke. Tatthāpi
tika-s0404t0:513_4: esa khattiyakule, esa brāhmaṇakule, esa vessakule, esa suddakule, esa paranimmitavasavattīsu,
tika-s0404t0:513_5: esa nimmānaratīsu, esa tusitesu, esa yāmesu, esa tāvatiṃsesu, esa cātumahārājikesu,
tika-s0404t0:514_0: Tathā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapentesuyeva “iminā nīhārena esa kiñci sallakkhetuṃ na sakkhissati,
tika-s0404t0:514_1: esa mahābhūtamattameva vavatthapessati, esa rūpapariggaheyeva ṭhassati, esa arūpapariggaheyeva,
tika-s0404t0:514_2: esa nāmarūpapariggaheyeva, esa paccayapariggaheyeva, esa lakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanāyameva,
tika-s0404t0:514_3: esa paṭhamaphaleyeva, esa dutiyaphaleyeva, esa tatiyaphaleyeva, esa arahattaṃ pāpuṇissatī”ti
tika-s0404t0:514_4: jānāti. Kasiṇaparikammaṃ karontesupi “imassa parikammamattameva bhavissati, esa nimittaṃ
tika-s0404t0:514_5: uppādessati, esa appanaṃ eva pāpuṇissati, esa jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā
tika-s0404t0:515_0: Kāmanato kāmetabbato kāmappaṭisaṃyuttato ca dhātu kāmadhātu. Ādi-saddena byāpādadhāturūpadhātuādīnaṃ
tika-s0404t0:515_2: nānādhātuṃ khandhalokaṃ āyatanalokaṃ dhātulokaṃ yathābhūtaṃ pajānātīti yojanā. “Ayaṃ
tika-s0404t0:515_3: rūpakkhandho nāma…pe… ayaṃ viññāṇakkhandho nāma. Tesupi ekavidhena rūpakkhandho,
tika-s0404t0:515_4: ekādasavidhena rūpakkhandho. Ekavidhena vedanākkhandho, bahuvidhena vedanākkhandho.
tika-s0404t0:515_5: Ekavidhena saññākkhandho…pe… saṅkhārakkhandho…pe… viññāṇakkhandho, bahuvidhena viññāṇakkhandho”ti
tika-s0404t0:515_6: evaṃ tāva khandhalokassa, “idaṃ cakkhāyatanaṃ nāma…pe… idaṃ dhammāyatanaṃ nāma. Tattha
tika-s0404t0:515_7: dasāyatanā kāmāvacarā, dve cātubhūmakā”tiādinā āyatanalokassa, “ayaṃ cakkhudhātu
tika-s0404t0:515_8: nāma…pe… ayaṃ manoviññāṇadhātu nāma. Tattha soḷasa dhātuyo kāmāvacarā, dve cātubhūmakā”tiādinā
tika-s0404t0:515_9: dhātulokassa anekasabhāvaṃ nānāsabhāvañca pajānāti. Na kevalaṃ upādinnasaṅkhāralokasseva,
tika-s0404t0:515_10: atha kho anupādinnakasaṅkhāralokassapi “imāya nāma dhātuyā ussannattā imassa rukkhassa
tika-s0404t0:515_11: khandho seto, imassa kāḷo, imassa maṭṭho, imassa sakaṇṭako, imassa bahalattaco, imassa
tika-s0404t0:515_12: tanuttaco, imassa pattaṃ vaṇṇasaṇṭhānādivasena evarūpaṃ, imassa pupphaṃ nīlaṃ pītaṃ
tika-s0404t0:515_13: lohitaṃ odātaṃ sugandhaṃ duggandhaṃ, imassa phalaṃ khuddakaṃ mahantaṃ dīghaṃ vaṭṭaṃ
tika-s0404t0:515_14: susaṇṭhānaṃ dussaṇṭhānaṃ maṭṭhaṃ pharusaṃ sugandhaṃ duggandhaṃ madhuraṃ tittakaṃ
tika-s0404t0:515_15: kaṭukaṃ ambilaṃ kasāvaṃ, imassa kaṇṭako tikhiṇo kuṇṭho ujuko kuṭilo tambo kāḷo odāto
tika-s0404t0:515_16: hotī”tiādinā pajānāti. Sabbaññubuddhānaṃ eva hi etaṃ balaṃ, na aññesaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:516_0: Nānādhimuttikatanti nānajjhāsayataṃ. Adhimutti nāma ajjhāsayadhātu ajjhāsayasabhāvo.
tika-s0404t0:516_1: So pana hīnapaṇītatāsāmaññena pāḷiyaṃ dvidhāva vuttopi hīnapaṇītādibhedena anekavidhoti
tika-s0404t0:516_2: āha “hīnādīhi adhimuttīhi nānādhimuttikabhāva”nti. Tattha ye ye sattā yaṃyaṃadhimuttikā,
tika-s0404t0:516_3: te te taṃtadadhimuttike eva sevanti bhajanti payirupāsanti dhātusabhāgato. Yathā
tika-s0404t0:516_4: gūthādīnaṃ dhātūnaṃ sabhāvo eso, yaṃ gūthādīhi eva saṃsandanti samenti, evaṃ hīnajjhāsayā
tika-s0404t0:516_5: dussīlādīheva saṃsandanti samenti, sampannasīlādayo ca sampannasīlādīheva. Taṃ nesaṃ
tika-s0404t0:517_0: Vuddhiṃ hāniñcāti paccayavisesena sāmatthiyato adhikataṃ anadhikatañca. Indriyaparopariyattañāṇaniddese
tika-s0404t0:517_1: “āsayaṃ jānāti, anusayaṃ jānātī”ti āsayādijānanaṃ kasmā niddiṭṭhanti? Āsayajānanādinā
tika-s0404t0:517_2: yehi indriyehi paroparehi sattā kalyāṇapāpāsayādikā honti, tesaṃ jānanassa vibhāvanato.
tika-s0404t0:517_4: visuṃ balavatā ca siddhā hoti. Tattha āsayanti yattha sattā nivasanti, taṃ tesaṃ
tika-s0404t0:517_5: nivāsaṭṭhānaṃ, diṭṭhigataṃ vā yathābhūtañāṇaṃ vā āsayo, anusayo appahīnabhāvena thāmagato
tika-s0404t0:517_6: kileso. Taṃ pana bhagavā sattānaṃ āsayaṃ jānanto tesaṃ tesaṃ diṭṭhigatānaṃ vipassanāmaggañāṇānañca
tika-s0404t0:518_0: “Kāmaṃ sevantaṃyeva bhagavā jānāti – ‘ayaṃ puggalo kāmagaruko kāmāsayo kāmādhimutto’ti.
tika-s0404t0:518_1: Kāmaṃ sevantaṃyeva jānāti – ‘ayaṃ puggalo nekkhammagaruko nekkhammāsayo nekkhammādhimutto’ti.
tika-s0404t0:518_2: Nekkhammaṃ sevantaṃyeva jānāti. Byāpādaṃ, abyāpādaṃ, thinamiddhaṃ, ālokasaññaṃ sevantaṃyeva
tika-s0404t0:519_0: Paṭhamādīnaṃ catunnaṃ jhānānanti rūpāvacarānaṃ paṭhamādīnaṃ paccanīkajjhāpanaṭṭhena
tika-s0404t0:519_1: ārammaṇūpanijjhāpanaṭṭhena ca jhānānaṃ. Catukkanayena hetaṃ vuttaṃ. Aṭṭhannaṃ vimokkhānanti
tika-s0404t0:519_2: ettha paṭipāṭiyā satta appitappitakkhaṇe paccanīkadhammehi vimuccanato ārammaṇe ca
tika-s0404t0:519_3: adhimuccanato vimokkhā nāma. Aṭṭhamo pana sabbaso saññāvedayitehi vimuttattā apagamavimokkho
tika-s0404t0:519_4: nāma. Catukkanayapañcakanayesu paṭhamajjhānasamādhi savitakkasavicāro nāma. Pañcakanaye
tika-s0404t0:519_5: dutiyajjhānasamādhi avitakkavicāramatto. Nayadvayepi upari tīsu jhānesu samādhi avitakkaavicāro.
tika-s0404t0:519_6: Samāpattīsu paṭipāṭiyā aṭṭhannaṃ samādhītipi nāmaṃ, samāpattītipi cittekaggatāsabbhāvato,
tika-s0404t0:519_7: nirodhasamāpattiyā tadabhāvato na samādhīti nāmaṃ. Hānabhāgiyadhammanti appaguṇehi
tika-s0404t0:519_11: dhammāti dassitāni. Tehi pana jhānānaṃ taṃsabhāvatā ca dhammasaddena vuttā. Tasmāti
tika-s0404t0:519_12: vuttamevatthaṃ hetubhāvena paccāmasati. Vodānanti paguṇatāsaṅkhātaṃ vodānaṃ. Tañhi
tika-s0404t0:519_14: vuttaṃ. Keci pana “nirodhato phalasamāpattiyā vuṭṭhānanti pāḷi natthī”ti vadanti.
tika-s0404t0:519_16: paccayo”ti imāya pāḷiyā paṭisedhetabbā. Yo samāpattilābhī samāno eva “na lābhīmhī”ti,
tika-s0404t0:519_17: kammaṭṭhānaṃ samānaṃ eva “na kammaṭṭhāna”nti saññī hoti, so sampattiṃyeva samānaṃ
tika-s0404t0:520_0: Na tathā daṭṭhabbanti yathā paravādinā vuttaṃ, tathā na daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sakasakakiccameva
tika-s0404t0:520_1: jānātīti ṭhānāṭṭhānajānanādisakasakameva kiccaṃ kātuṃ jānāti, yathāsakameva visayaṃ
tika-s0404t0:520_2: paṭivijjhatīti attho. Tampīti tehi dasabalañāṇehi jānitabbampi. Kammavipākantaramevāti
tika-s0404t0:520_5: dhātunānattakāraṇanti ekadesasarūpekaseso daṭṭhabbo. Tañhi ñāṇaṃ tadubhayampi jānāti.
tika-s0404t0:520_6: “Imāya nāma dhātuyā ussannattā”tiādinā tathā ceva saṃvaṇṇitaṃ. Saccaparicchedamevāti
tika-s0404t0:520_7: pariññābhisamayādivasena saccānaṃ paricchinnameva. Appetuṃ na sakkoti aṭṭhamanavamabalāni
tika-s0404t0:520_8: viya taṃsadisaṃ, iddhividhañāṇamiva vikubbituṃ. Etenassa balasadisatañca nivāreti.
tika-s0404t0:520_9: Jhānādiñāṇaṃ viya vā appetuṃ vikubbituñca. Yadipi hi jhānādipaccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ sattamabalanti
tika-s0404t0:520_10: tassa savitakkasavicāratā vuttā, tathāpi jhānādīhi vinā paccavekkhaṇā natthīti jhānādisahagataṃ
tika-s0404t0:520_11: ñāṇaṃ tadantogadhaṃ katvā evaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Atha vā sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ jhānādikiccaṃ
tika-s0404t0:520_12: viya na sabbaṃ balakiccaṃ kātuṃ sakkotīti dassetuṃ “jhānaṃ hutvā appetuṃ, iddhi hutvā
tika-s0404t0:520_13: vikubbituñca na sakkotī”ti vuttaṃ, na pana kassaci balassa jhānaiddhibhāvatoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:521: Evaṃ kiccavisesavasenapi dasabalañāṇasabbaññutaññāṇavisesaṃ dassetvā idāni vitakkattikabhūmantaravasenapi taṃ dassetuṃ “apicā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Paṭipāṭiyātiādito paṭṭhāya paṭipāṭiyā.
tika-s0404t0:522_0: Anupadavaṇṇanaṃ ñatvā veditabbānīti sambandho. Kilesāvaraṇaṃ niyatamicchādiṭṭhi.
tika-s0404t0:522_1: Kilesāvaraṇassa abhāvo āsavakkhayañāṇādhigamassa ṭhānaṃ, tabbhāvo aṭṭhānaṃ. Anadhigamassa
tika-s0404t0:522_2: pana tadubhayampi yathākkamaṃ aṭṭhānaṃ ṭhānañcāti tattha kāraṇaṃ dassento “lokiya…pe…
tika-s0404t0:522_3: dassanato cā”ti āha. Tattha lokiyasammādiṭṭhiyā ṭhiti āsavakkhayādhigamassa ṭhānaṃ
tika-s0404t0:522_4: kilesāvaraṇābhāvassa kāraṇattā. Sā hi tasmiṃ sati na hoti, asati ca hoti. Etena tassā
tika-s0404t0:522_5: aṭṭhitiyā tassa aṭṭhānatā vuttā eva. Nesaṃ veneyyasattānaṃ. Dhātuvemattadassanatoti
tika-s0404t0:522_6: kāmadhātuādīnaṃ pavattibhedadassanato, yadaggena dhātuvemattaṃ jānāti, tadaggena
tika-s0404t0:522_8: Sabbāpi hi cariyā dhammadhātupariyāpannā evāti. Payogaṃ anādiyitvāpi santatimahāmattādīnaṃ
tika-s0404t0:522_9: viya. Dibbacakkhānubhāvato pattabbenāti ettha dibbacakkhunā parassa hadayavatthusannissayalohitavaṇṇadassanamukhena
tika-s0404t0:522_10: tadā pavattamānacittajānanatthaṃ parikammakaraṇaṃ nāma sāvakānaṃ, tañca kho ādikammikānaṃ,
tika-s0404t0:522_11: yato dibbacakkhuānubhāvato cetopariyañāṇassa pattabbatā siyā. Buddhānaṃ pana yadipi
tika-s0404t0:522_13: natthi vijjāttayasiddhiyā sijjhanato. Sesābhiññāttaye cetopariyañāṇaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇādhigamena
tika-s0404t0:522_14: pattanti ca vattabbataṃ labhatīti tathā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:525_0: 22-24. Dutiye adhivacanapadānanti paññattipadānaṃ. Dāsādīsu sirivaḍḍhakādisaddā viya
tika-s0404t0:525_1: vacanamattameva adhikāraṃ katvā pavattiyā adhivacanaṃ paññatti. Atha vā adhisaddo
tika-s0404t0:525_2: uparibhāge. Vuccatīti vacanaṃ, upari vacanaṃ adhivacanaṃ, upādābhūtarūpādīnaṃ upari
tika-s0404t0:525_3: paññapiyamānā upādāpaññattīti attho, tasmā paññattidīpakapadānīti attho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0404t0:525_4: Tassa padāni padaṭṭhānāni adhivacanapadāni. Tenāha “tesaṃ ye”tiādi. Tesanti adhivacanānaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:525_5: Yeti khandhādayo. Adhivuttitāya adhivuttiyoti diṭṭhiyo vuccanti. Adhikañhi sabhāvadhammesu
tika-s0404t0:525_6: sassatādiṃ, pakatiādiṃ, drabyādiṃ, jīvādiṃ, kāyādiñca, abhūtaṃ atthaṃ ajjhāropetvā
tika-s0404t0:525_7: diṭṭhiyo pavattantīti. Tenāha “atha vā”tiādi. Tatiyacatutthāni suviññeyyāni.
tika-s0404t0:528_0: 25. Pañcame sakalaṭṭhenāti nissesaṭṭhena. Anavasesapharaṇavasena cettha sakalaṭṭho
tika-s0404t0:528_1: veditabbo, asubhanimittādīsu viya ekadese aṭṭhatvā anavasesato gahetabbaṭṭhenāti
tika-s0404t0:528_2: attho. Tadārammaṇānaṃ dhammānanti taṃ kasiṇaṃ ārabbha pavattanakadhammānaṃ. Khettaṭṭhenāti
tika-s0404t0:528_3: uppattiṭṭhānaṭṭhena. Adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhenāti pavattiṭṭhānabhāvena. Yathā khettaṃ sassānaṃ
tika-s0404t0:528_4: uppattiṭṭhānaṃ vaḍḍhanaṭṭhānañca, evameva taṃ ta jhānaṃ sampayuttadhammānanti. Yogino
tika-s0404t0:528_5: vā sukhavisesānaṃ kāraṇabhāvena. Paricchinditvāti idaṃ “uddhaṃ adho tiriya”nti etthāpi
tika-s0404t0:528_6: yojetabbaṃ. Paricchinditvā eva hi sabbattha kasiṇaṃ vaḍḍhetabbaṃ. Tena tena vā kāraṇenāti
tika-s0404t0:528_7: tena tena upariādīsu kasiṇavaḍḍhanakāraṇena. Yathā kinti āha “ālokamiva rūpadassanakāmo”ti.
tika-s0404t0:528_8: Yathā dibbacakkhunā uddhaṃ ce rūpaṃ daṭṭhukāmo, uddhaṃ ālokaṃ pasāreti. Adho ce,
tika-s0404t0:528_9: adho. Samantato ce rūpaṃ daṭṭhukāmo, samantato ālokaṃ pasāreti, evaṃ sabbakasiṇanti
tika-s0404t0:528_10: attho. Ekassāti pathavīkasiṇādīsu ekekassa. Aññabhāvānupagamanatthanti aññakasiṇabhāvānupagamanadīpanatthaṃ,
tika-s0404t0:528_11: aññassa vā kasiṇabhāvānupagamanadīpanatthaṃ. Na hi aññena pasāritakasiṇaṃ tato aññena
tika-s0404t0:528_12: pasāritakasiṇabhāvaṃ upagacchati, evampi nesaṃ aññakasiṇasambhedābhāvo veditabbo.
tika-s0404t0:528_13: Na aññaṃ pathavīādi. Na hi udakena ṭhitaṭṭhāne sasambhārapathavī atthi. Aññakasiṇasambhedoti
tika-s0404t0:529_0: Ekadese aṭṭhatvā anavasesapharaṇaṃ pamāṇassa aggahaṇato appamāṇaṃ. Teneva hi nesaṃ
tika-s0404t0:529_1: kasiṇasamaññā. Tathā cāha “tañhī”tiādi. Tattha cetasā pharantoti bhāvanācittena ārammaṇaṃ
tika-s0404t0:529_2: karonto. Bhāvanācittañhi kasiṇaṃ parittaṃ vā vipulaṃ vā sakalameva manasi karoti,
tika-s0404t0:529_3: na ekadesaṃ. Kasiṇugghāṭimākāse pavattaviññāṇaṃ pharaṇaappamāṇavasena viññāṇakasiṇanti
tika-s0404t0:529_4: vuttaṃ. Tathā hi taṃ viññāṇanti vuccati. Kasiṇavasenāti ugghāṭitakasiṇavasena kasiṇugghāṭimākāse
tika-s0404t0:529_5: uddhaṃadhotiriyatā veditabbā. Yattakañhi ṭhānaṃ kasiṇaṃ pasāritaṃ, tattakaṃ ākāsabhāvanāvasena
tika-s0404t0:529_6: ākāsaṃ hotīti. Evaṃ yattakaṃ ṭhānaṃ ākāsaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhitaṃ, tattakaṃ sakalameva
tika-s0404t0:529_7: pharitvā viññāṇassa pavattanato āgamanavasena viññāṇakasiṇepi uddhaṃadhotiriyatā
tika-s0404t0:529_8: vuttāti āha “kasiṇugghāṭimākāsavasena tattha pavattaviññāṇe uddhaṃadhotiriyatā veditabbā”ti.
tika-s0404t0:532_0: 26. Chaṭṭhe atthassa pattinti ekantato hitānuppattiṃ. Hadayassa santinti paramacittūpasamaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:532_1: Kilesasenanti kāmaguṇasaṅkhātaṃ paṭhamaṃ kilesasenaṃ. Sā hi kilesasenā accharāsaṅghātasabhāvāpi
tika-s0404t0:532_3: kiccavasena. Ahaṃ ekova jhāyantoti ahaṃ gaṇasaṅgaṇikāya kilesasaṅgaṇikāya ca abhāvato
tika-s0404t0:532_4: eko asahāyo lakkhaṇūpanijjhānena jhāyanto. Anubujjhinti anukkamena maggapaṭipāṭiyā
tika-s0404t0:532_5: bujjhiṃ paṭivijjhiṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – piyarūpaṃ sātarūpaṃ senaṃ jinitvā ahaṃ ekova
tika-s0404t0:532_6: jhāyanto “atthassa pattiṃ hadayassa santi”nti saṅkhaṃ gataṃ arahattasukhaṃ paṭivijjhiṃ,
tika-s0404t0:532_7: tasmā janena mittasanthavaṃ na karomi, teneva ca me kāraṇena kenaci saddhiṃ sakkhī
tika-s0404t0:532_8: na sampajjatīti. Atthābhinibbattesunti itisaddalopenāyaṃ niddesoti āha “atthoti gahetvā”ti.
tika-s0404t0:535_0: 27. Sattame vuccethāti vucceyya. Dutiyapadepīti “anusāsaniyā vā anusāsani”nti evaṃ
tika-s0404t0:535_1: dutiyavākyepi. Te kira bhikkhū. Na ceva sampāyissantīti na ceva sammadeva pakārehi
tika-s0404t0:535_2: gahessanti ñāpessanti. Tenāha “sampādetvā kathetuṃ na sakkhissantī”ti. Yasmā avisaye
tika-s0404t0:535_3: pañhaṃ pucchitā honti, tasmā vighātaṃ āpajjissantīti yojanā. Aññathā ārādhanaṃ nāma
tika-s0404t0:535_4: natthīti iminā sapaccayanāmarūpānaṃ yāthāvato avabodho eva ito bāhirakānaṃ natthi,
tika-s0404t0:535_5: kuto pavedanāti dasseti. Ārādhananti yāthāvapavedanena cittassa paritosanaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:536_0: Eko pañhoti eko pañhamaggo, ekaṃ pañhagavesananti attho. Eko uddesoti ekaṃ uddisanaṃ
tika-s0404t0:536_1: atthassa saṃkhittavacanaṃ. Veyyākaraṇanti niddisanaṃ atthassa vivaritvā kathanaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:536_3: nayena yathā ime saṅkhārā etarahi, evaṃ atīte anāgate ca aniccā saṅkhatā paṭiccasamuppannā
tika-s0404t0:537_0: Sabbe sattāti anavasesā sattā. Te pana bhavabhedato saṅkhepeneva bhinditvā dassento
tika-s0404t0:537_2: āha “āhārato ṭhiti etesanti āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti. Tiṭṭhati etenāti vā ṭhiti, āhāro ṭhiti
tika-s0404t0:537_3: etesanti āhāraṭṭhitikāti evaṃ vā ettha samāsaviggaho daṭṭhabbo. Āhāraṭṭhitikāti paccayaṭṭhitikā,
tika-s0404t0:537_4: paccayāyattavuttikāti attho. Paccayattho hettha āhārasaddo “ayamāhāro anuppannassa
tika-s0404t0:537_5: vā kāmacchandassa uppādāyā”tiādīsu viya. Evañhi “sabbe sattā”ti iminā asaññasattā
tika-s0404t0:537_6: pariggahitā honti. Sā panāyaṃ āhāraṭṭhitikatā nippariyāyato saṅkhāradhammo. Tenāhu
tika-s0404t0:537_7: aṭṭhakathācariyā “āhāraṭṭhitikāti āgataṭṭhāne saṅkhāraloko veditabbo”ti. Yadi evaṃ
tika-s0404t0:537_8: “sabbe sattā”ti idaṃ kathanti? Puggalādhiṭṭhānadesanāti nāyaṃ doso. Tenevāha – “ekadhamme,
tika-s0404t0:537_9: bhikkhave, bhikkhu sammā nibbindamāno sammā virajjamāno sammā vimuccamāno sammā pariyantadassāvī
tika-s0404t0:537_10: sammadatthaṃ abhisamecca diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro hoti. Katamasmiṃ ekadhamme?
tika-s0404t0:537_11: Sabbe sattā āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti. Yvāyaṃ puggalādhiṭṭhānāya kathāya sabbesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ
tika-s0404t0:537_12: paccayāyattavuttitāya āhārapariyāyena sāmaññato paccayadhammo vutto, ayaṃ āhāro nāma eko dhammo.
tika-s0404t0:538_0: Codako vuttampi atthaṃ yāthāvato appaṭivijjhamāno neyyatthaṃ suttapadaṃ nītatthato
tika-s0404t0:538_1: dahanto “sabbe sattā”ti vacanamatte ṭhatvā “nanu cā”tiādinā codeti. Ācariyo aviparītaṃ
tika-s0404t0:538_2: tattha yathādhippetamatthaṃ pavedento “na virujjhatī”ti vatvā “tesañhi jhānaṃ āhāro
tika-s0404t0:538_3: hotī”ti āha. Jhānanti ekavokārabhavāvahaṃ saññāya virajjanavasena pavattarūpāvacaracatutthajjhānaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:538_4: Pāḷiyaṃ pana “anāhārā”ti vacanaṃ asaññabhave catunnaṃ āhārānaṃ abhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ,
tika-s0404t0:538_5: na paccayāhārassa abhāvato. Evaṃ santepīti idaṃ sāsane yesu dhammesu visesato āhārasaddo
tika-s0404t0:538_6: niruḷho, “āhāraṭṭhitikā”ti ettha yadi teyeva gayhanti, abyāpitadosamāpanno. Atha
tika-s0404t0:538_7: sabbopi paccayadhammo āhāroti adhippeto, imāya āhārapāḷiyā virodho āpannoti dassetuṃ
tika-s0404t0:538_8: āraddhaṃ. “Na virujjhatī”ti yenādhippāyena vuttaṃ, taṃ vivaranto “etasmiñhi sutte”tiādimāha.
tika-s0404t0:538_9: Kabaḷīkārāhārādīnaṃ ojaṭṭhamakarūpāharaṇādi nippariyāyena āhārabhāvo. Yathā hi kabaḷīkārāhāro
tika-s0404t0:538_10: ojaṭṭhamakarūpāharaṇena rūpakāyaṃ upatthambhenti, evaṃ phassādayo vedanādiāharaṇena
tika-s0404t0:538_11: nāmakāyaṃ upatthambheti, tasmā satipi janakabhāve upatthambhakabhāvo ojādīsu sātisayo
tika-s0404t0:538_12: labbhamāno mukhyo āhāraṭṭhoti te eva nippariyāyena āhāralakkhaṇā dhammā vuttā.
tika-s0404t0:539_0: Idhāti imasmiṃ sutte pariyāyena paccayo āhāroti vutto, sabbo paccayadhammo attano
tika-s0404t0:539_1: phalaṃ āharatīti imaṃ pariyāyaṃ labhatīti. Tenāha “sabbadhammānañhī”tiādi. Tattha
tika-s0404t0:539_2: sabbadhammānanti sabbesaṃ saṅkhatadhammānaṃ. Idāni yathāvuttamatthaṃ suttena samatthetuṃ
tika-s0404t0:539_3: “tenevāhā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ayanti paccayāhāro. Nippariyāyāhāropi gahitova hotīti yāvatā
tika-s0404t0:539_4: sopi paccayabhāveneva janako upatthambhako ca hutvā taṃ taṃ phalaṃ āharatīti vattabbataṃ labhatīti.
tika-s0404t0:540_0: Tatthāti pariyāyāhāro, nippariyāyāhāroti dvīsu āhāresu asaññabhave yadipi nippariyāyāhāro
tika-s0404t0:540_1: na labbhati, pariyāyāhāro pana labbhateva. Idāni tamevatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ
tika-s0404t0:540_2: “anuppanne hi buddhe”tiādi vuttaṃ. Uppanne buddhe titthakaramatanissitānaṃ jhānabhāvanāya
tika-s0404t0:540_3: asijjhanato “anuppanne buddhe”ti vuttaṃ. Sāsanikā tādisaṃ jhānaṃ na nibbattentīti
tika-s0404t0:540_4: “titthāyatane pabbajitā”ti vuttaṃ. Titthiyā hi upapattivisese vimuttisaññino saññāvirāgāvirāgesu
tika-s0404t0:540_5: ādīnavānisaṃsadassinova hutvā asaññasamāpattiṃ nibbattetvā akkhaṇabhūmiyaṃ uppajjanti,
tika-s0404t0:540_6: na sāsanikā. Vāyokasiṇe parikkammaṃ katvāti vāyokasiṇe paṭhamādīni tīṇi jhānāni nibbattetvā
tika-s0404t0:540_7: tatiyajjhāne ciṇṇavasī hutvā tato vuṭṭhāya catutthajjhānādhigamāya parikammaṃ katvā.
tika-s0404t0:541_0: Kasmā panettha vāyokasiṇeyeva parikammaṃ vuttanti? Vuccate, yatheva hi rūpapaṭibhāgabhūtesu
tika-s0404t0:541_2: evaṃ aparibyattaviggahatāya arūpapaṭibhāgabhūte kasiṇavisese arūpavibhāvanena arūpavirāgabhāvanā
tika-s0404t0:541_3: saṅkhāto rūpasamāpattiviseso adhigamīyatīti. Ettha ca “saññā rogo, saññā gaṇḍo”tiādinā,
tika-s0404t0:541_4: “dhi cittaṃ, dhi vatetaṃ citta”ntiādinā ca nayena arūpappavattiyā ādīnavadassanena
tika-s0404t0:541_5: tadabhāve ca santapaṇītabhāvasanniṭṭhānena rūpasamāpattiyā abhisaṅkharaṇaṃ arūpavirāgabhāvanā.
tika-s0404t0:541_6: Rūpavirāgabhāvanā pana saddhiṃ upacārena arūpasamāpattiyo, tatthāpi visesena paṭhamāruppajjhānaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:541_7: Yadi evaṃ “paricchinnākāsakasiṇepī”ti vattabbaṃ, tassāpi arūpapaṭibhāgatā labbhatīti?
tika-s0404t0:541_8: Icchitamevetaṃ, kesañci avacanaṃ panettha pubbācariyehi aggahitabhāvena. Yathā hi
tika-s0404t0:541_10: ca visayavisese pātubhavati, evaṃ arūpavirāgabhāvanāpīti vuccamāne na koci virodho.
tika-s0404t0:541_11: Titthiyeheva pana tassā samāpattiyā paṭipajjitabbatāya tesañca visayapathe sūpanibandhanasseva
tika-s0404t0:541_12: tassa jhānassa paṭipattito diṭṭhivantehi pubbācariyehi catuttheyeva bhūtakasiṇe arūpavirāgabhāvanāparikammaṃ
tika-s0404t0:541_13: vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kiñca vaṇṇakasiṇesu viya purimabhūtakasiṇattayepi vaṇṇappaṭicchāyāva
tika-s0404t0:541_14: paṇṇatti ārammaṇaṃ jhānassa lokavohārānurodheneva pavattito. Evañca katvā visuddhimagge
tika-s0404t0:541_15: pathavīkasiṇassa ādāsacandamaṇḍalūpamavacanañca samatthitaṃ hoti, catutthaṃ pana
tika-s0404t0:541_16: bhūtakasiṇaṃ bhūtappaṭicchāyameva jhānassa gocarabhāvaṃ gacchatīti tassevaṃ arūpapaṭibhāgatā
tika-s0404t0:542_0: Dhīti jigucchanatthe nipāto, tasmā dhi cittanti cittaṃ jigucchāmi. Dhi vatetaṃ cittanti
tika-s0404t0:542_1: etaṃ mama cittaṃ jigucchitaṃ vata hotu. Vatāti sambhāvane. Tena jigucchanaṃ sambhāvento
tika-s0404t0:542_2: vadati. Nāmāti ca sambhāvane eva. Tena cittassa abhāvaṃ sambhāveti. Cittassa bhāvābhāvesu
tika-s0404t0:542_3: ādīnavānisaṃse dassetuṃ “cittañhī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Khantiṃ ruciṃ uppādetvāti cittassa
tika-s0404t0:542_4: abhāvo eva sādhu suṭṭhūti imaṃ diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiṃ tattha ca abhiruciṃ uppādetvā.
tika-s0404t0:542_5: Tathā bhāvitassa jhānassa ṭhitibhāgiyabhāvappattiyā aparihīnajjhānā. Titthāyatane
tika-s0404t0:542_6: pabbajitasseva tathā jhānabhāvanā hotīti āha “manussaloke”ti. Paṇihito ahosīti maraṇassa
tika-s0404t0:542_7: āsannakāle ṭhapito ahosi. Yadi ṭhānādinā ākārena nibbatteyya kammabalena, yāva bhedā
tika-s0404t0:542_8: tenevākārena tiṭṭheyyāti āha “tena iriyāpathenā”tiādi. Evarūpānampīti evaṃ acetanānampi.
tika-s0404t0:542_9: Pi-saddena pageva sacetanānanti dasseti. Kathaṃ pana acetanānaṃ nesaṃ paccayāhārassa
tika-s0404t0:542_10: upakappananti codanaṃ sandhāya tattha nidassanaṃ dassento “yathā”tiādimāha. Tena
tika-s0404t0:542_11: na kevalamāgamoyeva, ayamettha yuttīti dasseti. Tāva tiṭṭhantīti ukkaṃsato pañca
tika-s0404t0:543_0: Ye uṭṭhānavīriyena divasaṃ vītināmetvā tassa nissandaphalamattaṃ kiñcideva labhitvā
tika-s0404t0:543_1: jīvikaṃ kappenti, te uṭṭhānaphalūpajīvino. Ye pana attano puññaphalameva upajīvanti,
tika-s0404t0:543_2: te puññaphalūpajīvino. Nerayikānaṃ pana neva uṭṭhānavīriyavasena jīvikakappanaṃ,
tika-s0404t0:543_3: puññaphalassa pana lesopi natthīti vuttaṃ “ye pana nerayikā…pe… jīvīti vuttā”ti.
tika-s0404t0:543_4: Paṭisandhiviññāṇassa āharaṇena manosañcetanā āhāroti vuttā, na yassa kassaci phalassāti
tika-s0404t0:543_5: adhippāyena “kiṃ pañca āhārā atthī”ti codeti. Ācariyo nippariyāyāhāre adhippete “siyā
tika-s0404t0:543_6: tava codanā avasarā, sā pana ettha anavasarā”ti ca dassento “pañca, na pañcāti idaṃ
tika-s0404t0:543_7: na vattabba”nti vatvā pariyāyāhārasseva panettha adhippetabhāvaṃ dassento “nanu paccayo
tika-s0404t0:543_8: āhāro’ti vuttameta”nti āha. Tasmāti yassa kassaci paccayassa āhāroti icchitattā.
tika-s0404t0:544_1: vuttaṃ. Yadi evaṃ nerayikā sukhappaṭisaṃvedinopi hontīti? Noti dassetuṃ “kheḷo hī”tiādi
tika-s0404t0:544_2: vuttaṃ. Tayoti tayo arūpāhārā kabaḷīkārāhārassa abhāvato. Avasesānanti asaññasattehi
tika-s0404t0:544_3: avasesānaṃ kāmabhavādīsu nibbattasattānaṃ. Paccayāhāro hi sabbesaṃ sādhāraṇoti.
tika-s0404t0:547_0: 28-29. Aṭṭhame evaṃnāmaketi kajaṅgalāti evaṃ itthiliṅgavasena laddhanāmake majjhimappadesassa
tika-s0404t0:547_1: mariyādabhūte nagare. “Nigame”tipi vadanti, “niculavane”tipi vadanti. Niculaṃ nāma
tika-s0404t0:547_2: ekā rukkhajāti, “nīparukkho”tipi vadanti. Tena sañchanno mahāvanasaṇḍo, tattha viharatīti
tika-s0404t0:547_3: attho. Hetunā nayenāti ca heṭṭhā vuttameva. Nanu ca “eso ceva tassa attho”ti kasmā
tika-s0404t0:547_4: vuttaṃ. Bhagavatā hi cattārotiādipañhabyākaraṇā cattāro āhārā, pañcupādānakkhandhā,
tika-s0404t0:547_5: cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni, satta viññāṇaṭṭhitiyo, aṭṭha lokadhammā dassitā. Bhikkhuniyā
tika-s0404t0:547_6: pana cattāro satipaṭṭhānā, pañcindriyāni, cha nissāraṇīyā dhātuyo, satta bojjhaṅgā,
tika-s0404t0:547_7: ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggoti dassitadhammā aññoyevattho bhikkhuniyā dassitoti codanaṃ
tika-s0404t0:550_0: 30. Dasame uggantvā yujjhati etāyāti uyyodhikā, satthappahārehi yujjhitassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:550_1: Uggantvā yujjhanaṃ vā uyyodhiko, satthappahāro. Tenāha “yuddhato nivatto”ti. Upassutivasena
tika-s0404t0:550_2: yujjhitabbākāraṃ ñatvāti jetavane kira dattatthero dhanuggahatissattheroti dve mahallakattherā
tika-s0404t0:550_3: vihārapaccante paṇṇasālāya vasanti. Tesu dhanuggahatissatthero pacchimayāme pabujjhitvā
tika-s0404t0:550_4: uṭṭhāya nisinno dattattheraṃ āmantetvā “ayaṃ te mahodaro kosalo bhuttabhattameva
tika-s0404t0:550_5: pūtiṃ karoti, yuddhavicāraṇaṃ pana kiñci na jānāti, parājitotveva vadāpetī”ti vatvā
tika-s0404t0:550_6: tena “kiṃ pana kātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vutte – “bhante, yuddho nāma padumabyūho cakkabyūho
tika-s0404t0:550_7: sakaṭabyūhoti tayo byūhā honti, ajātasattuṃ gaṇhitukāmena asukasmiṃ nāma pabbatakucchismiṃ
tika-s0404t0:550_8: dvīsu pabbatabhittīsu manusse ṭhapetvā purato dubbalaṃ dassetvā pabbatantaraṃ paviṭṭhabhāvaṃ
tika-s0404t0:550_9: jānitvā paviṭṭhamaggaṃ rundhitvā purato ca pacchato ca ubhosu pabbatabhittīsu vaggitvā
tika-s0404t0:550_10: naditvā jālapakkhittamacchaṃ viya katvā sakkā gahetu”nti. Tasmiṃ khaṇe “bhikkhūnaṃ
tika-s0404t0:550_11: kathāsallāpaṃ suṇāthā”ti rañño pesitacarapurisā taṃ sutvā rañño ārocesuṃ. Taṃ sutvā
tika-s0404t0:550_12: rājā saṅgāmabheriṃ paharāpetvā gantvā sakaṭabyūhaṃ katvā ajātasattuṃ jīvaggāhaṃ gaṇhi.
tika-s0404t0:551_0: Doṇapākanti doṇataṇḍulānaṃ pakkabhattaṃ. Doṇanti catunāḷikānametamadhivacanaṃ. Manujassāti
tika-s0404t0:551_1: sattassa. Tanukassāti tanukā appikā assa puggalassa, bhuttapaccayā visabhāgavedanā
tika-s0404t0:551_2: na honti. Saṇikanti mandaṃ mudukaṃ, aparissayamevāti attho. Jīratīti paribhuttāhāro
tika-s0404t0:551_3: paccati. Āyu pālayanti nirogo avedano jīvitaṃ rakkhanto. Atha vā saṇikaṃ jīratīti
tika-s0404t0:551_4: so bhojane mattaññū puggalo parimitāhāratāya saṇikaṃ cirena jīrati jaraṃ pāpuṇāti jīvitaṃ pālayanto.
tika-s0404t0:552_0: Imaṃ ovādaṃ adāsīti ekasmiṃ kira samaye rājā taṇḍuladoṇassa odanaṃ tadupiyena sūpabyañjanena
tika-s0404t0:552_1: bhuñjati. So ekadivasaṃ bhuttapātarāso bhattasammadaṃ avinodetvā satthu santikaṃ
tika-s0404t0:552_2: gantvā kilantarūpo ito cito ca samparivattati, niddāya abhibhuyyamānopi lahukaṃ nipajjituṃ
tika-s0404t0:552_3: asakkonto ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Atha naṃ satthā āha “kiṃ, mahārāja, avissamitvāva āgatosī”ti.
tika-s0404t0:552_4: Āma, bhante, bhuttakālato paṭṭhāya me mahādukkhaṃ hotīti. Atha naṃ satthā, “mahārāja,
tika-s0404t0:557: Imāya gāthāya ovaditvā, “mahārāja, bhojanaṃ nāma mattāya bhuñjituṃ vaṭṭati, mattabhojino hi sukhaṃ hotī”ti uttaripi puna ovadanto “manujassa sadā satīmato”ti imaṃ gāthamāha.
tika-s0404t0:558_0: Rājā pana gāthaṃ uggaṇhituṃ nāsakkhi, samīpe ṭhitaṃ pana bhāgineyyaṃ sudassanaṃ nāma
tika-s0404t0:558_1: māṇavaṃ “imaṃ gāthaṃ uggaṇha tātā”ti āha. So taṃ gāthaṃ uggaṇhitvā “kiṃ karomi, bhante”ti
tika-s0404t0:558_2: satthāraṃ pucchi. Atha naṃ satthā āha, “māṇava, imaṃ gāthaṃ naṭo viya pattapattaṭṭhāne
tika-s0404t0:558_3: mā avaca, rañño pātarāsaṃ bhuñjanaṭṭhāne ṭhatvā paṭhamapiṇḍādīsupi avatvā avasāne
tika-s0404t0:558_4: piṇḍe gahite vadeyyāsi, rājā sutvā bhattapiṇḍaṃ chaḍḍessati. Atha rañño hatthesu
tika-s0404t0:558_5: dhotesu pātiṃ apanetvā sitthāni gaṇetvā tadupiyaṃ byañjanaṃ ñatvā punadivase tāvatake
tika-s0404t0:558_6: taṇḍule hāreyyāsi. Pātarāse ca vatvā sāyamāse mā vadeyyāsī”ti. So “sādhū”ti paṭissuṇitvā
tika-s0404t0:558_7: taṃ divasaṃ rañño pātarāsaṃ bhutvā gatattā sāyamāse bhagavato anusiṭṭhiniyāmena gāthaṃ
tika-s0404t0:558_8: abhāsi. Rājā dasabalassa vacanaṃ saritvā bhattapiṇḍaṃ pātiyaṃyeva chaḍḍesi. Rañño
tika-s0404t0:558_9: hatthesu dhotesu pātiṃ apanetvā sitthāni gaṇetvā punadivase tattake taṇḍule hariṃsu,
tika-s0404t0:558_10: sopi māṇavo divase divase tathāgatassa santikaṃ gacchati. Dasabalassa vissāsiko ahosi.
tika-s0404t0:558_11: Atha naṃ ekadivasaṃ pucchi “rājā kittakaṃ bhuñjatī”ti? So “nāḷikodana”nti āha. Vaṭṭissati
tika-s0404t0:558_12: ettāvatā purisabhāgo esa, ito paṭṭhāya gāthaṃ mā vadīti. Rājā tatheva saṇṭhāsi. Tena
tika-s0404t0:558_13: vuttaṃ “nāḷikodanaparamatāya saṇṭhāsī”ti. Rattaññutāya vaḍḍhitaṃ sīlaṃ assa atthīti
tika-s0404t0:558_14: vaḍḍhitasīlo. Apothujjanikehi sīlehīti catupārisuddhisīlehi sīlaṃ ariyaṃ suddhaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:558_15: Tena vuttaṃ “ariyasīlo”ti. Tadekaṃ anavajjaṭṭhena kusalaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “kusalasīlo”ti.
tika-s0404t0:563_0: 31. Catutthassa paṭhame atthavaseti vuddhivisese, sikkhāpadapaññattihetu adhigamanīye
tika-s0404t0:563_1: hitaviseseti attho. Atthoyeva vā atthavaso, dasa atthe dasa kāraṇānīti vuttaṃ hoti.
tika-s0404t0:563_2: Atha vā attho phalaṃ tadadhīnavuttitāya vaso etassāti atthavaso, hetūti evampettha
tika-s0404t0:563_3: attho daṭṭhabbo. “Ye mama sotabbaṃ saddahātabbaṃ maññissanti, tesaṃ taṃ assa dīgharattaṃ
tika-s0404t0:563_4: hitāya sukhāyā”ti vuttattā “yo ca tathāgatassa vacanaṃ sampaṭicchati, tassa taṃ dīgharattaṃ
tika-s0404t0:563_5: hitāya sukhāya saṃvattatī”ti vuttaṃ. Asampaṭicchane ādīnavanti bhaddālisutte viya
tika-s0404t0:563_6: asampaṭicchane ādīnavaṃ dassetvā. Sukhavihārābhāve sahajīvamānassa abhāvato sahajīvitāpi
tika-s0404t0:563_7: sukhavihārova vutto. Sukhavihāro nāma catunnaṃ iriyāpathavihārānaṃ phāsutā.
tika-s0404t0:564: Maṅkutanti nittejataṃ. Dhammenātiādīsu dhammoti bhūtaṃ vatthu. Vinayoti codanā ceva sāraṇā ca. Satthusāsananti ñattisampadā ceva anussāvanasampadā ca.
tika-s0404t0:565_0: Piyasīlānanti sikkhākāmānaṃ. Tesañhi sīlaṃ piyaṃ hoti. Tenevāha “sikkhāttayapāripūriyā
tika-s0404t0:565_1: ghaṭamānā”ti. Sandiddhamanāti saṃsayaṃ āpajjamanā. Ubbaḷhā hontīti pīḷitā honti.
tika-s0404t0:565_2: Saṅghakammānīti satipi uposathapavāraṇānaṃ saṅghakammabhāve gobalībaddañāyena uposathaṃ
tika-s0404t0:565_3: pavāraṇañca ṭhapetvā upasampadādisesasaṅghakammānaṃ gahaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ. Samaggānaṃ bhāvo sāmaggī.
tika-s0404t0:566: “Nāhaṃ, cunda, diṭṭhadhammikānaṃyeva āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya dhammaṃ desemī”ti ettha vivādamūlabhūtā kilesā āsavāti āgatā.
tika-s0404t0:569: Te mayhaṃ āsavā khīṇā, viddhastā vinaḷīkatā”ti. –
tika-s0404t0:570_0: Ettha tebhūmakaṃ kammaṃ avasesā ca akusalā dhammā. Idha pana parūpavādavippaṭisāravadhabandhādayo
tika-s0404t0:570_1: ceva apāyadukkhabhūtā ca nānappakārā upaddavā āsavāti āha “asaṃvare ṭhitena tasmiṃyeva
tika-s0404t0:570_2: attabhāve pattabbā”tiādi. Yadi hi bhagavā sikkhāpadaṃ na ca paññapeyya, tato asaddhammappaṭisevanaadinnādānapāṇātipātādihetu
tika-s0404t0:570_3: ye uppajjeyyuṃ parūpavādādayo diṭṭhadhammikā nānappakārā anatthā, ye ca tannimittameva
tika-s0404t0:570_5: anatthā, te sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ “diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya samparāyikānaṃ
tika-s0404t0:570_6: āsavānaṃ paṭighātāyā”ti. Diṭṭhadhammo vuccati paccakkho attabhāvo, tattha bhavā diṭṭhadhammikā.
tika-s0404t0:570_7: Tena vuttaṃ “tasmiṃyeva attabhāve pattabbā”ti. Sammukhā garahanaṃ akitti, parammukhā
tika-s0404t0:570_8: garahanaṃ ayaso. Atha vā sammukhā parammukhā garahanaṃ akitti, parivārahāni ayasoti
tika-s0404t0:572_0: Saṃvaravinayoti sīlasaṃvaro, satisaṃvaro, ñāṇasaṃvaro, khantisaṃvaro, vīriyasaṃvaroti
tika-s0404t0:572_1: pañcavidho saṃvaro. Yathāsakaṃ saṃvaritabbānaṃ vinetabbānañca kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ
tika-s0404t0:572_2: saṃvaraṇato saṃvaro, vinayanato vinayoti vuccati. Pahānavinayoti tadaṅgappahānaṃ
tika-s0404t0:572_4: pañcavidhaṃ pahānaṃ yasmā cāgaṭṭhena pahānaṃ, vinayaṭṭhena vinayo, tasmā “pahānavinayo”ti
tika-s0404t0:572_5: vuccati. Samathavinayoti satta adhikaraṇasamathā. Paññattivinayoti sikkhāpadameva.
tika-s0404t0:572_6: Sikkhāpadapaññattiyā hi vijjamānāya eva sikkhāpadasambhavato paññattivinayopi sikkhāpadapaññattiyā
tika-s0404t0:577_0: 41-48. Pañcamassa paṭhamādīni uttānatthāni. Chaṭṭhe khaṇabhaṅguratāya na niccā na
tika-s0404t0:577_1: dhuvāti aniccā. Tato eva paṇḍitehi na iccā na upagantabbātipi aniccā. Svāyaṃ nesaṃ
tika-s0404t0:577_2: aniccaṭṭho udayavayaparicchinnatāya veditabboti āha “hutvā abhāvino”ti, uppajjitvā
tika-s0404t0:577_3: vinassakāti attho. Sārarahitāti niccasāradhuvasāraattasāravirahitā. Musāti visaṃvādanaṭṭhena
tika-s0404t0:577_4: musā, ekaṃsena asubhādisabhāvā te bālānaṃ subhādibhāvena upaṭṭhahanti, subhādiggahaṇassa
tika-s0404t0:577_5: paccayabhāvena satte visaṃvādenti. Tenāha “niccasubhasukhā viyā”tiādi. Na passanasabhāvāti
tika-s0404t0:577_6: khaṇapabhaṅguratāittarapaccupaṭṭhānatāya dissamānā viya hutvā adassanapakatikā. Ete
tika-s0404t0:577_7: hi khettaṃ viya vatthu viya hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ viya ca paññāyitvāpi katipāheneva supinake
tika-s0404t0:577_8: diṭṭhā viya na paññāyanti. Sattamaṭṭhamāni suviññeyyāni.
tika-s0404t0:580_0: 49-50. Navame punabbhavadānaṃ punabbhavo uttarapadalopena, punabbhavo sīlamassāti
tika-s0404t0:587_0: 51-60. Dutiyassa paṭhamādīni uttānatthāni. Dasame pittaṃ samuṭṭhānametesanti pittasamuṭṭhānā,
tika-s0404t0:587_1: pittapaccayāpittahetukāti attho. Semhasamuṭṭhānādīsupi eseva nayo. Sannipātikāti
tika-s0404t0:587_2: tiṇṇampi pittādīnaṃ kopena samuṭṭhitā. Utupariṇāmajāti visabhāgaututo jātā. Jaṅgaladesavāsīnañhi
tika-s0404t0:587_3: anūpadese vasantānaṃ visabhāgo ca utu uppajjati, anūpadesavāsīnañca jaṅgaladeseti
tika-s0404t0:587_4: evaṃ parasamuddatīrādivasenapi utuvisabhāgatā uppajjatiyeva. Tato jātāti utupariṇāmajā.
tika-s0404t0:587_5: Attano pakaticariyānaṃ visayānaṃ visamaṃ kāyapariharaṇavasena jātā visamaparihārajā.
tika-s0404t0:587_7: saṅgaho. Parassa upakkamato nibbattā opakkamikā. Bāhiraṃ paccayaṃ anapekkhitvā kevalaṃ
tika-s0404t0:587_8: kammavipākatova jātā kammavipākajā. Tattha purimehi sattahi kāraṇehi uppannā sārīrikā
tika-s0404t0:587_9: vedanā sakkā paṭibāhituṃ, kammavipākajānaṃ pana sabbabhesajjānipi sabbaparittānipi nālaṃ paṭighātāya.
tika-s0404t0:592_0: 61-67. Dutiyassa paṭhamādīni uttānatthāni. Sattame naḷakapānaketi evaṃnāmake nigame.
tika-s0404t0:592_1: Pubbe kira amhākaṃ bodhisatto kapiyoniyaṃ nibbatto mahākāyo kapirājā hutvā anekasatavānarasahassaparivuto
tika-s0404t0:592_2: pabbatapāde vicari, paññavā kho pana hoti mahāpañño. So parisaṃ evaṃ ovadati, “tātā,
tika-s0404t0:592_3: imasmiṃ pabbatapāde visaphalāni honti, amanussapariggahitā pokkharaṇikā nāma honti,
tika-s0404t0:592_4: tumhe pubbe khāditapubbāneva phalāni khādatha, pītapubbāneva pānīyāni pivatha, ettha
tika-s0404t0:592_5: vo paṭipucchitakiccaṃ natthī”ti. Te apītapubbaṃ disvā sahasāva apivitvā samantā paridhāvitvā
tika-s0404t0:592_6: mahāsattassa āgamanaṃ olokayamānā nisīdiṃsu. Mahāsatto āgantvā “kiṃ, tātā, pānīyaṃ
tika-s0404t0:592_7: na pivathā”ti āha. Tumhākaṃ āgamanaṃ olokemāti. “Sādhu, tātā”ti samantā padaṃ pariyesamāno
tika-s0404t0:592_8: otiṇṇapadaṃyeva addasa, na uttiṇṇapadaṃ. Adisvā “saparissayā”ti aññāsi. Tāvadeva
tika-s0404t0:592_9: ca tattha abhinibbattaamanusso udakaṃ dvedhā katvā uṭṭhāsi – setamukho, nīlakucchi,
tika-s0404t0:592_10: rattahatthapādo, mahādāṭhiko, vantadāṭho, virūpo, bībhaccho, udakarakkhaso. So evamāha
tika-s0404t0:592_11: – “kasmā pānīyaṃ na pivatha, madhuraṃ udakaṃ pivatha, kiṃ tumhe etassa vacanaṃ suṇāthā”ti.
tika-s0404t0:592_12: Mahāsatto āha “tvaṃ adhivattho amanusso”ti? Āmāhanti. “Tvaṃ idha otiṇṇe labhasī”ti
tika-s0404t0:592_13: āha. Āma, tumhe pana sabbe khādissāmīti. Na sakkhissasi yakkhāti. Pānīyaṃ pana pivissathāti.
tika-s0404t0:592_14: Āma, pivissāmāti. Evaṃ sante ekampi vānaraṃ na muñcissanti. “Pānīyañca pivissāma,
tika-s0404t0:592_15: na ca te vasaṃ gamissāmā”ti naḷaṃ āharāpetvā koṭiyaṃ gahetvā dhami. Sabbo ekacchiddo
tika-s0404t0:592_16: ahosi. Tīre nisīditvāva pānīyaṃ pivi. Sesavānarānampi pāṭiyekkaṃ naḷaṃ āharāpetvā
tika-s0404t0:592_17: dhamitvā adāsi. Sabbe te passantasseva pānīyaṃ piviṃsu. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
tika-s0404t0:594: Naḷena vāriṃ pissāma, neva maṃ tvaṃ vadhissasī”ti. ;
tika-s0404t0:595_0: Tato paṭṭhāya yāva ajjadivasā tasmiṃ ṭhāne naḷā ekacchiddāva honti. Imasmiñhi kappe
tika-s0404t0:595_1: kappaṭṭhiyapāṭihāriyāni nāma cande sasalakkhaṇaṃ, vaṭṭajātake saccakiriyaṭṭhāne aggijālassa
tika-s0404t0:595_2: āgamanupacchedo, ghaṭīkārassa mātāpitūnaṃ vasanaṭṭhāne anovassanaṃ, pokkharaṇiyā
tika-s0404t0:595_3: tīre naḷānaṃ ekacchiddabhāvoti. Iti sā pokkharaṇī naḷena pānīyassa pivitattā “naḷakapānakā”ti
tika-s0404t0:595_4: nāmaṃ labhi. Aparabhāge taṃ pokkharaṇiṃ nissāya nigamo patiṭṭhāsi, tassapi “naḷakapāna”ntveva
tika-s0404t0:595_5: nāmaṃ jātaṃ. Taṃ pana sandhāya vuttaṃ “naḷakapāne”ti. Palāsavaneti kiṃsukavane.
tika-s0404t0:596_0: Tuṇhībhūtaṃ tuṇhībhūtanti byāpanicchāyaṃ idaṃ āmeḍitavacananti dassetuṃ “yaṃ yaṃ
tika-s0404t0:596_1: disa”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Anuviloketvāti ettha anu-saddo “parī”ti iminā samānatthoti āha
tika-s0404t0:596_2: “tato tato viloketvā”ti. Kasmā āgilāyati koṭisahassahatthināgānaṃ balaṃ dhārentassāti
tika-s0404t0:596_3: codakassa adhippāyo. Ācariyo panassa “esa saṅkhārānaṃ sabhāvo, yadidaṃ aniccatā.
tika-s0404t0:596_4: Ye pana aniccā, te ekanteneva udayavayappaṭipīḷitatāya dukkhā eva. Dukkhasabhāvesu
tika-s0404t0:596_5: tesu satthukāye dukkhuppattiyā ayaṃ paccayo”ti dassetuṃ “bhagavato”tiādi vuttaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:596_6: Piṭṭhivāto uppajji, so ca kho pubbekatakammapaccayā. Etthāha “kiṃ pana taṃ kammaṃ,
tika-s0404t0:596_7: yena aparimāṇakālaṃ sakkaccaṃ upacitavipulapuññasambhāro satthā evarūpaṃ dukkhavipākamanubhavatī”ti?
tika-s0404t0:596_8: Vuccate – ayameva bhagavā bodhisattabhūto atītajātiyaṃ mallaputto hutvā pāpajanasevī
tika-s0404t0:596_9: ayonisomanasikārabahulo carati. So ekadivasaṃ nibbuddhe vattamāne ekaṃ mallaputtaṃ
tika-s0404t0:596_10: gahetvā gāḷhataraṃ nippīḷesi. Tena kammena idāni buddho hutvāpi dukkhamanubhavi.
tika-s0404t0:596_11: Yathā cetaṃ, evaṃ ciñcamāṇavikādīnamitthīnaṃ yāni bhagavato abbhakkhānādīni dukkhāni,
tika-s0404t0:596_12: sabbāni pubbekatassa vipākāvasesāni, yāni kammapilotikānīti vuccanti. Vuttañhetaṃ apadāne –
tika-s0404t0:601: “Suṇātha bhikkhavo mayhaṃ, yaṃ kammaṃ pakataṃ mayā;
tika-s0404t0:612: Taṃ abbhakkhāya niraye, ciraṃ saṃsaritaṃ mayā.
tika-s0404t0:647: Pāde chaviṃ pakappesi, na hi kammaṃ vinassati.
tika-s0404t0:652: Sabbe sakkā ca haññiṃsu, yadā hani viṭaṭūbho.
tika-s0404t0:655: Yavaṃ khādatha bhuñjatha, mā ca bhuñjatha sālayo.
tika-s0404t0:666: Kuto nu bodhi muṇḍassa, bodhi paramadullabhā.
tika-s0404t0:677_0: 69-70. Navame duggatito saṃsārato ca niyyāti etenāti niyyānaṃ, saggamaggo, mokkhamaggo
tika-s0404t0:677_1: ca. Taṃ niyyānaṃ arahati, niyyāne vā niyuttā, niyyānaṃ vā phalabhūtaṃ etissā atthīti
tika-s0404t0:677_2: niyyānikā. Vacīduccaritasaṃkilesato niyyātīti vā īkārassa rassattaṃ, yakārassa ca
tika-s0404t0:677_3: kakāraṃ katvā niyyānikā, cetanāya saddhiṃ samphappalāpā veramaṇi. Tappaṭipakkhato
tika-s0404t0:677_4: aniyyānikā, tassā bhāvo aniyyānikattaṃ, tasmā aniyyānikattā. Tiracchānabhūtanti tirokaraṇabhūtaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:678_0: Saha atthenāti sātthakaṃ, hitappaṭisaṃyuttanti attho. “Surākathā”tipi pāṭhoti āha
tika-s0404t0:678_1: “surākathanti pāḷiyaṃ panā”ti. Sā panesā kathā “evarūpā navasurā pītā ratijananī
tika-s0404t0:678_2: hotī”ti assādavasena na vaṭṭati, ādīnavavasena pana “ummattakasaṃvattanikā”tiādinā
tika-s0404t0:678_3: nayena vaṭṭati. Tenāha “anekavidhaṃ…pe… ādīnavavasena vaṭṭatī”ti. Visikhāti gharasanniveso.
tika-s0404t0:678_4: Visikhāgahaṇena ca tannivāsino gahitā “gāmo āgato”tiādīsu viya. Tenevāha “sūrā samatthā”ti
tika-s0404t0:678_5: ca “saddhā pasannā”ti ca. Kumbhaṭṭhānappadesena kumbhadāsiyo vuttāti āha “kumbhadāsikathā vā”ti.
tika-s0404t0:679_1: vimuttā. Uppattiṭhitisaṃhārādivasena lokaṃ akkhāyatīti lokakkhāyikā. Asukena nāmāti
tika-s0404t0:679_2: pajāpatinā brahmunā, issarena vā. Vitaṇḍasallāpakathāti “aṭṭhīnaṃ setattā setoti
tika-s0404t0:679_3: na vattabbo, pattānaṃ kāḷattā kāḷoti pana vattabbo”ti evamādikā. Ādi-saddena “selapupphalakāni
tika-s0404t0:679_4: viya jīvidāvirapārayattivisālā natthi, yaṃ yo koci tiriyāmānā katattā”ti evamādīnaṃ
tika-s0404t0:679_5: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Sāgaradevenāti sāgaraputtarājūhi. Khatoti etaṃ ekavacanaṃ tehi
tika-s0404t0:679_6: paccekaṃ khatattā “sāgaradevena khatattā”ti vuttaṃ. Sahamuddā samuddoti vutto. Bhavati
tika-s0404t0:679_7: vaddhati etenāti bhavo. Bhavābhavā hontīti itibhavābhavakathā. Ettha ca bhavoti sassataṃ,
tika-s0404t0:679_8: abhavoti ucchedaṃ. Bhavoti vuddhi, abhavoti hāni. Bhavoti kāmasukhaṃ, abhavoti attakilamathoti
tika-s0404t0:679_9: iti imāya chabbidhāya itibhavābhavakathāya saddhiṃ bāttiṃsa tiracchānakathā nāma
tika-s0404t0:679_10: honti. Atha vā pāḷiyaṃ sarūpato anāgatāpi araññapabbatanadīdīpakathā itisaddena saṅgaṇhitvā
tika-s0404t0:679_11: bāttiṃsa tiracchānakathā vuttā. Dasame natthi vattabbaṃ.
tika-s0404t0:684_0: 71-74. Tatiyassa paṭhame sīlassa anavasesasamādānena akhaṇḍādibhāvāpattiyā ca paripuṇṇasīlā.
tika-s0404t0:684_1: Samādānato paṭṭhāya avicchindanato sīlasamaṅgino. Ettāvatā kirāti kira-saddo arucisūcanattho.
